source: Sire, Amalea is right about the resources. Therefore I correct myself. We should only build an outpost as this is the most effective military building.
target: Mienheer, Amalee’ hett Recht över de Materialien. Ick änner mienen Raad. Wi sallen blot eene Butenstee bauen, wat de goodkopenste Soldateree-Boo is.

source: I expect that Saledus and Amalea are deeply delighted as well.
target: Ick gloov, Saledus un Amalee’ sünd ok unbannig bliede.

source: Oh no! Amalea is right. In fact, I can’t see any productivity at all. And the road network seems to be completely in shambles as well. Who might be responsible for this chaos?
target: Och nee! Amalee’ hett recht. Ick kann överhoopt keene Wöörde sehn. Un dat Stratennett is ok heel un daal in ’t Wilde. Well is wull för deeses Dörnanner verantwoordelk?

source: This is a somewhat technical map, and it is best suited for two or three human players. Coal is hard to find – consider making some. There is gold near the starting point – do you see it?
target: Deese Kaart is wat unnatürelk, un ’t is am besten för twee of dree Minsken as Spelers. Köhl to finnen is swaar – villicht maakst du beter sülvst welke. ’t gifft Gold dicht bi de Anfangs-Stee – süchst du ’t?

source: I am really worried about the weakness of our army. We should start to increase our military power. As a starting point, we should recruit at least ten new soldiers.
target: De Swackde vun uns’ Soldateree is leep slimm. Wi mutten begpnnen, uns’ Soldateree-Macht to verbetern. Toeerst laat uns teihn neje Soldaten anhüren.

source: Red player is close to the ores, but has little fertile terrain. Yellow player has plenty of good land, but must move far from his starting position to find ores. Blue player takes the middle ground – he has some fertile land and is not too far away from the resources.
target: De rode Speler is dicht an de Kluten, hett aver haast keene Eer, waar wat wasst. De gele Speler hett vööl godes Land, mutt aver wied weg söken, um Kluten to kriegen. De blaue Speler is daartüsken – he hett een bietje früchtbares Land un is nich so wied weg vun de Mineraalen.

source: Peace, Chieftain Reebaud! I will start with the colonization of the island straight away.
target: Free, Mienheer Reebaud! Ick fang stracks mit de Besiedeln vun de Hallig an.

source: With respect, Chieftain, please be not so hasty! The enemies are very strong, and I’m still not convinced we can defeat them. I’d prefer not to send any soldiers into a battle they will likely lose. I’d prefer to wait a bit longer until we can certainly beat the enemy without losing soldiers.
target: Mit Respekt, Mienheer, wees bidde nich so haastig! De Feinde sünd unbannig machtig, un ick gloov noch nich, dat wi se manntjen könen. Ick will nich geern Soldaten in eene Slacht schicken, de se wahrschienelk verlesen. Ick will lever een bietje wachten, bit wi de Feind wiss sünner Starvfallen manntjen könen.

source: According to our fishermen he is locked up in the stronghold on the island. We should use the knowledge about shipbuilding that we took from Törver to build ships and attack their positions.
target: Uns’ Fiskers seggen, dat he in eener Schanz up de Insel insperrt is. Wi sallen dat Weten över dat Schippebauen bruken, wat wi vun Törver lehrt hebben, um Schippen to bauen un hör Schanz antogriepen.

source: To attack an enemy, you must click on the door of an adversary’s military building. A menu will pop up allowing you to select the number of soldiers that should attack. When you are ready with setting the number, click on the cross (‘Start Attack’).
target: Um eenen Feind antogriepen, klick de Döör vun eenem Soldateree-Boo vun dienem Feind an. Een Fenster kummt lett sik sehn, waar du utkören sallst, wo völe Soldaten angriepen sallen. Wenn du de Tahl sett hest, klick dat Krüüz (»Angriepen«) an.

source: Three weeks later, I returned to Fremil to speak with our king. He was furious at the Barbarians, yet forbade any attack on these tribes. He believed that our army was too weak to survive in a war against the Barbarians.
target: Dree Weken naher was ick torügg in Freemilt, um mit de König to spreken. He was güünsk över de Willen Lüü, versee mir aver, deese Völker antogriepen. He meende, uns’ Soldateree is to swack, deese Willen Lüü im Krieg to manntjen.

source: Sire, I fear we are not safe in this foreign land. Who knows what terrible creatures live beyond this forest, in that mighty desert? What if these creatures enter the woods and await the time to attack us?
target: Mienheer, mi is bang, dat wi in deesem frömden Land nich seker sünd. Well weet, wat för grieselke Deerten achtern de Wald in de gewaltige Wüüst leven? Wat wenn deese Beesten de Wald betreden un uns angriepen willen?

source: There are still a few Barbarians hiding on our island, but I am sure that we will find them soon. Every Barbarian who doesn’t attack us will be put in a boat with the other peaceful ones, and sent back to their country.
target: ’t gifft noch een paar Wille Lüü, de sik up uns’ Insel versteken, aver wiss finnen wi se bold. All Willen, de uns nich angriepen, setten wi in een Schipp mit de annern freedsamen un schicken se in hör Land torügg.

source: The message was addressed to me, begging me to come back to Fremil. It says that the Empire is at war with the Barbarians. They were attacked from the north by the tribe that I was forbidden to attack. It is clear to me what I must do…
target: ’t was eene Naricht för mi, de mi daarum anging, dat ick na Freemilt torügg koom. Dat Latienske Riek is im Krieg mit de Willen Lüü. Se sünd vun Noorden angrepen worden, vun de Volk, wat ick nich angriepen dürde. Ick weet, wat ick doon mutt …

source: I am really afraid, because we are completely unprepared should the Barbarians decide to attack us.
target: Ick bün würrelk bange, wiel wi överhoopt nich vörbereidt sünd, wenn de Willen Lüü uns angriepen wullen.

source: I’d like to say we should attack him right now, but I fear we aren’t strong enough yet to hold our own against him in battle. We should hurry our soldier training while pretending to be gathering his so-called gift. That would buy us some time.
target: Am Leevsten will ick seggen, dat wi hüm gliek stracks angriepen, aver ick bün bange, dat wi noch nich stark genoog sünd, um hüm in eener Slacht to begegen. Wi sallen uns’ Soldaten fixer utbilden as wi so doon, as of wi siene sobenöömte Gaav sammeln. Dat gifft uns wat Tied.

source: When you are expanding into no man’s land, you can make your buildings prefer rookies. When you are planning to attack, send heroes into that region. Conquered buildings always prefer heroes.
target: Wenn du nejes Land innimmst, kannst du diene Boen Snöttbaarten vörtrecken laten. Wenn du angriepen willst, treck Helden vör. Innohmen Boen trecken immer Helden vör.

source: To attack a building, click on its doors, choose the number of soldiers that you wish to send and click on the ‘Attack’ button.
target: Um een Huus antogriepen, klick siene Döör an, köör de Tahl vun Soldaten, wat de schicken willst, ut, un klick dann de »Angriepen«-Knoop an.

source: I almost forgot in this haste – wherever we will land, we’ll need some construction materials to get started, and soldiers to secure and expand our new colony. Even after loading the expedition, the ship should have enough free space for a few wares and workers. On top of that, there should be room for up to %d soldier, if nobody minds being all crammed together. Let’s send some building supplies and our best men to the port when it’s completed, to get ready to embark when we set sail!
target: Ick hebb dat in deeser Iel haast vergeten – waar wi ok lannen sallen, wi bruken Materialien tum Bauen, um mit de Upbauen vun uns’ neei Dörp to begünnen, un Soldaten, um uns’ nejes Dörp to sekern und to vergrotern. Ok nadeem wi de Söök laden hebben, könen wi bit to %d Soldat up uns’ Schipp mitnehmen, wenn ’t hör nix utmaakt, all vollstoppt to wesen. Laat uns een paar Baumaterialien un uns’ besten Keerls tur Muu schicken, wenn se kumpleet is, daarmit se an Boord gahn könen, wenn wi lössseilen!

source: I almost forgot in this haste – wherever we will land, we’ll need some construction materials to get started, and soldiers to secure and expand our new colony. Even after loading the expedition, the ship should have enough free space for a few wares and workers. On top of that, there should be room for up to %d soldiers, if nobody minds being all crammed together. Let’s send some building supplies and our best men to the port when it’s completed, to get ready to embark when we set sail!
target: Ick hebb dat in deeser Iel haast vergeten – waar wi ok lannen sallen, wi bruken Materialien tum Bauen, um mit de Upbauen vun uns’ neei Dörp to begünnen, un Soldaten, um uns’ nejes Dörp to sekern und to vergrotern. Ok nadeem wi de Söök laden hebben, könen wi bit to %d Soldaten up uns’ Schipp mitnehmen, wenn ’t hör nix utmaakt, all vollstoppt to wesen. Laat uns een paar Baumaterialien un uns’ besten Keerls tur Muu schicken, wenn se kumpleet is, daarmit se an Boord gahn könen, wenn wi lössseilen!

source: Your workers and soldiers will find shelter here. Also stores your wares and tools.
target: Brengt diene Lüü un Soldaten unner un verwahrt diene Waren un anner Kraam.

source: Your workers and soldiers will find shelter here. Also stores your wares and tools.
target: Brengt diene Lüü un Soldatsken unner un verwahrt diene Waren un anner Kraam.

source: Your workers and soldiers will find shelter here. Also stores your wares and tools. It will help you to stabilize your economy.
target: Brengt diene Lüü un Soldaten unner un verwahrt diene Waren un anner Kraam. Hülpt di, diene Weertskupp to stevigen.

source: Your workers and soldiers will find shelter here. Also stores your wares and tools.
target: Brengt diene Lüü un Soldaten unner un verwahrt diene Waren un anner Kraam.

source: Your workers and soldiers will find shelter here. Also stores your wares and tools.
target: Brengt diene Lüü un Soldaten unner un verwahrt diene Waren un anner Kraam.

source: Your workers and soldiers will find shelter here. Also stores your wares and tools.
target: Brengt diene Lüü un Soldaten unner un verwahrt diene Waren un anner Kraam.

source: These advanced shields are used by the best soldiers of the Atlanteans. They are produced in the armor smithy and used in the labyrinth – together with food – to train soldiers from defense level 1 to level 2.
target: De besten Atlantisken Soldaten bruken deese goden Schilden. Se worden in de Panzersmee produzeert un in Dwaalwegen – tosamen mit Spiesen – bruukt, um Soldaten vun Verteidigung-Stand 1 up Stand 2 uttobilden.

source: Maximum number of autosave files:
target: Hoogste Tahl vun Dateien vun automatiskem Sekern:

source: A meal is made out of pitta bread, strong beer and fish/meat in a big inn. This substantial food is exactly what workers in a deeper mine need.
target: Een Mahl word in eenem Weertshuus ut Pitta-Brood, Deftigen Beer un Fiss of Fleesk maakt. Dat is wat de Arbeiders in eenem Bannig deepen Bargwark bruken.

source: Build a warehouse close to the conquered pirate sentry near the brook. We will need it as a basis for further exploration. Furthermore we could use it to store some gold that we will mine from the surrounding hills.
target: Bau een Kraamhuus dicht bi de innohmen Seerover-Wachters-Kamer bi de Beek. Wi bruken ’t as Utgangsstee för wieders Utförsken. Un wi könen daar ok wat Gold lagern, wat wi ut de umgeven Höchten ofboen wullen.

source: A friend of mine explored the island on his own and he told me of a big lake at the top of the mountain. I suggest we build the ships in this lake and wait until the island drowns beneath us. Then we can sail away. It is a bold plan, but I think it could work.
target: Een Fründ vun mi hett de Insel sülvst utförsket un mi vun eenem groten Meer vertellt, wat hoog in de Bargen liggt. Ick slaag vör, dat wi de Schippen in deesem Meer bauen un wachten, bit de Insel unnergahn is. Dann könen wi wegseilen. Dat is een driester Plaan, aver ick gloov, dat word so gahn.

source: The traitor left his armies dying where they lay when he saw that he would not keep my forces back. Kalitath disappeared in the confusion of the war, but I don’t care now. Shall he flee and be forgotten for all times as a tribal leader that would not bow before the wooden throne, that is mine to take now.
target: De Verräter hett siene Soldaten liegen laten, waar se starven, as he sehn hett, dat he miene Soldateree nich torügghollen kann. Kalitat is im Krieg wegslichen, aver dat is mi egaal. Sall he doch weglöpen un för all Tieded as een Anföhrer vergeten worden, well sik nich vör de holten Throon verbugen wull, wat ick nu innehmen sall.

source: Sire, I’ve got good news for you: As I walked to the east, I found a larger mountain. I am not absolutely sure – a geologist should check if I am right – but I believe we could mine marble from some places on the mountain.
target: Mienheer, ick hebb gode Narichten för Ji: As ick na Oosten gahn bün, hebb ick eenen groten Barg funnen. Ick gloov – aver dat sall een Schattsöker nakieken – dat wi vun eenigen Steden im Barg Marmel ofboen könen.

source: It would be especially helpful to find more marble, either within fields of rock or in the mountains to mine it.
target: ’t is besünners good, wenn wi mehr Marmel finnen, of as Felden vun Stenen of tum Ofboen in Bargen.

source: Our wood and reed supplies are ensured. Now, we must take care of our brick supply. Bricks are burned in a brick kiln out of granite and clay, so we first need to produce those. On the mainland, we used to cut granite out of rocks, but I don’t see any here. Perhaps these hills contain enough stones to mine some granite.
target: Uns’ Versörgung mit Holt un Reit is seker. Nu mutten wi uns um Backstenen kümmern. Backstenen worden in eener Backsteenbranneree ut Flint un Lehm brannt, also mutten wi eerst maal deese produzeren. Up de Fastland hebben wi Flint ut Stenen slagen, aver ick seh hier keene. Villicht is in deesen Höchten genoog Steen, um wat Flint oftoboen.

source: We must start by building all the basic buildings. I see no mountains nearby where we might mine coal. We’d better build a charcoal kiln to burn logs into charcoal. We improve the kilns with clay so they don’t consume so much wood. Our neighbors used to envy us for this clever technique, which they couldn’t copy.
target: Wi mutten daarmit begünnen, all de eenfachen Husen to bauen. Ick seh keene Bargen in de Naberskupp, waar wi Köhle ofboen könen. Wi sallen beter eene Holtköhl-Branneree bauen, um Köhle ut Boomstammen to maken. Wi verbetern de Brannereen mit Lehm, daarmit se nich so vööl Holt bruken. Uns’ Nabers hebben uns för deese kloke Technik beniedt, wat se nich namaken kunnen.

source: The legate and I have no more business with each other now. I have taken a dislike to his superior attitude during the journey, and especially to the disdainful manner in which he treated his galley slaves. It did not seem to occur to him that they are human beings like him and me; or if it did, he acted as though they themselves were to blame for their bad fortune. I do not regret that I will probably not be seeing him again. He set up his camp some distance away from mine so that we will not hinder each other.
target: De Legaat un ick hebben nu nix mehr miteenanner to doon. Ick hebb up de Fahrt  eene Piek tegen siene inbildsk Maneer kregen, un vör allem tegen de verachten Aard, wo he siene Galeeren-Slaven behannelt. ’t kummt hüm nich in de Sinn, dat dat Minsken as he un ick sünd; of wenn doch, dann doot he, as of se sülven Schuld an hör slimmen Loos sünd. ’t is mi nich Leid, dat ick hüm wull nich mehr to sehn kriegen word. He hett sien Lager een Deeltje von mienem weg upsett, daarmit wi eenanner nich in de Queer komen.

source: There is one more thing I’d like to teach you now: Expanding your territory. The place that we started with around our headquarters is barely enough for a basic building infrastructure, and we do not have access to mountains, which we need to mine minerals and coal. So, we have to expand our territory.
target: Een Ding will ick di noch verklaren: Dien Gewest vergrotern. De Rüümte um uns’ Raadhuus, waar wi mit anfangen hebben, is jüüst genoog, um eene slichte Weertskupp to bauen, un wi hebben keene Bargen, wat wi bruuken, um Köhle un Mineraalen oftoboen. Also mutten wi uns’ Gewest vergrotern.

source: Look at this valley here in the far south. We have found a mountain with gold down here and would like to mine ores from it as well. But the streams separating it from our main colony are too wide to build bridges and too narrow for ships to pass them. Our roads would have to take long curves, which slows down ware transport a lot.
target: Kiek deeses Daal hier wied im Süden an. Wi hebben hier unnern eenen Barg mit Gold funnen un wullen ok hier Kluten ofboen. Aver de Beken, wat ’t vun uns’ Höövdstee trennen, sünd to wied för Brücken un to eng för Schippen. Uns’ Straten mutten lange Kurven nehmen, wat de Waren-Transpoort vööl langsamer macht.

source: Praise Satul! Ostur, the young ship builder did it. We have three ships – never have I seen sturdier ones – with enough room to carry all of us and some wares too. And this rescue came just in time: Lutas is about to swallow the rest of this island, the water rises faster by the hour. But we can make our escape now and start over in some country farther away…
target: Satuul wees Pries! Ostuur, de Schippebauer, hett ’t daankregen. Wi hebben dree Schippen – un ick hebb nie hardere sehn – wat jüüst groot genoog sünd, um uns all to dragen. Un dat weer jüüst bi Tied: Luutas word nu bold de Insel kumpleet versluken, dat Water löppt alltied fixer up. Aver wi könen nu utnaihen un in eenem anner Land, wied weg, neei begünnen …

source: Supply basic building material for your economy:
target: Versörg diene Weertskupp mit de wichtigsten Baumaterialien:

source: May Satul warm you, Jundlina! The most important things for building a settlement are the building materials. There are some trees here, so we should build housings for some woodcutters and of course also for foresters, so we will not run out of trees. Oh, and we mustn’t forget the sawmill, for most buildings can’t be made out of logs alone. Stronger buildings also need granite, but there is plenty to the north-east of here; we just need to build a quarry, and my stonemasons will go to work promptly.
target: Satuul sall Jo warmen, Jundlin’! De wichtigsten Dingen, um een Dörp to bauen, sünd de Baumaterialien. Dat gifft hier een paar Bomen, also sallen wi Husen för Boomslagers bauen un natürelk ok för Försters, daarmit dat alltied genoog Bomen gifft. Ach, un wi düren nich eene Saagmöhlen vergeten, denn de meesten Husen könen nich blot ut Boomstammen baut worden. Grotere Husen bruken ok Flint, aver dat gifft Bülten daarvun im Noordoost; wi bruken nix as een Flintslagerhuus un miene Flintslager fangen stracks an to warken.

source: May Satul warm you, Jundlina! I agree with what Loftomor proposes. We need a good supply of building materials for we have to expand our territory swiftly. I will not feel safe on this island as long as we have not seen all its shores. I brought plenty of good men from Atlantis. The military might is available. We only need some housing to live in.
target: Satuul sall Jo warmen, Jundlin’! Ick segg Jau to all, wat Loftomoor vörslaggt. Wi bruken völe Baumaterialien, um uns’ Gewest fix to vergrotern. Ick föhl mi up deeser Insel nich seker, bit wi se kumpleet sehn hebben. Ick hebb bannig völe gode Lüü vun Atlantis mitbrocht. De Soldateree is klaar, wi bruken blot Husen, waar se leven könen.

source: We found an old building, destroyed and burned by flames. I am very worried about this discovery. The building is not of any kind I’ve ever seen. It is certainly not designed by any Atlantean architect I’ve ever heard about. The building is crude, the assemblage is sloppy. But the materials are very enduring: the wood used for it seemed to have been burned in a strange way before it was used as building material – it is hard as stone.
target: Wi hebben een olles Huus funnen, verneelt un vun Füür verbrannt. Ick bün unbannig besörgt. Dat Huus sücht nich ut as elkeen, wat ick jemaals sehn hebb. Dat is wiss nich vun elkeen Atlantisken Baukeerl baut worden, vun well ick jemaals höört hebb. Dat Huus is simpel, dat Tosamenbauen sludderig. Aver de Materialien sünd bannig haart: Dat Holt is wull up eene komiske Aard brannt worden, ehr dat tum Bauen bruukt wurr – dat is so haart as Steen.

source: We have not much water left; our food is running low; we lost all our tools and most of our building materials with the third ship. We can’t afford to sail any further, and we must attempt to settle on this island as close as possible to our current position.
target: Wi hebben nich mehr vööl Water över; uns’ Eten word knapp; wi hebben all uns’ Warktüüg un dat Meest vun uns’ Baumaterialien mit de darden Schipp verloren. Wi könen eenfach nich wieder sailen un mutten vun Nood up deeser Insel lannen – so dicht bi uns’ aktuelle Stee as wi könen.

source: Bigger and better buildings – including all military ones – require better building materials. They cannot be built out of simple logs – the logs have to be refined to blackwood by a wood hardener first. Always remember to build a wood hardener before you run out of blackwood, as without it you cannot expand.
target: Grote un betere Husen – un alle Soldateree-Boen – bruuken betere Baumaterialien. Se könen nich blot mit Boomstammen baut worden – de Boomstammen mutten eerst vun eener Holtharderee to Haartholt verbetert worden. Bau immer tiedig eene Holtharderee, denn wenn du keen Haartholt mehr hest, kannst du dien Gewest nich mehr vergrotern.

source: Start collecting basic building materials, and fortify the camp.
target: Fang an, eenfache Baumaterialien to sammeln, un seker dat Lager.

source: However: for all these bigger buildings, we need better and more elegant building materials. So you have to build a house for the stonemason, who will cut columns from marble.
target: Aver för all de groten Husen bruuken wi betere Baumaterialien. Baut also eerst maal een Huus för eenen Flintslager, de Pielers ut Marmel sniddjet.

source: Build a lumberjack’s house, a sawmill and a stonemason’s house as soon as there is enough space for them. This will complete the basic building material supply chain.
target: Bau eene Boomhaueree, eene Saagmöhlen un een Steenbickerhuus, sobold daar genoog Rüümte för daar is. Dann is de Versörgung mit eenfachen Baumaterialien seker.

source: Build at least three lumberjack’s houses and two quarries to renew your building material supply chain.
target: Bau tominnst dree Boomhauereen un twee Flintslagerhusen, um de Versörgung mit Baumaterialien weer torechttomaken.

source: So, first of all we need some building materials to start correcting the mistakes made by the infamous secretary. I think we should try dismantling unproductive small buildings to recover some building materials from them and collect them in our headquarters. As far as I can see now, the fishermen’s houses and the quarries don’t have any resources near them. All of the lumberjacks’ houses and the wells seem also to be inefficient or worn out.
target: Toeerst bruken wi also een paar Baumaterialien, um de Fehlers vun deesem lepen Macker oftohelpen. Laat uns unnütze lütte Husen plattrieten, um een paar Baumaterialien torüggtokriegen un se in uns’ Raadhuus to sammeln. Ick seh, dat de Fisker-Husen un Flintslagerhusen keene Mineraale in de Naberskupp hebben. All de Boomhauer-Husen un Wellen sünd ok langsaam of leeg.

source: Except, maybe we should restrict the input of all buildings which consume any of our building materials to zero. Or maybe we could even pause the production in all bigger buildings and get the workers some rest until we have produced some of their input wares.
target: Blot, för de Husen, wat Baumaterialien bruken, sallen wi dat Lager daarför beter up null setten. Of dat Produzeren in all grotern Husen anhollen un de Arbeiders ruhen laten, bit wi de Waren, wat se bruken, produzeert hebben.

source: Therefore I took the freedom to restrict our current building options to the lumberjack’s house until we have gained enough building materials by dismantling the ineffective buildings.
target: Daarum hebb ick mi verlöövt, uns’ List vun Husen tum Bauen up nix as de Boomhaueree to minnern, bit wi genoog Baumaterialien sammelt hebben, indeem wi de unnützen Husen plattrieten.

source: Stockpile some building materials in your headquarters. Gather at least:
target: Pottje eenige Baumaterialien in dienem Raadhuus. Sammel tominnst:

source: You did well. Our entire building material production is working now. Let’s wait until we have gathered some more materials. We could expand our territory some more, to see what else can be found on this island.
target: Hunnert. Wi könen nu all de nödigen Baumaterialien produzeren. Laat uns wachten, bit wi eenige Materialien sammelt hebben. Wi könen nu uns’ Gewest vergrotern, um to sehn, wat ’t noch up deese Hallig gifft.

source: Logs are an important basic building material. They are produced by felling trees.
target: Boomstammen sünd een wichtigs Baumaterial. Se worden produzeert, indeem man Bomen ofkappt.

source: Balsa wood is an important building material. It is also used to make light armor. Balsa trees are cut by an experienced woodcutter.
target: Balsaholt is een wichtigs Baumaterial. ’t word ok bruuk, um lichte Wapenrocken to maken. Balsabomen worden vun erfahrenen Boomslagersken kappt.

source: Smelted in a furnace, it turns into gold which is used as a precious building material and to produce armor.
target: ’t word in Smeltereen smelt. Dann word daarut Gold, wat een düres Baumaterial is un för Wapenrockens bruukt word.

source: Granite is a basic building material and can be dug up by a stone mine.
target: Flint is een wichtiges Baumaterial un kann vun Steen-Bargwarken ofboot worden.

source: ‘Don’t swear at the builder who is short of building materials.’
target: »Schimp nich tegen de Baukeerl, well keene Baumaterialien hett.«

source: Smelted in a smelting works, it turns into gold which is used as a precious building material and to produce weapons and armor.
target: ’t word in Smeltwarken smelt. Dann word daarut Gold, wat een düres Baumaterial is un för Wapens un Wapenrocken bruukt word.

source: Granite can be processed into grout which provides a solid, non burning building material. Grout is produced in a lime kiln.
target: Ut Flint kann man Mörtel maken, wat een stevigs Baumaterial is un nich brannt. Mörtel word in de Kalkbranneree produzeert.

source: Smelted in a smelting works, it turns into gold which is used as a precious building material and to produce weapons and armor.
target: ’t word in Smeltwarken smelt. Dann word daarut Gold, wat een düres Baumaterial is un för Wapens un Wapenrocken bruukt word.

source: Only very important things are embellished with gold. It is produced by the smelting works and used as a precious building material and to produce different axes (in the war mill) and different parts of armor (in the helm smithy).
target: Blot bannig wichtige Dingen worden mit Gold utrüst. ’t word vun de Smeltwark produzeert un is een düres Baumaterial, un ’t word bruukt um (in de Oorlogs-Smee) eenige Exten un (in de Helmsmee) verschedene Helms to produzeren.

source: Granite is a basic building material and can be dug up by a granite mine.
target: Flint is een wichtiges Baumaterial un kann vun Flint-Bargwarken ofboot worden.

source: Marble is the beautiful stone which is cut out of the mountains or produced in a quarry. Marble is used as a building material and gets chiseled into marble columns in the stonemason’s house.
target: Marmel is de moje Steen, wat ut Bargen sneden of in eenem Flintslagerhuus produzeert word. Marmel is een Baumateriaal un word vum Steenbickerhuus in Marmelpielers sniddjet.

source: Smelted in a smelting works, it turns into gold which is used as a precious building material and to produce weapons and armor.
target: ’t word in Smeltwarken smelt. Dann word daarut Gold, wat een düres Baumaterial is un för Wapens un Wapenrocken bruukt word.

source: Marble is a basic building material and can be dug up by a marble mine. You will also get granite from the mine.
target: Marmel is een wichtiges Baumaterial un kann vun Marmel-Bargwarken ofboot worden. Du kriggst ok Flint ut de Bargwark.

source: Bricks are the best and most important building material. They are made out of a mix of clay and granite dried in a coal fire.
target: Backstenen sünd dat beste un wichtigste Baumaterial. Se worden ut eenem Mengsel vun Lehm un Flint in eenem Köhlen-Füür brannt.

source: Smelted in a furnace, it turns into gold which is used as a precious building material and to produce weapons and armor.
target: ’t word in Smeltereen smelt. Dann word daarut Gold, wat een düres Baumaterial is un för Wapens un Wapenrocken bruukt word.

source: Granite is a basic building material and can be dug up by a rock mine.
target: Flint is een wichtiges Baumaterial un kann vun Flint-Bargwarken ofboot worden.

source: Primary Building Materials Industry
target: Eerstes Baumaterialien-Produzeren

source: Secondary Building Materials Industry
target: Twedes Baumaterialien-Produzeren

source: Tertiary Building Materials Industry
target: Dardes Baumaterialien-Produzeren

source: New port construction site is gone
target: Neje Rüümte för Muden is verswunnen

source: Empty value of command line parameter: %s
target: Oorderreeg-Angaav för »%s« is leeg

source: Sound is disabled either due to a problem with the sound driver, or because it was switched off at the command line.
target: Dat Gedrüüs is utknipst, wiel de Gedrüüs-Driever een Probleem hett of du dat vun de Oorderreeg so fastleggt hest.

source: Scouts like Scotty the scout scouting unscouted areas in a scouty fashion.
target: Förskt frömde Geweste ut.

source: Scouts like Scotty the scout scouting unscouted areas in a scouty fashion.
target: Förskt frömde Geweste ut.

source: Scouts like Scotty the scout scouting unscouted areas in a scouty fashion.
target: Förskt frömde Geweste ut.

source: You need to connect this flag to a scout’s hut before you can send a scout here.
target: Du muttst deese Fahn mit eener Bespejerske-Kaat verbinnen, ehr du hier eene Bespejerske henstüren kannst.

source: Cheers Lutius, I don’t know how, but we have been gifted with some beer and wine. We found the additional wares while we were taking stock recently. Maybe the goddess Vesta is still supporting us.
target: Hunnert, Lutjus! Ick weet nich wo, man wi hebben een bietje Beer un Wien funnen. De nejen Waren weren eenfach in eenem Kraamhuus funnen. Villicht unnerstütt uns de Gottin Vesta immer noch.

source: Most buildings will only produce something when the stock level in your warehouses falls below the target quantity, so you should indicate the reserve you want to stockpile.
target: De meesten Husen produzeren blot dann wat, wenn diene Kraamhusen minner Waren hebben, as de End-Tahl fastleggt. Du kannst so also fastsetten, wo völe Waren du överhollen willst.

source: The lumberjack working at this lumberjack’s hut can’t find any trees in his work area. You should consider dismantling or destroying the building or building a ranger’s hut.
target: De Boomhauer dat warkt bi deese Boomhaueree hett keene Bomen tum Ofslaan. Överlegg di, of du dat Huus plattrieten of ofbrannen willst, of bau een Boomplanteree.

source: In order to use a registered account, you need an account on the Widelands website. Please log in at %s and set an online gaming password on your profile page.
target: Um di as een vermarkt Bruker antomellen, bruukst du een Konto up de Widelands-Internett-Sied. Bidde mell di up %s an un sett een Passwoort för ’t Spölen över ’t Internett up diener Bruker-Instellens-Sied.

source: Click to log in. You can then comment and vote on add-ons and upload your own add-ons.
target: Klick tum Anmellen. Dann kannst du Verwiederns beweerten, Kommentaren schrieven un diene eegenen Verwiederns upladen.

source: Please log in to upload add-ons
target: Bidde anmellen, um Verwiederns uptoladen

source: Please log in to upload content
target: Bidde anmellen, um Inhollen uptoladen

source: Please log in to send an enquiry
target: Bidde anmellen, um eene Naricht to schicken

source: Click to log out
target: Tum Ofmellen klicken

source: Please log in to comment
target: Bidde anmellen, um Kommentaren to schrieven

source: Please log in to vote
target: Bidde anmellen, um to beweerten

source: I got the message that our first lumberjack has started his work today. Perhaps it would be a good idea to wait until he has cleared enough space for constructing two more lumberjack’s houses, so that we can harvest the logs faster.
target: Ick bün jüüst wiesworden, dat uns’ Boomhauer nu arbeidt. Wi sallen nu wachten, bit he genoog Rüümte freeimaakt hett, dat wi noch twee anner Boomhauereen bauen könen, daarmit wi de Bomen fixer arnten könen.

source:
‘What’s the work of a charcoal burner?
He’s the tribe’s most plodding earner!
Logs on logs he piles up high,
Until the kiln will reach the sky.
He sets the fire, sees it smolder
The logs he carried on his shoulder.
Burnt down to just one single coal
This troubles much a burner’s soul.’
target:
»Wat maakt man wull een Holtköhlbranner?
He warket mehr as elkeen anner!
Bomen völe schicht he up,
bit tum hogen Hemel rup.
He brannt se an un sücht se swelen,
de he daar dragen hett, de Delen.
To eener Köhl blot daal dann brannt,
so word sien Halswark anerkannt.«

source: They learn to attack with three different swords: The long sword, broadsword and double-edged sword. The latter two contain gold, and all of them iron. The advanced soldiers are taught to use two swords at once: They keep their first double-edged sword, and are given various other swords to wield in their other hand. This makes six steps of attack training.
target: Se lehren de Angriff mit dree verschedenen Sweerten: Dat Lange, Brede un Tweesneidige Sweert. De lesten twee enthollen Gold, un alle Iesen. De beteren Soldaten bruken twee Sweerten up eenmaal: Se behollen hör eerstes Tweesneidigs Sweert, un kriegen verschedene anner Sweerten, de se mit hör anner Hand föhren könen. Dat sünd all tosamen sess Stappen vun Angriffs-Öven.

source: Unknown user has left the game (%s)
target: Een of anner hett dat Speel verlaten (%s)

source: As your road network gets longer and more complicated, you should employ horses to help out your carriers. Horses are bred at horse farms using water and corn. A warehouse will also help to ensure that your transportation system does not collapse.
target: As dien Stratennett groter un kumplizeerter word, sallst du Peer in Deenst stellen, um dienen Lastendragers to helpen. Peer worden in Peertüchtereen mit Water un Mais tücht. Een Kraamhuus helpt ok, dat dien Stratennett nich tosamenbreckt.

source: We should start expanding our territory faster in order to have enough space for many berry farms, and a longer coastline for fishing.
target: Wi sallen uns’ Gewest gauer vergrotern, um genoog Rüümte för mennig Buskenplantereen to hebben, un eene langere Küste tum Fisken.

source: You are right – we should build more berry farms, fruit collector’s houses and taverns as well as a drinking hall, and advanced bakeries and breweries.
target: Du hest recht – wi sallen mehr Buskenplantereen, Früchtenpottjereen un Kneipen bauen, un daarto eene Weertshuus un betere Backereen un Broereen.

source: Spider silk is produced by spiders, which are bred by spider farms. It is processed into spidercloth in a weaving mill.
target: Spinnensied word vun Spinnen produzeert, de in Spinnentüchtereen tücht worden. ’t word in Spinnweelmöhlen to Spinnenstoff verarbeidt.

source: This corn is processed in the mill into fine cornmeal that every Atlantean baker needs for a good bread. Also horse and spider farms need to be provided with corn.
target: Deeser Mais word in Möhlen to Maismehl verarbeidt, wat elkeen Atlantisker Backer för godes Brood bruukt. Ok Peertüchtereen un Spinnentüchtereen mutten mit Mais versörgt worden.

source: Backup file ‘%s’ could not be deleted.
target: Kunn de Sekerheidskopie »%s« nich wegdoon.

source: Backup file ‘%s’ will be available for some time.
target: De Sekerheidskopie »%s« is nu för eenige Tied daar.

source: Unable to load the win condition script file ‘%s’.
target: Kann de Schrieven »%s« för de Upgaav tum Winnen nich laden.

source: There are no artifacts on this map. This should not happen. Please file a bug report on %s and specify your Widelands version and the map you tried to load.
target: Deese Kaart hett keene Künstelk Schatten. Dat sall nich passeren. Bidde schriev eenen Fehler-Bericht unner %s un geev diene Versioon vun Widelands un de Naam vun de Kaart, wat du laden wullst, an.

source: Enhance the coal mine or the iron mine to a deep mine, and enhance the tavern to an inn.
target: Bau dat Köhle-Bargwark of dat Iesen-Bargwark to eenem Deepen Bargwark ut un bau de Kneipe to eenem Kroog ut.

source: A normal mine can only dig up about one third of all the resources that lie beneath it; then it must be enhanced to a deep mine in order to keep it working properly. To enhance a building, choose it and then click the appropriate button in the appearing window.
target: Een normaales Bargwark kann blot een Dardel vun all Mineraale daarunner ofboen; dann mutt ’t to eenem Deepen Bargwark utbaut worden, daarmit ’t wieder arbeiden kann. Um een Huus uttobauen, klick ’t an un klick dann de »Utbauen«-Knoop im Huus-Fenster an.

source: If the food supply is steady, the deep gold mine can produce two pieces of gold ore in %s on average.
target: Wenn de Spiesen to rechter Tied ankomen, produzeert deeses Bargwark dör de Bank all %s twee Goldkluten.

source: If the food supply is steady, the deep iron mine can produce two pieces of iron ore in %s on average.
target: Wenn de Spiesen to rechter Tied ankomen, produzeert dat Deepe Iesen-Bargwark dör de Bank all %s twee Delen Iesenkluut.

source: If the food supply is steady, the deep coal mine can produce four pieces of coal in %s on average.
target: Wenn de Spiesen to rechter Tied ankomen, produzeert deeses Bargwark dör de Bank all %s veer Köhlen.

source: If the food supply is steady, the deep rock mine can produce three blocks of granite in %s on average.
target: Wenn de Spiesen to rechter Tied ankomen, produzeert deeses Bargwark dör de Bank all %s dree Blocken Flint.

source: A meal is made out of pitta bread, strong beer and fish/meat in a big inn. This substantial food is exactly what workers in a deeper mine need.
target: Een Mahl word in eenem Weertshuus ut Pitta-Brood, Deftigen Beer un Fiss of Fleesk maakt. Dat is wat de Arbeiders in eenem Bannig deepen Bargwark bruken.

source: This is an endless game without rules.
target: Dat is een Speel sünner Enn un Örders.

source: This is an endless game without rules. Fog of war is disabled.
target: Dat is een Speel sünner Enn, Upgaven un Kriegsnevel.

source: Just click on any house symbol next to the rocks, select the small buildings tab in the window that opens up, then click on the quarry symbol.
target: Klick eenfach een of anner Huus-Teken tegen de Stenen an, köör de Listenwessler för de lütten Husen ut un klick dann de Flintslagerhuus-Teken an.

source: The fisher working out of this fisher’s hut can’t find any fish in his work area.
target: De Fisker dat warkt bi deese Fiskeree hett keene Fiske tum Fangen.

source: Out of Fish Ponds
target: Hebb keene Polen mehr

source: Releases animals into the wild to steady the meat production.
target: Lett Deerten in de Wildernis löss, daarmit de Jäger immer wat to jagen hett.

source: The player with the color of the flag. If more than one client selected the same color, these share control over the player (‘shared kingdom mode’).
target: De Speler mit de Farv vun de Fahn. Wenn mehr as een Speler desülvige Farv utköört, deelen se de Kuntroll över deesen Speler (Speelaard »Riek in Stücken«).

source: The latter three can only be set by the hosting client by left-clicking the ‘type’ button of a player. Hosting players can also set the initialization of each player (the set of buildings, wares and workers the player starts with) and the tribe and team for computer players.
target: De lesten dree könen blot vun de Weert fastleggt worden, indeem he de »Aard«-Knoop vun eenem Speler mit de linken Muustaste anklickt. De Weert kann ok de Instellens för elkeen Speler (de Husen, Waren un Arbeiders wat de Speler mit anfangt) un de Volk un Klottje för künstelke Spelers.

source: The long trident is the first trident in the training of soldiers. It is produced in the weapon smithy and used in the dungeon – together with food – to train soldiers from attack level 0 to level 1.
target: De Lange Dreespitz is de eerste Wapen, de Soldaten bi’m Öven kriegen. ’t word in de Wapensmee produzeert un in Gefahrelken Gangen – tosamen mit Spiesen – bruukt, um Soldaten vun Angriff-Stand 0 up Stand 1 uttobilden.

source: This is the medium trident. It is produced in the weapon smithy and used by advanced soldiers in the dungeon – together with food – to train from attack level 1 to level 2.
target: Dat is de middelste Dreespitz. ’t word in de Wapensmee produzeert un in Gefahrelken Gangen – tosamen mit Spiesen – bruukt, um Soldaten vun Angriff-Stand 1 up Stand 2 uttobilden.

source: The double trident is one of the best tridents produced by the Atlantean weapon smithy. It is used in a dungeon – together with food – to train soldiers from attack level 2 to level 3.
target: De Dubbelte Dreespitz is eener vun de besten Dreespitzen, de de Atlantiske Wapensmee produzert. ’t word in Gefahrelken Gangen – tosamen mit Spiesen – bruukt, um Soldaten vun Angriff-Stand 2 up Stand 3 uttobilden.

source: This is the most dangerous weapon of the Atlantean military. Only the best of the best soldiers may use it. It is produced in the weapon smithy and used in the dungeon – together with food – to train soldiers from attack level 3 to level 4.
target: Dat is de gefahrelkste Wapen, de de Atlantiske Soldateree hett. Blot de besten Soldaten bruken ’t. ’t word in de Wapensmee produzeert un in Gefahrelken Gangen – tosamen mit Spiesen – bruukt, um Soldaten vun Angriff-Stand 3 up Stand 4 uttobilden.

source: Smokes meat and fish to feed the scouts and miners and to train soldiers in the dungeon and labyrinth.
target: Rökelt Fleesk un Fiss, um de Bespejers un Bargwarkskeerls to versörgen un Soldaten in Gefahrelken Gangen un Dwaalwegen to lehren.

source: After losing an important battle against the barbarians which lead to the loss of a big part of the Empire’s territory, Lutius leaves Fremil to start a new life. But his destiny takes his ship into a heavy storm, which nearly destroys it. Only with a lot of luck he manages to beach his damaged ship on an unknown desert strand and save his people. For now.
target: Nadeem he eene wichtige Slacht tegen de Willen Lüü un eenen groten Part vun de Land vun de Latiensken Riek verloren hett, verlett Lutjus Freemilt un begünnt een nejes Leven. Aver sien Schipp word vun de Slag in eenen Kohstörm föhrt un haast verneelt. Nix as Glück vergünnt hüm, mit de ramponeerten Schipp up eenen frömden Strand uptolopen un siene Lüü to redden. Vöreerst.

source: If the food supply is steady, the gold mine can produce one piece of gold ore in %s on average.
target: Wenn de Spiesen to rechter Tied ankomen, produzeert deeses Bargwark dör de Bank all %s Goldkluut.

source: A golden helmet protects soldiers. It is produced in the large armor smithy and used to train soldiers from health level 1 to level 2.
target: Een Goldener Helm schütt Soldaten. ’t word in de Groten Wapensmee produzeert un bruukt, um Soldaten vun Gesundheid-Stand 1 up Stand 2 uttobilden.

source: Here in the northern part, you only have a goldmine and a warehouse. While the miners are supplied well with food, there is no way to transport the gold ore to our smelting works in the southern part.
target: Hier im Noorden hest du nix as een Gold-Bargwark un een Kraamhuus. De Bargwarkskeerls kriggen Spiesen satt, aver wi könen de Goldkluten nich to de Smeltwarken im Süden transporteren.

source: If the food supply is steady, the deep gold mine can produce two pieces of gold ore in %s on average.
target: Wenn de Spiesen to rechter Tied ankomen, produzeert deeses Bargwark dör de Bank all %s twee Goldkluten.

source: A golden helmet protects soldiers. It is produced in the large armor smithy and used to train soldiers from health level 1 to level 2.
target: Een Goldener Helm schütt Soldaten. ’t word in de Groten Wapensmee produzeert un bruukt, um Soldaten vun Gesundheid-Stand 1 up Stand 2 uttobilden.

source: Your high wooden tower discovered an aggressor.
target: Dien Grote Holten Toorn hett Feinde to sehn kregen.

source: Your high wooden tower is under attack.
target: Feinde griepen dienen Groten Holten Toorn an.

source: Build a training camp, some barracks and an arena or colosseum to train your soldiers.
target: Bau een Övens-Lager, eene Kasern un eenen Ring of Groten Ring, um Soldaten uttobilden.

source: Your high tower discovered an aggressor.
target: Dien Grote Toorn hett Feinde to sehn kregen.

source: Your high tower is under attack.
target: Feinde griepen dienen Groten Toorn an.

source: Harvests special trees: ironwood, rubber and balsa.
target: Arnt Edelholten: Iesenholt, Gummi un Balsa.

source: Plants special trees: ironwood, rubber and balsa.
target: Plant Edelholten: Iesenholt, Gummi un Balsa.

source: Plants rare trees which are needed by the Amazons, like balsa, rubber and ironwood.
target: Plant de Edelholten, wat de Amazonen bruken: Balsa, Gummi un Iesenholt.

source: This is a hardened spear with a stone tip. It is produced in a stone workshop and used in a warriors’ gathering – together with food – to train soldiers from attack level 1 to level 2.
target: Deese haarte Pieke hett eene Tipp vun Flint. ’t word in de Steenwarkeree produzeert un in de Soldatsken-Versammeln – tosamen mit Spiesen – bruukt, um Soldatsken vun Angriff-Stand 1 up Stand 2 uttobilden.

source: The stone mine can produce one slab of granite in %s on average if the supply with rations is steady and the mine is not worn out.
target: De Steen-Bargwark produzeert dör de Bank all %s een Deel Flint, wenn de Versörgung good un dat Bargwark nich leeg is.

source:
‘The helmets forgéd by this smithy
Are widely known for looking pithy.’
target:
»De Helmen, wat dees’ Smede maakt
Worden nie im Stried verlacht.«

source: making a charcoal stack
target: eenen Köhler-Stapel uptoschichten

source: Burning Charcoal Stack
target: Köhler-Stapel

source: The charcoal burner’s house needs holes in the ground that were dug by a clay pit’s worker nearby to erect charcoal stacks in them.
target: De Köhleree bruukt Speden im Klei, de in de Naberskupp vun de Arbeider vun eener Lehmkuhl graven wurren. In deesen Speden worden Köhler-Stapels upschicht.

source: From the north we are endangered by a belligerent tribe, led by warlord Törver, that is rapidly building up its armies. They may soon have become too strong to be defeated.
target: Im Noorden droht uns een striedlevend Volk, wat Generaal Törver anföhrt, un wat siene Soldateree fix utbaut. Se worden bold to machtig worden, um se noch manntjen to könen.

source: The situation looks quite perilous and my advice is that we direct our efforts towards building up a strong army.
target: Dat all sücht bannig gefahrelk ut, un ick raad an, dat wi futtmaken, eene machtige Soldateree uptobauen.

source: Let’s hope that Lanissa – the warlord holding sway over that castle – has not discovered our movements yet. Perhaps we have a chance of conquering that mighty building without a bigger fight! However, it is essential that we capture it. It will be the key to our reign over this island!
target: Hopentlik hett uns Laniss’ – de Kummandantin, de dat Slött kuntrolleert – noch nich funnen. Villicht könen wi deesen gewaltigen Boo sünner grote Slachten innehmen! Wi mutten ’t driest innehmen. ’t is de Slötel tum Seggen över deese Insel!

source: Each player has a different obstacle to expansion, and there’s always more than one way to overcome it. While the AI can be defeated here without building a single ship, players are advised to make ports and shipyards a priority – expeditions are universally useful and are often the fastest way to gold deposits.
target: Elkeen Speler hett an anner Hinner tum wiederkomen, un ’t gifft immer mehr as eene Aard, daarmit klaartoworden. Künstelke Spelers könen hier sünner een eenziges Schipp manntjet worden, aver ick raad an, völe Muden un Warften to bauen – Söken sünd alltieden nützelk un meestens de fixeste Weg to Goldlagers.

source: Ensure the supply of building wares
target: De Versörgung mit Baumaterialien sekern

source: Supply Building Wares
target: Baumaterialien-Versörgung

source: Food is very important for mines and military training areas. Establish a well working food environment by building at least one farm, one blackroot farm and a mill. The two kinds of flour together with water from a well will be baked into bread in a bakery, so build a bakery and a well, too.
target: Spiesen sünd leep wichtig för Bargwarken un Övens-Boen för Soldaten. Bau eene gode Versörgung mit Spiesen up, indeem du tominnst eene Buurderee, eene Swartwuddel-Buurderee un eene Möhlen baust. De twee Aarden vun Mehl worden mit Water ut eener Well in eener Backeree to Brood backen, bau also ok eene Backeree un eene Well.

source: Build a shipyard close to the lake to start building ships
target: Bau eene Warft dicht bi de Meer, um Schippen to bauen

source: We spent the last week building two watchtowers on the mountains close to our landing area; and, of course, a hall for us all. We have very talented constructors in our group – still, the buildings do not match the art we had on Atlantis. I hope they will withstand the next rain. At least, the towers will warn us if a ship from Atlantis follows us and if the island is inhabited, we will see attackers a long time before they arrive.
target: Wi hebben in de leste Week twee Wachttoorns up de Bargen dicht bi de Kuntrei, waar wi lannt sünd, baut; un unatürelk eene Halle för uns all. Wi hebben bannig gode Baukeerls bi uns – aver de Husen sünd doch nich so düll as wat wi up Atlantis harren. Ick hoop, dat se de anner Regen överleven. Tominnst warnen uns de Toorns, wenn uns een Schipp vun Atlantis folgt, un wenn Lüü up de Insel leven, sehn wi Angriepers, lang ehr se daar sünd.

source: Our building infrastructure is finished and I spent some days making sure that everybody is working well together. Now, there are other pressing matters. I called Colionder, my personal cook, before me to get his help with sorting some things out.
target: Uns’ Bau-Weertskupp is kumpleet un ick hebb een paar Dagen daarmit verbrocht, uptopassen, dat all Lüü good tosamen warken. Nu gifft dat anner wichtige Dingen. Ick hebb Kojonder, mienen persönelken Kock, to mi ropen laten, um mit siener Hülp een paar Dinge klaar to maken.

source: May Satul warm you, Jundlina. My name is Opol, and I am the highest weaver of the guild abandoning Atlantis and Lutas with you. I come with sad news indeed: we have no more spidercloth. Not a single piece is to be found in our warehouses. Could you not help the weavers’ guild by arranging the building of a weaving mill and a spider farm? The spiders deliver the finest silk and we will produce the finest spidercloth from it.
target: Satuul sall Jo warmen, Jundlin’. Mien Naam is Öpoll, un ick bin de eerste Spinner vun de Gild. wat Atlantis un Luutas mit Jo verlaten hett. Ick komm mit bannig slechten Narichten: Wi hebben keenen Spinnenstoff mehr. Nich een enkelt Deel is noch in uns’ Kraamhusen över. Kannst Jo de Spinners nich helpen, indeem Jo eene Spinnweelmöhlen un eene Spinnentüchteree bauen lettst? De Spinnen produzeren de beste Sied, un wi maken daar de beste Spinnenstoff vun.

source: To set foot on this island, we must first find a building space where a port can be built. Explore the nearby coast line to find such a building plot.
target: Um de Insel to betreden, mutten wi toeerst Rüümte tum Bauen för eene Muu finnen. Försk de Küstenlienje dicht bi ut, um sülke Rüümte to finnen.

source: As our settlement is growing, we will need more space for all buildings. Expand our territory by building military buildings. Build some guardhouses and at least one tower for its larger view range.
target: As uns’ Dörp wasst bruken wi mehr Rüümte för all de Husen. Verwieder uns’ Gewest, indeem du Soldateree-Boen baust. Bau een paar Wahrders-Stuven un tominnst eenen Toorn um siene groter Sicht.

source: %s, may Satul warm you! We have made some progress in building up our tool industry.
target: %s, Satuul sall Jo warmen! Wi sünd mit de Upbauen vun uns’ Warktüüg-Versörgung wiederkomen.

source: May Satul warm you, Loftomor. Thank you for building such a great temple. Now we need to bring food and our most precious wares to the temple to make for satisfying sacrifices. And don’t forget that the initiates who will serve Satul to become his priestesses need golden tabards and diamonds.
target: Satuul sall Jo warmen, Loftomoor. Wees bedankt, dat Jo sülk eenen unbannig mojen Tempel baut hest. Nu mutten wi Spiesen un uns’ allerdüürsten Waren to de Tempel brengen, um se de Gott to sien Tofredenheid to opfern. Verget nich, dat de Anwahrders, well Satuul as Preestersken denen sallen, Goldene Kluften un Edelstenen bruken.

source: Start building mines on the mountain
target: Bau Bargwarken up de Barg

source: Other ways to produce food – different kinds of food – are fishers and farms. The wheat of the farms has to be processed with water in a bakery before it becomes edible. You can obtain water by building a well. For the best productivity, build it on a spot where your geologists have found a water source.
target: Anner Wege, Spiesen – anner Aarden vun Spiesen – to produzeren, sünd Fiskers un Buurdereen. De Weit vun Buurdereen mutt mit Water in eener Backeree verarbeidt worden, ehr man ’t eten kann. Am meesten Water kriggst du, indeem du eene Well an sülk eener Stee baust, waar een Schattsöker Water funnen hett.

source: Bigger and better buildings – including all military ones – require better building materials. They cannot be built out of simple logs – the logs have to be refined to blackwood by a wood hardener first. Always remember to build a wood hardener before you run out of blackwood, as without it you cannot expand.
target: Grote un betere Husen – un alle Soldateree-Boen – bruuken betere Baumaterialien. Se könen nich blot mit Boomstammen baut worden – de Boomstammen mutten eerst vun eener Holtharderee to Haartholt verbetert worden. Bau immer tiedig eene Holtharderee, denn wenn du keen Haartholt mehr hest, kannst du dien Gewest nich mehr vergrotern.

source: You can obtain water by building a well upon a water source, which your geologists can discover when you send them to any flag that is not on a mountain.
target: Du kannst Water vun eener Well kriegen, de up eener Quell baut word; Schattsökers finnen Quellen, wenn du se to elkeen Fahn schickst, de nich up eenem Barg staht.

source: Coal can be obtained by building a charcoal kiln or a coal mine. Burning charcoal out of logs is slow. You should only build a charcoal kiln when no coal is available.
target: Köhle kriggst du, indeem du eene Holtköhl-Branneree of een Köhle-Bargwark baust. Holtköhl ut Boomstammen to brannen is langsaam; daarum sallst du Holtköhl-Brannereen blot dann bauen, wenn ’t keene Köhle in Bargen gifft.

source: To attack an enemy, you must click on the door of an adversary’s military building. A menu will pop up allowing you to select the number of soldiers that should attack. When you are ready with setting the number, click on the cross (‘Start Attack’).
target: Um eenen Feind antogriepen, klick de Döör vun eenem Soldateree-Boo vun dienem Feind an. Een Fenster kummt lett sik sehn, waar du utkören sallst, wo völe Soldaten angriepen sallen. Wenn du de Tahl sett hest, klick dat Krüüz (»Angriepen«) an.

source: Finally! The fortress has just been completed, so the entrance to our settlement should be safe for now. For the future, we might think on building some more fortifications like barriers and towers at the passages, but for now we can take a deep breath.
target: Uplest! De Schanz is nu kumpleet, de Ingang to uns’ Dörp is nu wull seker. In Tokunft sallen wi beter noch mehr Uppassen un Toorns bi de Passen bauen, aver eerst maal könen wi Aam halen.

source: But unfortunately the logs are useless for repairing our ship – we need to turn them into planks, which are needed by every ship and every bigger building too. So we should build a sawmill – as soon as we have enough space for this.
target: Leider sünd Boomstammen unnütz, um dat Schipp to repareren – wi mutten Planken daarut maken, de wi för ’t Schipp un all grotern Husen bruuken. Also sallen wi eene Saagmöhlen bauen – sobold wi daar genoog Rüümte för hebben.

source: Good news! Today our wood economy was completed. Now we can be sure that we will have enough wood for our future building projects.
target: Hunnert! Uns’ Holt-Weertskupp is nu kumpleet. Nu weten wi, dat wi för neje Bauvörhebbens genoog Holt hebben.

source: That’s good. The first big military building is complete and the mining infrastructure is getting better and better. Now we should think about preparing ourselves for battle.
target: Hunnert. De eerste grote Soldateree-Boo is beschickt, un de Bargwarks-Weertskupp word immer beter. Nu könen wi uns för de Slacht torechtmaken.

source: Produce cloth for building our first ship
target: Produzeer Stoff för uns’ eerstes Schipp

source: Now we truly can look forward to building some ships. So, we should build a shipyard as well.
target: Nu könen wi würrelk bold anfangen, eenige Schippen to bauen. Wi sallen daarum ok eene Warft bauen.

source: So, we need more cloth to finally be able to build ships. But there is no space on the island for building a whole economy to produce cloth. Therefore, we need to build the necessary wares step by step.
target: Wi bruken also mehr Stoff, um ennelk Schippen bauen to könen. Aver ’t gifft nich genoog Rüümte up de Insel, um eene kumpleete Weertskupp, um Stoff to produzeren, uptobauen. Daarum mutten wi de nödigen Waren Stapp för Stapp sammeln.

source: Now that we have all resources ready for building a ship, we should explore the surrounding islands.
target: Nu dat wi alle Materialien paraat hebben, um een Schipp to bauen, sallen wi de Inseln umto utförsken.

source: Salve Lutius. While talking to all our brave builders, they told me that they have to use all our remaining gold for building the port. So, we won’t have any gold left after our port is built.
target: Salve Lutius. As ick mit uns’ dappern Baulüü redt hebb, hebben se mi vertellt, dat se all dat Gold, wat wi över hetten, bruukt hebben, um de Muu to bauen. Wi hebben also keen Gold mehr över, wenn de Muu beschickt is.

source: If there are difficulties with building all the buildings needed, we should think about all we have learned so far. We can cut down all the rocks. We should perhaps optimize our roads to free up some building sites, or even dismantle some military buildings to obtain more space for our economy.
target: Wenn ’t nich gaht, all de nödigen Husen to bauen, mutten wi över dat nadenken, wat wi bit nu lehrt hebben. Wi könen all de Stenen ofslagen. Wi könen villicht uns’ Stratennett verbetern, um wat Rüümte för Husen freei to maken, of ok een paar Soldateree-Boen plattrieten, um mehr Rüümte för uns’ Weertskupp to kriegen.

source: I’m just kidding. Of course we should spare as much gold as we can for building an arena and other buildings to train our soldiers.
target: Blot Spaaß. Natürelk mutten wi so vööl Gold as wi könen upheven, um eenen Ring uns anner Boen, um uns’ Soldaten uttobilden, to bauen.

source: Lutius. I really appreciate that you and Saledus are so concerned about our security. But I think we could use the little space on this island better than by building a lot of military buildings.
target: Lutjus. Ick acht dat würrelk, dat du un Saledus so besörgt um uns’ Sekerheid sünd. Aver ick gloov, wi können dat bietje Rüümte up deeser Insel beter bruken, as Bülten vun Soldateree-Boen to bauen.

source: But be careful not to waste any bigger building spots.
target: Aver pass up, dat du de groten Rüümte nich verklüngelst.

source: Remember to check the messages and the building status labels for unproductive buildings.
target: Vergeet nich, in de Narichten un Husen-Tostand-Texten natokieken, um unnütze Husen to finnen.

source: Except, maybe we should restrict the input of all buildings which consume any of our building materials to zero. Or maybe we could even pause the production in all bigger buildings and get the workers some rest until we have produced some of their input wares.
target: Blot, för de Husen, wat Baumaterialien bruken, sallen wi dat Lager daarför beter up null setten. Of dat Produzeren in all grotern Husen anhollen un de Arbeiders ruhen laten, bit wi de Waren, wat se bruken, produzeert hebben.

source: Now we can start building farms to produce the beer which our miners need so desperately. Furthermore, the plans have enabled us to upgrade our old farms to get to work again.
target: Nu könen wi Buurdereen bauen, um dat Beer to produzeren, wat uns’ Bargwarkskeerls vun Nood bruken. Un de Planen maken dat ok mögelk, dat wi de ollen Buurdereen utbauen, daarmit se weer warken.

source: But this will be some hard work still. For now, we should start by building some houses for our fishermen. As all the fish has been caught at our coast, we should try our luck in the eastern part of our territory.
target: Aver dat is noch een Halswark bit daarhen. Eerst maal sallen wi een paar Husen för uns’ Fiskers bauen. All de Fisse an de Küst sünd al fangen, also laat uns uns’ Glück in de oostelken Deel vun uns’ Gewest söken.

source: Amalea restricts the building possibilities…
target: Amalee’ minnerseert de kansen tum Bauen …

source: Therefore I took the freedom to restrict our current building options to the lumberjack’s house until we have gained enough building materials by dismantling the ineffective buildings.
target: Daarum hebb ick mi verlöövt, uns’ List vun Husen tum Bauen up nix as de Boomhaueree to minnern, bit wi genoog Baumaterialien sammelt hebben, indeem wi de unnützen Husen plattrieten.

source: This is as good a place as any to start building our new home. First of all, we must ensure a stable supply of basic building materials.
target: Deese Stee is so good as elkeen anner, um uns neje Heimaad to gründen. Toeerst mutten wi uns um eene gode Versörgung mit allen Baumaterialien kümmern.

source: I advise to build all those buildings within a short distance of each other, and to construct two warehouses nearby: One should be set to store only weapons, armor, ores, metal and coal; the other to store building materials.
target: Ick raad an, dat all deese Husen dicht binanner baut worden, un twee Kraamhusen in de Naberskupp: För eens sall fastleggt worden, dat ’t nix as Wapen, Panzers, Kluten, Metallen un Köhle verwahrt; de anner sall Baumaterialien upbewahren.

source: The scouts informed me that the enemy can’t build towers. We could build a fortress, which is the building that will push the border as far east as possible in one go. The enemy will only be able to see it if they build a fortress right at the border.
target: De Bespejers hebben mi seggt, dat de Feind keene Toorns bauen kann. Wi könen eene Schanz bauen; dat is de Boo, wat de Grenz so wied na Oosten schufft as dat mitmaal gaht. De Feind kann se blot dann sehn, wenn he eene Schanz dicht bi de Grenz baut.

source: I almost forgot in this haste – wherever we will land, we’ll need some construction materials to get started, and soldiers to secure and expand our new colony. Even after loading the expedition, the ship should have enough free space for a few wares and workers. On top of that, there should be room for up to %d soldier, if nobody minds being all crammed together. Let’s send some building supplies and our best men to the port when it’s completed, to get ready to embark when we set sail!
target: Ick hebb dat in deeser Iel haast vergeten – waar wi ok lannen sallen, wi bruken Materialien tum Bauen, um mit de Upbauen vun uns’ neei Dörp to begünnen, un Soldaten, um uns’ nejes Dörp to sekern und to vergrotern. Ok nadeem wi de Söök laden hebben, könen wi bit to %d Soldat up uns’ Schipp mitnehmen, wenn ’t hör nix utmaakt, all vollstoppt to wesen. Laat uns een paar Baumaterialien un uns’ besten Keerls tur Muu schicken, wenn se kumpleet is, daarmit se an Boord gahn könen, wenn wi lössseilen!

source: I almost forgot in this haste – wherever we will land, we’ll need some construction materials to get started, and soldiers to secure and expand our new colony. Even after loading the expedition, the ship should have enough free space for a few wares and workers. On top of that, there should be room for up to %d soldiers, if nobody minds being all crammed together. Let’s send some building supplies and our best men to the port when it’s completed, to get ready to embark when we set sail!
target: Ick hebb dat in deeser Iel haast vergeten – waar wi ok lannen sallen, wi bruken Materialien tum Bauen, um mit de Upbauen vun uns’ neei Dörp to begünnen, un Soldaten, um uns’ nejes Dörp to sekern und to vergrotern. Ok nadeem wi de Söök laden hebben, könen wi bit to %d Soldaten up uns’ Schipp mitnehmen, wenn ’t hör nix utmaakt, all vollstoppt to wesen. Laat uns een paar Baumaterialien un uns’ besten Keerls tur Muu schicken, wenn se kumpleet is, daarmit se an Boord gahn könen, wenn wi lössseilen!

source: My scouts no longer report any signs of living creatures nearby. We will start building our new home here.
target: Miene Bespejers hebben keene levigen Beesten mehr in de Naberskupp funnen. Wi fangen hier an, uns’ neje Heimaad to bauen.

source: We must start by building all the basic buildings. I see no mountains nearby where we might mine coal. We’d better build a charcoal kiln to burn logs into charcoal. We improve the kilns with clay so they don’t consume so much wood. Our neighbors used to envy us for this clever technique, which they couldn’t copy.
target: Wi mutten daarmit begünnen, all de eenfachen Husen to bauen. Ick seh keene Bargen in de Naberskupp, waar wi Köhle ofboen könen. Wi sallen beter eene Holtköhl-Branneree bauen, um Köhle ut Boomstammen to maken. Wi verbetern de Brannereen mit Lehm, daarmit se nich so vööl Holt bruken. Uns’ Nabers hebben uns för deese kloke Technik beniedt, wat se nich namaken kunnen.

source: However, we can already start focusing on recruiting and training soldiers. We can now afford to use metal for weapons, helmets and garments. I propose building armor smithies, a barracks, a training arena and a tailor’s shop now.
target: Aver wi könen al begünnen, uns um dat Anhüren un Utbilden vun Soldaten to kümmern. Wi könen uns nu günnen, Metall för Wapen, Helms un Kluften to bruken. Ick slaa vör, nu Wapensmeden, eene Kasern, eene Övens-Ring un eene Sniederee to bauen.

source: We have conquered the port! We are already building a ship, and then, we will finally be travelling to the actual far North. Although we still heard no news of Reebaud, I am confident that we will find him soon. Then he will grant us aid, and I will reconquer Föhr from the usurper Atterdag!
target: Wi hebben de Muu innhomen! Wi bauen all een Schipp, un dann reisen wi uplest all de Weg tum Noorden. Wi hebben twaar noch keene Naricht vun Reebaud, aver ick bün getroost, dat wi hüm bold finnen. Dann word he uns hülpen, un ick haal mi Föhr vun de Rover Atterdag torügg!

source: If you decide you do not want to build a road at this time, you can cancel road building by clicking on the starting flag of the road and selecting the abort symbol.
target: Wenn du jüüst doch keene Straat bauen willst, kannst du dat Stratenbauen ofbreken, indeem du up de Anfangs-Fahn klickst un dat Ofbreken-Teken utköörst.

source: You can enter road building mode for any flag by left-clicking on a flag and selecting the road building symbol.
target: Du kannst mit de Straten-Bauen vun elkeen Fahn anfangen, indeem du eene Fahn mit de linken Muustaste anklickst un dat Straat-Bauen-Teken utköörst.

source: Excellent! To enter road building mode for any flag, left-click on a flag and select the road building symbol.
target: Hunnert! Du kannst mit de Straten-Bauen vun elkeen Fahn anfangen, indeem du eene Fahn mit de linken Muustaste anklickst un dat Straat-Bauen-Teken utköörst.

source: Now, about this road. I’ll enter the road building mode and then make it longer by one field at a time by left-clicking multiple times on neighboring fields for perfect control over the route the road takes, like so:
target: Ennelk de Straat. Ick maak mi klaar tum Stratenbauen un maak de Straat langer um een Feld up eenmaal, indeem ick mennigmaal mit de linke Muustaste up een benabert Feld klick. So kann ick de Verloop vun de Straat akkeraat fastleggen. Also so:

source: In order to show or hide the building census labels, you can select the ‘Show Census’ / ‘Hide Census’ entry from the ‘Show / Hide’ menu on the bottom, or press the ‘%s’ key on the keyboard.
target: Um de Namen vun Husen to wiesen of verbargen, kannst du de Indrag »Namen vun Husen wiesen« / »Namen vun Husen verbargen« im »Wiesen / Verbargen«-Menü am unnern Rand utkören, of de Handigtast »%s« up de Knöppboord bruken.

source: Show the building status
target: Wies de Husen-Tostand

source: In order to show or hide the building status labels, you can select the ‘Show Status’ entry from the ‘Show / Hide’ menu on the bottom, or press the ‘%s’ key on the keyboard.
target: Um de Tahlen över Husen to wiesen of verbargen, kannst du de Indrag »Husen-Tostand wiesen« / »Husen-Tostand verbargen« im »Wiesen / Verbargen«-Menü am unnern Rand utkören, of de Handigtast »%s« up de Knöppboord bruken.

source: Build a military building on your border. Choose the one you like most.
target: Bau een Soldateree-Boo dicht bi de Grenz. Köör ut, welkes du am leevsten willst.

source: The sentry is the only military site that fits on a small building plot. If your lumberjack has cleared enough space, you can also build a bigger military building.
target: De Wachters-Kamer is de eenzigst Soldateree-Boo, wat up Rüümte för lütte Husen passt. Wenn dien Boomhauer genoog Rüümte freeimaakt hett, kannst du ok een groter Soldateree-Boo bauen.

source: Remember that big buildings (green icon) cannot be built on small (red) or medium (yellow) building plots, but buildings can be built on a building plot that provides more space than they need. You should always keep that in mind when you search for a suitable place.
target: Vergeet nich, dat grote Husen (grönes Teken) nich up lütten (rood) of middelmatigen (geel) Steden baut worden könen, aver Husen könen up Steden baut worden, de mehr Rüümte as nödig hebben. Daar sallst du immer an denken, wenn du eene gode Stee utsöchst.

source: Expanding is as simple as building a military building at the edge of your territory. The Barbarians have a selection of four different military buildings: sentries, barriers, towers and fortresses. The bigger the building, the more expensive it is to build, but the more land it will conquer around itself and the more soldiers can be stationed there. The buildings also vary in their vision range: buildings with a tower see farther than others.
target: Vergrotern is ganz licht: Du baust een Soldateree-Boo dicht bi de Grenz vun dien Gewest. De Willen Lüü hebben veer verschedene Soldateree-Boen: Wachters-Kamers, Uppassen, Toorns un Schanzen. So groter de Boo is, so dürer is ’t, aver ’t nimmt mehr Land in un kann mehr Soldaten upnehmen. De Boen hebben unglieke Utsichtswiedten: Boen mit Toorns sehn wieder as anners.

source: As soon as a military building is manned, it will extend your land. I will tell you more about military buildings in another tutorial.
target: Sobold een Soldateree-Boo besett is, vergrotert ’t dien Gewest. In eener annern Inföhren vertell ick di mehr över Soldateree-Boen.

source: In this scenario, I’m going to tell you about soldiers, their training and their profession: warfare. Although Widelands is about building up, not burning down, there is an enemy you sometimes have to defeat. Yet warfare is mainly focused on economics, not on military strategies, and its mechanics deserve explanation.
target: In deese Inföhren verklaar ick di Soldaten, hör Utbildung un hör Beruf: Krieg. In Widelands gaht ’t um Upbauen, nich Ofbrannen, aver of un an mutt du eenen Feind manntjen. Bi’m Krieg gaht ’t in ’t Geheel um de Weertskupp, nich taktiske Dingen, aver Slachten mutten doch verklaart worden.

source: There is another way how you can control the strength of a military building: by the number of soldiers stationed there. Just click on the arrow buttons to decrease or increase the desired number of soldiers. Every building has a maximum capacity. In case of the barrier, it is five, for example.
target: Du kannst de Foss vun eenem Soldateree-Boo ok anners fastsetten: indeem du de Tahl vun Soldaten, de hier wohnen, ännerst. Klick de Piel-Knopen an, um de wünsket Tahl to verhogen of minnern. Elkeen Boo hett eene hoogste Tahl vun Steden. To ’n Bispööl hett een Uppass fiev.

source: However, destroying a military building is always linked with a risk: the land is still yours, but it is no longer protected. Any enemy that builds his own military sites can take over that land without a fight, causing your buildings to burst into flames. Furthermore, some parts of the land can now be hidden under the fog of war. You should therefore only dismantle military buildings deep inside your territory where you are safe from enemies.
target: Een Soldateree-Boo oftobrannen is immer riskant: Dat Land höört di noch, is aver nich mehr schütt. Een Feind, de sülvst een Soldateree-Boo baut, kann dat Land sünner Stried innehmen. Diene Husen brannen dann of. Butendeem sünd villicht Parten vun dienem Land dann unner de Kriegsnevel verstoken. Du sallst Soldateree-Boen daarher blot dann plattrieten, wenn se deep in dien Gewest sünd, waar keene Feinde henkomen.

source: The citadel can house 12 soldiers, and it is the biggest military building the Barbarians can build. It also costs a lot of resources and takes a long time to build. It is most suited to guard strategically important points like constricted points or mountains.
target: Dat Kasteel hett Steden för 12 Soldaten un is de grootste Soldateree-Boo, wat de Willen Lüü bauen könen. ’t köst mennig Materialien un dat Bauen düürt lang. ’t is good gadelk, um taktisk dürable Steden as enge Passen of Bargen to schütten.

source: Ports are built like normal buildings, but are only available on blue port spaces. Just click on a field with the icon and the building menu automatically offers you to build a port.
target: Muden baust du as anner Husen, aver se sünd blot up de blauen Rüümten för Muden paraat. Klick een Feld mit de Teken an un dat Bau-Menü büddt di eene Muu an.

source: On this map, there is no enemy to fear. In other games, you should make building one or two military fortifications around your new colonies a priority.
target: Up deeser Kaart gifft dat keene Feinde. In anner Spelen sallst du lever fix een paar Soldateree-Boen um diene nejen Dörper bauen.

source: Now it’s your turn: Build a gold mine on the mountain in the south and connect it to the main land by building waterways over the streams.
target: Nu büst du dran: Bau een Gold-Bargwark up de Barg im Süden un verbinn ’t mit de Höövdland, indeem du Prielen över de Beken baust.

source: Build a gold mine on the mountain in the south, and connect it to the mainland by building waterways over the streams.
target: Bau een Gold-Bargwark up de Barg im Süden un verbinn ’t mit de Höövdland, indeem du Prielen över de Beken baust.

source: Open the building statistics window for an overview over the buildings you have.
target: Maak dat Fenster för Tahlen över Husen op, um fix to sehn, wat för Husen du hest.

source: This is the building statistics window. It shows you all buildings you can own, sorted by their size.
target: Dat us dat Fenster för Tahlen över Husen. ’t wiest du all de Husen, de du hest, na Grött sorteert.

source: ‘2/4’ below your sentry: For military buildings, the stationed soldiers are shown instead of a productivity. You want to have four soldiers in your sentries, but only two soldiers are stationed in this kind of building. This leaves two vacant positions – we really need more soldiers.
target: »2/4« unner diener Wachters-Kamer: För Soldateree-Boen wiest dat Fenster de Tahl vun Soldaten un nich de Wöörde. Du willst veer Soldaten in dienen Wachters-Kamerken hebben, hest aver blot twee Soldaten in deesen Husen. ’t gifft also twee lege Steden – wi bruken absolut mehr Soldaten.

source: If you don’t have any building of a particular building type, it will be shown greyed out.
target: Husen, wo du keene vun hest, worden grau wiest.

source: Widelands records every game you play in two files. One of these files has a .wrpl.wgf extension and contains an initial savegame. The other file has a .wrpl extension and contains all commands that were issued by all players, such as building a road or attacking an enemy. The rest of the filenames will tell you the time you started the game.
target: Widelands nimmt elkeen Speel, wat du spöölst, in twee Dateien up. Eene daarvun hett eenen Naam, de up .wrpl.wgf ennt, un een sekert Speel vum Anfang hett. De Naam vun de anner Datei ennt up .wrpl; daarin sünd all Befehlen, de Spelers geven hebben, to ’n Bispööl eene Straat to bauen of eenen Feind antogriepen. De Rest vum Naam vun de Datei seggt di, wann dat Speel anfangen hett.

source: Most enhanced buildings need experienced workers. Do not enhance a building unless you have the necessary workers available.
target: De meesten utbauten Husen bruken Arbeiders mit Erfahrung. Bau de Husen eerst dann ut, wenn du de nödigen Arbeiders hest.

source: The building process will only start after a road is built to the construction site.
target: Dat Beschicken begünnt eerst, wenn eene Straat tur Baustee föhrt.

source: Be sure to send a geologist to survey sites before building a well or a mine.
target: Schick immer eenen Schattsöker, um de Stee to unnersöken, bevör du eene Well of een Bargwark baust.

source: Your territory can be expanded by building various military buildings – Sentry, Fortress, Blockhouse, etc.
target: Du kannst dien Gewest groter maken, indeem du Soldateree-Boen baust – to ’n Bispööl Wachters-Kamern, Schanzen of Toorns.

source: Well done! We will soon start producing logs, which we will need for building more buildings.
target: Hunnert! Bold produzeren wi Boomstammen, wat wi bruken, um noch mehr Husen to bauen.

source: Well done! We will soon start producing granite, which we will need for building more buildings.
target: Hunnert! Bold produzeren wi Flint, wat wi bruken, um noch mehr Husen to bauen.

source: The stonecutter working at this stonecutter’s hut can’t find any rocks in her work area.
target: De Flinthauerske, de bi deese Flinthauerske-Kaat warkt, hett keene Stenen tum Ofboen.
