source: The fisher working out of this fisher’s house can’t find any fish in his work area. Remember that you can increase the number of existing fish by building a fish breeder’s house.
target: De Fisker dat warkt bi deese Fiskeree hett keene Fiske tum Fangen. Du kannst de Fiske vermehren, wenn du een Fisstüchteree baust.

source: The stonecutter’s hut needs rocks to cut within the work area.
target: De Flinthauerske-Kaat bruukt Stenen tum Slaan in de Arbeidsgewest.

source: The woodcutter’s hut needs trees to fell within the work area.
target: De Boomslageree bruukt Bomen tum Umkappen in de Arbeidsgewest.

source: With three soldiers we can achieve an optimal balance between military power and building cost.
target: Mit dree Soldaten kriegen wi de beste Utgliek tüsken Soldateree-Macht un Baukösten.

source: Notes on the building instructions
target: Wenk up de Bau-Instruksjes

source: Toggle building visibility
target: Sicht up Husen wiesen of verbargen

source: Start building road after placing a flag
target: Na de Fahnenbauen Straat bauen

source: Cancel road and start building waterway
target: Straat nich bauen, Priel bauen

source: Cancel waterway and start building road
target: Priel nich bauen, Straat bauen

source: Start building a road after placing a flag.
target: Na de Fahnenbauen Straat bauen.

source: A building is being dismantled at this dismantle site, returning some of the resources that were used during this building’s construction to your tribe’s stores.
target: Hier word een Huus plattreten, um eenige Waren torüggtokriegen, de tum Bauen verwendt wurren.

source: As your road network gets longer and more complicated, you should employ horses to help out your carriers. Horses are bred at horse farms using water and corn. A warehouse will also help to ensure that your transportation system does not collapse.
target: As dien Stratennett groter un kumplizeerter word, sallst du Peer in Deenst stellen, um dienen Lastendragers to helpen. Peer worden in Peertüchtereen mit Water un Mais tücht. Een Kraamhuus helpt ok, dat dien Stratennett nich tosamenbreckt.

source: May Satul warm you, Jundlina. My name is Opol, and I am the highest weaver of the guild abandoning Atlantis and Lutas with you. I come with sad news indeed: we have no more spidercloth. Not a single piece is to be found in our warehouses. Could you not help the weavers’ guild by arranging the building of a weaving mill and a spider farm? The spiders deliver the finest silk and we will produce the finest spidercloth from it.
target: Satuul sall Jo warmen, Jundlin’. Mien Naam is Öpoll, un ick bin de eerste Spinner vun de Gild. wat Atlantis un Luutas mit Jo verlaten hett. Ick komm mit bannig slechten Narichten: Wi hebben keenen Spinnenstoff mehr. Nich een enkelt Deel is noch in uns’ Kraamhusen över. Kannst Jo de Spinners nich helpen, indeem Jo eene Spinnweelmöhlen un eene Spinnentüchteree bauen lettst? De Spinnen produzeren de beste Sied, un wi maken daar de beste Spinnenstoff vun.

source: May Satul warm you, Jundlina. Have you considered mining for resources in the mountains around us? We are running short of quartz and diamonds for our buildings. Also, we could use more iron, gold and especially coal. If we find an ample supply of those commodities, we could start producing weapons and tools; this would help enormously. Of course, we would need smelters, a weapon smithy, an armor smithy and a toolsmithy. And maybe even more.
target: Satuul sall Jo warmen, Jundlin’. Hest Jo al överleggt, of wi in de Bargen um uns Mineraale ofboen sallen? Wi hebben bold keen Blinkerflint un Edelstenen för uns’ Husen mehr. Un wi bruken ok mehr Iesen, Gold un vör allem Köhl. Wenn wi eene gode Versörgen för deese Schatten finnen, könen wi begünnen, Wapen un Warktüüg to produzeren, wat uns bannig vööl helpen word. Daarto bruken wi natürelk Smeltwarken, eene Wapensmee, eene Panzersmee un eene Warktüügsmee. Un villicht noch mehr.

source: People are complaining about crowded streets and slow transportation. We need to help out our carriers on the roads. I have decided to build a horse farm so that the horses can help with the heavy wares.
target: De Lüü beswaaren sik, dat de Straten to besig sünd un dat Transporteren to langsaam gaht. Wi mutten de Lastendragers up de Straten helpen. Ick will eene Peertüchteree bauen, daarmit de Peers mit de swaren Waren helpen könen.

source: But they fear that the war around Al’thunran will set an end to this life. Therefore, they have decided to join us, hoping that we can help each other.
target: Aver se sünd bang, dat de Krieg um Alltunraan deeses Leven ennt. Daarum wullen se sik uns ansluten; se hopen, dat wi eenanner helpen könen.

source: As your roads grow longer and your economy bigger, you should make good use of your oxen to help transport wares more quickly.
target: As diene Straten langer un diene Weertskupp groter word, sallst du diene Ossen bruken, daarmit Waren fixer transporteert worden.

source: Our mining economy seems to work fine, that is already good news! Anyway, there are still a lot of men and women waiting in our hall to get a task, so they can help our soldiers to prepare for the war to come.
target: Uns’ Bargwark-Weertskupp löppt nu good, dat is düll! Aver dat gifft noch völe Lüü ins uns’ Raadhuus, wat Upgaven kriegen wollen, also könen se uns’ Soldaten helpen, sik up de Krieg, wat bold kummt, vörtobereiden.

source: Lower the demand for marble columns in the economy settings to four. This will help to save some marble for buildings.
target: Minner de Nafraag för Marmelpielers in de Weertskupp-Instellens to veer. Dann blievt uns mehr Marmel för Husen över.

source: Yes my fellow soldiers, we have done it! We have met all the challenges that were put in front of us. But my heart is still with our home. We shall set sail as soon as possible to help defend the Empire from the Barbarian tribe.
target: Jau, miene Soldaten-Fründe, wi hebben ’t klaar brocht! Wi hebben all de Rutföderungen överwunnen, de vör uns laggen. Aver mien Hart is noch to Huus. Wi sallen tur See fahren, sobold wi nu könen, um dat Riek tegen dat Wille Volk mit to verteidigen.

source: In the meantime, it might help to build a charcoal kiln for buffering any mining shortfalls with charcoal. But be careful to ensure a continuous log supply afterwards.
target: Tüskendör is dat villicht good, eene Holtköhl-Branneree to bauen, um de Köhl-Versörgung to sekern. Pass aver up, dat de Branneree alltieden genoog Boomstammen kriggt.

source: Ave, Lutius! If you want us to help you, you first have to worship our goddess Vesta. Therefore deliver 35 sheaves of wheat and 15 amphoras of wine to prepare a worthy sacrifice for her.
target: Ave, Lutjus! Wenn wi jo helpen sallen, muttst du eerst uns’ Gottin Vesta ehren. Liefer uns 35 Bünsels Weit un 15 Potten Wien, um eene gode Gaav för se torechttomaken.

source: We will need a barracks, of course; a reindeer farm to produce fur, and a sewing room to sew the fur into garments. The reindeer farm produces some meat as a by-product of fur, and it also trains reindeer to help our carriers on busy roads.
target: Wi bruken eene Kasern, klaar; eene Sneeihirsktüchteree um Fell to produzeren, un eene Naiheree, um Kluften ut de Fell to naihen. De Sneeihirsktüchteree produzeert een bietjet Fleesk, wenn se Fell maakt, un se lehrt eenige Sneeihirsken, dat se uns’ Lastendragers up besigen Straten helpen.

source: You have completed this mission. You may move on to the next scenario now to help us build a new home, far from the false God’s vengeful reach…
target: Du hest deese Rutfödderung ofsloten. Du kannst nu de token Rutfödderung anfangen un uns helpen, eene neje Heimaad uptobauen, wied weg vun de haatsken Macht vun de falsken Gott …

source: The ‘Wares’ tab shows information about the wares that your tribe needs, including a short help text, a list of buildings that produce each ware, the needed wares to produce it and where the ware is consumed.
target: De Listenwessler »Waren« hett Informationen över all de Waren, de dien Volk bruukt. För elkeen Waar gifft ’t een körte Text un Listen mit all Husen, de deese Waar produzeren of bruken.

source: This was the last tutorial I had prepared for you. I’ve now taught you everything I know. There are still secrets hidden in this world even I don’t know about. I will now search for a quiet place to spend my sunset years. If you have still questions, the Widelands community will surely help you. You can find it at:
target: Dat is de leste Inföhren, de ick för di maakt hebb. Ick hebb di nu all lehrt, wat ick weet. ’t gifft noch alltied Geheimnissen in deese Welt, de ok ick nich kenn. Ick söök nu eene moje Stee tum verpuusten. Wenn du noch Fragen hest, helpt du wiss de Widelands-Gemeenskupp. Du finnst se unner:

source: Tapirs help to carry items along busy roads. They are reared in a tapir farm.
target: Tapiren dragen Waren över besige Straten. Se worden in de Tapirtüchteree tücht.

source: Horses help to carry items along busy roads. They are reared in a horse farm.
target: Peer dragen Waren över besige Straten. Se worden in de Peertüchteree tücht.

source: Oxen help to carry items along busy roads. They are reared in a cattle farm.
target: Ossen dragen Waren över besige Straten. Se worden in de Ossentüchteree tücht.

source: Donkeys help to carry items along busy roads. They are reared in a donkey farm.
target: Langohren dragen Waren över besige Straten. Se worden in de Langohrtüchteree tücht.

source: Reindeer help to carry items along busy roads. They are reared in a reindeer farm.
target: Sneeihirsken dragen Waren över besige Straten. Se worden in de Sneeihirsktüchteree tücht.

source: If you wish to help us translate, please visit %s
target: Wenn du mit de Översetten helpen willst, besöök bidde %s

source: Create syncstream dump files to help debug network games.
target: Sync-Streamen in Internett-Speelen schrieven, um Verschuvens to unnersöken.

source: You have completed the last mission of the Barbarian tutorial campaign. You may continue playing if you wish, otherwise move on to the next campaign.
target: Du hest de leste Rutfödderung in deeser Riege ofsloten. Wenn du willst, kannst du wiederspölen, anners de token Rutfödderungs-Riege anfangen.

source: The message window is central to fully controlling your tribe’s fortune. However, you will get a lot of messages in a real game. To keep your head straight, you should try to keep the inbox empty.
target: Dat Narichtenfenster is wichtig, um de Tokunft vun dienem Volk to bestimmen. In eenem echten Speel kriggst du bannig völe Narichten. Um de Överblick to behollen, sallst du lesene Narichten wegdoon.

source: You can build the port either on the easternmost tip of the island or in the place where the enemy’s headquarters stood.
target: Du kannst de Muu of daar bauen, waar dat Raadhuus vun de Feinden stunn, of on de oostelke Spitz vun de Hallig.

source: Peace, Chieftain Reebaud! I will start with the colonization of the island straight away.
target: Free, Mienheer Reebaud! Ick fang stracks mit de Besiedeln vun de Hallig an.

source: The island is flooding!
target: De Hallig floodt!

source: His God has granted his wish! The ocean is rising! The island is almost flat – we will all drown!
target: Sien Gott kummt sienem Will na! De See riest! De Hallig is binah even – wi mutten all verdrinken!

source: Despair not, I did espy some hope! The easternmost tip of the island, as well as the space where the fiends’ headquarters stood, seems well suited to build a port on. If we manage to construct a ship, and fill it with all we need to build a new settlement, we may be able to escape.
target: Vertwiefel nich, ick hebb wat Hoop! De Oostspitz vun de Hallig on ok de Stee, waar dat Raadhuus vun de Feinden stunn, düchten mi gadelk, eene Muu to bauen. Wenn wi ’t schaffen, een Schipp to bauen, un ’t mit all de Waren füllen, de wi bruken, um een nejes Dörp to gründen, könen wi villicht utrieten.

source: The map has been generated. Please double-check the player starting positions to make sure that your carriers won’t drown, or be stuck on an island or on top of a mountain.
target: De Kaart is fardig. Bidde kiek na, of de Anfangs-Steden vun de Spelers good sünd un de Lüü nich verdrinken of up ’n Barg fastsitten.

source: This is offering us more options to get the shambles in our economy solved.
target: Nu hebben wi betere Kansen, de Problemen in uns’ Weertskupp oftohelpen.

source: Therefore I took the freedom to restrict our current building options to the lumberjack’s house until we have gained enough building materials by dismantling the ineffective buildings.
target: Daarum hebb ick mi verlöövt, uns’ List vun Husen tum Bauen up nix as de Boomhaueree to minnern, bit wi genoog Baumaterialien sammelt hebben, indeem wi de unnützen Husen plattrieten.

source: I hope I could teach you how you can control the economy in Widelands. There are many options and they can be confusing at first. Even if you’ve only understood a few concepts, you mustn’t give up. Try them out in some games, become familiar with them and experience the possibilities. Then, return to this tutorial and learn the rest!
target: Ich hoop, dat ick di lehren kunn, wo du de Weertskupp in Widelands kuntrolleren kannst. ’t gifft mennig Instellens un se könen toeerst elkeen rammdösig maken. Ok wenn du eerst een paar daarvun verstahn hest, dürst du nich upgeven. Versöök ’t all in een paar Spelen, um ’t to kennen to kriegen, un probeer de Kansen ut. Dann koom torügg to deese Inföhren un lehr de Rest!

source: Load the given savegame or replay directly. Useful for .wgf/.wrpl file extension association. Does not work with other options. Also see --loadgame/--replay.
target: Stracks dat geven sekert Speel of Upteken laden. Gadelk för .wgf-/.wrpl-Dateinaam-Verknüppens. Anner Instellens worden nich annohmen. Kiek ok an: --loadgame/--replay.

source: The hunter working out of this hunter’s hut can’t find any game in his work area. Remember that you can build a gamekeeper’s hut to release more game into the wild.
target: De Jäger, de bi deese Jaggthuus warkt, hett keene Deerten tum Jagen. Du kannst neje Deerten tüchten, wenn du een Deertentüchteree baust.

source: After the quick escape from the drowning island, the Atlanteans around Jundlina are faced with new challenges.
target: Nadeem se fell vun de untergahn Insel utnaiht sünd, mutten Jundlin’ un hör Atlantingers mit nejen Rutfödderungen klaarworden.

source: When their God lost faith in the Atlanteans and drowned their island, one woman’s struggle for justice and a second chance for her people would become the stuff of legends. Leading the remaining Atlanteans into a new future in a new part of the World, Jundlina became the most powerful human of her time, but at a high cost: her humanity and soul.
target: As ihr Gott sien Gloov in de Atlantinger verloor un ihre Insel överfloodde, wurr de Stried vun eener Froo na Gerechtigheid un eener annern Kans för hör Lüü de Stoff för Sagen. As se de övrigen Atlantinger to eener nejen Tokunft in eenem annern Part vun de Welt föhrt, word Jundlin’ de machtigste Minsk in hör Tied, aver de Pries was düür: Hör Godigheid un hör Seel.

source: But not even this changed the mind of the god. The water kept on rising. Nearly driven insane by guilt, pain and anger, Jundlina became a heretic: Secretly, she gathered people of the common folk who were not in line with the decision of the clerics to accept the god’s will. Together with them, she set the temple on fire and stole a ship to flee from the god’s influence over Atlantis. This small group started praying to Satul, the fire god and the worst enemy of Lutas.
target: Aver nich mal dat kunn de Gott anners stimmen. Dat Water leep wieder up. Haast dördreiht vör Schuld, Pien un Wut wurr Jundlin’ tur Ketterin: In’t Geheem hett se normaale Lüü sammelt, wat mit de Beslutt vun de Pastoren, de Will vun de Gott antonehmen, nich tofree weren. Tosamen hebben se all de Tempel ofbrannt un een Schipp stohlen, mit de se weg vun Atlantis un Luutas sien Macht flüchtden. De lütte Klottje hett begunnen, to Satuul de Füürgott to beden, Luutas sien slimmster Feind.

source: May Satul warm you, Jundlina. Can I be of any service to you or the god?
target: Satuul sall Jo warmen, Jundlin’. Kann ick Jo of de Gott denen?

source: May Satul warm you, Jundlina. My name is Opol, and I am the highest weaver of the guild abandoning Atlantis and Lutas with you. I come with sad news indeed: we have no more spidercloth. Not a single piece is to be found in our warehouses. Could you not help the weavers’ guild by arranging the building of a weaving mill and a spider farm? The spiders deliver the finest silk and we will produce the finest spidercloth from it.
target: Satuul sall Jo warmen, Jundlin’. Mien Naam is Öpoll, un ick bin de eerste Spinner vun de Gild. wat Atlantis un Luutas mit Jo verlaten hett. Ick komm mit bannig slechten Narichten: Wi hebben keenen Spinnenstoff mehr. Nich een enkelt Deel is noch in uns’ Kraamhusen över. Kannst Jo de Spinners nich helpen, indeem Jo eene Spinnweelmöhlen un eene Spinnentüchteree bauen lettst? De Spinnen produzeren de beste Sied, un wi maken daar de beste Spinnenstoff vun.

source: May Satul warm you, Jundlina. Have you considered mining for resources in the mountains around us? We are running short of quartz and diamonds for our buildings. Also, we could use more iron, gold and especially coal. If we find an ample supply of those commodities, we could start producing weapons and tools; this would help enormously. Of course, we would need smelters, a weapon smithy, an armor smithy and a toolsmithy. And maybe even more.
target: Satuul sall Jo warmen, Jundlin’. Hest Jo al överleggt, of wi in de Bargen um uns Mineraale ofboen sallen? Wi hebben bold keen Blinkerflint un Edelstenen för uns’ Husen mehr. Un wi bruken ok mehr Iesen, Gold un vör allem Köhl. Wenn wi eene gode Versörgen för deese Schatten finnen, könen wi begünnen, Wapen un Warktüüg to produzeren, wat uns bannig vööl helpen word. Daarto bruken wi natürelk Smeltwarken, eene Wapensmee, eene Panzersmee un eene Warktüügsmee. Un villicht noch mehr.

source: May Satul warm you, Jundlina. My name is Ostur and I construct ships. I have invented a new kind of ship: smaller than those we are used to, but much sturdier. If we build them correctly, I am confident that we can sail a much longer distance with them and maybe escape from Lutas’ influence.
target: Satuul sall Jo warmen, Jundlin’. Mien Naam is Ostuur un ick bau Schippen. Ick hebb eene neje Aard vun Schipp utdacht: Lütter as de Schippen, wat wi sünst bruken, aver faster. Wenn wi se good bauen, könen wi wiss eene vööl grotere Streck daarmit seilen un villicht vun Luutas sien Macht utnaihen.

source: To be able to pay the tributes to Kalitath, and to maintain contact with Jundlina, we need to enhance our scout’s house to a trading post.
target: Um de Tribut an Kalitat betahlen to könen un in Verbinnen mit Jundlin’ to blieven, mutten wi uns’ Bespejeree to eenem Hannelsposten utbauen.

source: Aaaargh, Jundlina. I don’t know how this could have happened, but Satul couldn’t protect us from the enemy. They have destroyed our last warehouse. Thus we have lost this battle and our people is doomed!
target: Aaaarg, Jundlina. Ick weet nich, wo dat passeren kunn, aver Satuul kunn uns nich vör de Feinden schütten. Se hebben uns’ lestes Kraamhuus verneelt. So hebben wi deese Slacht verlesen un uns’ Lüü worden unnergahn!

source: May Satul warm you, Jundlina. I am glad you are here again. I hope we may trust you, as much as you will trust and be faithful to Satul. How come the Barbarians let you go?
target: Satuul sall Jo warmen, Jundlina. Ick bün blied, dat Jo weer hier büst. Ick hoop, dat wi Jo trauen könen, so as Jo Satuul trauen un troo blieven sallst. Wo kummt dat, dat de Willen Lüü Jo weggahn laten?

source: Sidolus, may Satul warm you! We have finished the new trading post. I hope this will allow Jundlina to return to us soon.
target: Sidoolus, Satuul sall Jo warmen! Wi hebben de nejen Hannelsposten beschickt. Ick hoop, Jundlin’ kann nu bold to uns torügg kummen.

source: The hunter brings fresh, raw meat to the colonists.
target: De Jager jaggt friskes, ruges Fleesk för de Lüü.

source: The hunter brings fresh, raw meat to the colonists.
target: De Jager jaggt friskes, ruges Fleesk för de Lüü.

source: The hunter brings fresh, raw meat to the colonists.
target: De Jager jaggt friskes, ruges Fleesk för de Lüü.

source: The hunter brings fresh, raw meat to the colonists.
target: De Jager jaggt friskes, ruges Fleesk för de Lüü.

source: Center the map on the selected ship
target: To deese Schipp springen

source: Show original map names
target: Wies echte Namen vun de Karten

source: Center the map on the selected ship
target: To deese Schipp springen

source: Boldreth seems more and more torn as the days go by. The spirits of my fellows sink as the cold season approaches, and we are still living in no more than huts and barracks. I never intended to stay out here in the wilderness for so long – but I never thought my brothers would engage in this senseless battle for so long either.
target: As de Dagen vörbigahn, kummt mi Boldreth mehr un mehr rumrieten vör. Miene Kameraden verlesen hör Mood as de kolle Tied nahder kummt, un wi leven immer noch in nix as Kaaten un Brattsen. Ick harr nooit vörhatt, so lang in de Wildernis to blieven – aver ick hett ok nooit docht, dat se sik so lang mit deesem unnützen Krieg befaten.

source: We must improve our military capabilities. If there are foes on the island, we have to be prepared when we meet them. We should also enforce the fortification of our borders.
target: Wi mutten uns’ Soldateree verbetern. Wenn dat up de Insel Feinde gifft, mutten wi stark wesen, wenn wi se treffen. Wi sallen ok de Befestigungen an uns’ Grenzen utbauen.

source: The news that a patrol brought is not good to hear. Our spies tell us that the war tribes still rage in battle, but some of the elder soldiers and tribe leaders seem to grow tired of this senseless war. Kalitath, son of Kun is the first war leader to leave Al’thunran, thus leaving his side weak and vulnerable. As my scouts report, he has set foot on the lower grounds around the capital, securing the outer fortification rings.
target: De Bespejers hebben slimme Narichten brocht. Se seggen uns, dat de Völkers immer noch im Stired stahn, aver eenige vun de ollern Soldaten un Anföhrers wullen deesen unnützen Krieg nich wiederföhren. Kalitat, de Söhn vun Kuun, is de eerste Kriegs-Anföhrer, well Alltunraan verlaten hett; nu is siene Sied blot swack tegen Angriffen schütt. Miene Bespejers mellen, dat he sik bi de Flacklannen um de Höövdstadt daallaten hett un de butern Schanzen sekert.

source: The frontier line of my forces has expanded to the edge of the forests. We have a long and cold winter and so many miles behind us. The fortification that we erected around Ondun will guarantee us a fast supply of men and goods, and once Al’thunran is in my hands, the two cities will be linked by a good and defensible infrastructure. Still, I hope I will not walk alone on this mission, I hope Kalitath son of Kun will follow my call.
target: Miene Grenz-Lienje is bit tu de Waldrann vörrückt. Wi hebben eenen langen, kollen Winter un unbannig völe Mielen achter uns. De Schanz, wat wi bi Onduun baut hebben, gewährt uns Naschuuv an Lüü un Waren, un wenn ick eerst Alltunraan hebb, worden de twee Steden vun eener goden Weertskupp verbunnen, wat sik ok good verteidigen lett. Aver ick hoop, dat ick dat nich alleen daan kregen mutt; ick hoop, dat Kalitat, Söhn vun Kuun, mienen Roop folgt.

source: The first fortification Thron ordered has just been completed. At the moment, he seeks to bring trust and belief to those who live inside the walls of our new habitat that we named ‘Ondun’, which means ‘those who wait’ in the old tongue. But Thron is not yet satisfied – and I fully understand his fears: the forests are deep, and the frontier to Al’thunran is near. I am sure that there are a thousand greater dangers out there than the unknown tracks.
target: De eersten Schanzen, wat Troon hett bauen laten, sünd nu beschickt. Jüüst nu will he Vertrauen un Free to de Lüü brengen, well in de Müren vun uns’ neje Stadt wohnen, wat wi »Onduun« benöhmt hebben. wat in de ollen Spraak »Se well wachten« hett. Aver Troon is noch nich tofree – un ick verstah siene Angst: De Walden sünd deep, un de Grenz vun Alltunraan is dicht bi. Ick bün mi seker, dat dat daar buten dusend slimmere Gefahren as de komsiken Sporen gifft.

source: To establish a smuggling route, you need to build a warehouse on a sending/receiving spot while your team mate has to build one on the corresponding receiving/sending spot. A ware is then transported every 10 seconds.
target: Um een Smuggel-Padd intorichten, mutt du up eenem Enn vun eenem Tunnel een Kraamhuus bauen, un dien Partner an de glieke Stee in sienem Gewest ok eens bauen. Dann word all 10 Sekünnen eene Waar smuggelt.

source: Remember that the map has rotational symmetry. For example, when you have found a spot to the top-left of your headquarters, the corresponding spot will be to the bottom-right of the headquarters of your team mate.
target: Vergeet nich, dat de Kaart evenmatig mit eenem Dreihzentrum is. Dat heet, wenn du links boven vun dienem Raadhuus eene Stee finnst, hett dien Partner de glieke Stee rechts unner sienem Raadhuus.

source: Use the river wisely. Your opponents will do the same. You will find the main ore resources deep in the desert.
target: Bruuk de Stroom klook. Diene Feinde doon dat ok. Du finnst de wichtigsten Kluten-Lagers deep in de Wüüst.

source: Expand your territory to the mountains, send geologists to search for ore and coal and build a mining economy with mines, taverns, smelting works and metal workshop.
target: Vergroter dien Gewest bit to de Bargen, schick Schattsökers, um na Kluten un Köhl to söken, un bau eene Bargwarks-Weertskupp mit Bargwarken, Kneipen, Smeltwarken un eener Metalldreihbank.

source: As long as we don’t produce rations, our miners won’t dig for ore. And without iron, we cannot forge a single helm.
target: Bit wi weer Happen produzeren, graven uns’ Bargwarkskeerls nich mehr na Kluten. Un sünner Iesen könen wi keene Helms smeden.

source: We learned the smelting from our forefathers, a basic craftsmanship taming the fire and the ore into pure metals.
target: Wi hebben dat Smelten vun uns’ Vörvaders lehrt, eene slichte Handwarkskunst, dat Füür un de Kluten in pure Metallen to tähmen.

source:
‘Way down here in these golden grounds
with stones above us the thousand pounds
I dig in the dust until I see the spark;
The golden ore I find in the dark.’
target:
»In deesen depen golden Grünnen
unner Fels to dusend Tünnen
graav ick im Klei dör de stoffig Spold
bit ick finn im Düüster dat lechte Gold.«

source: ‘He who has enough bread will never be too tired to dig the ore and wield the ax.’
target: »Well genoog Brood hett, word nie to sluff, na Kluten to graven un de Ext to swingen.«

source: The second one is the more common and faster one: press-and-hold the right mouse button anywhere on the map, then move your mouse around and you’ll see the view scroll.
target: Över de anner Kant kannst du de rechte Muustaste enerwegens up de Kaart drücken un hollen un dann diene Muus bewegen, un de Sicht verschuuvt sik. Dat is handig un gang un geve.

source: Every warehouse has four buttons to set the preference. If you move your mouse pointer over them, you will see tooltips that explain what the buttons do.
target: Elkeen Waarhuus hett veer Knopen, um Vörrang fasttoleggen. Wenn du de Muus daaröver beweegst, süchst du Texten, de di seggen, wat de Knopen doon.

source: From the north we are endangered by a belligerent tribe, led by warlord Törver, that is rapidly building up its armies. They may soon have become too strong to be defeated.
target: Im Noorden droht uns een striedlevend Volk, wat Generaal Törver anföhrt, un wat siene Soldateree fix utbaut. Se worden bold to machtig worden, um se noch manntjen to könen.

source: If the food supply is steady, the coal mine can produce two pieces of coal in %s on average.
target: Wenn de Spiesen to rechter Tied ankomen, produzeert deeses Bargwark dör de Bank all %s twee Köhlen.

source: Our building infrastructure is finished and I spent some days making sure that everybody is working well together. Now, there are other pressing matters. I called Colionder, my personal cook, before me to get his help with sorting some things out.
target: Uns’ Bau-Weertskupp is kumpleet un ick hebb een paar Dagen daarmit verbrocht, uptopassen, dat all Lüü good tosamen warken. Nu gifft dat anner wichtige Dingen. Ick hebb Kojonder, mienen persönelken Kock, to mi ropen laten, um mit siener Hülp een paar Dinge klaar to maken.

source:
‘He loves the animals and to breed them
as we love to cook and eat them.’
target:
»He leevt to Tüchten all de Deerten
so geern as wi se geern verweerten.«

source: Red player is close to the ores, but has little fertile terrain. Yellow player has plenty of good land, but must move far from his starting position to find ores. Blue player takes the middle ground – he has some fertile land and is not too far away from the resources.
target: De rode Speler is dicht an de Kluten, hett aver haast keene Eer, waar wat wasst. De gele Speler hett vööl godes Land, mutt aver wied weg söken, um Kluten to kriegen. De blaue Speler is daartüsken – he hett een bietje früchtbares Land un is nich so wied weg vun de Mineraalen.

source: Click on the map to increase, Shift + Click on the map to decrease terrain height
target: Klicke de Kaart tum Verhogen an; drücke daar de Umschalt-Tast bi tum lütter maken.

source: Ctrl + Click on the map to set terrain height
target: Klicke de Kaart an un drücke daar de Strg-Tast bi tum Fastsetten vun de Höcht.

source: Click on the map to set terrain height to a random value within the specified range
target: Klick de Kaart an tum Fastmaken vun de Höcht to eene tofällige Tahl in de utköört Intervall.

source: They learn to attack with three different swords: The long sword, broadsword and double-edged sword. The latter two contain gold, and all of them iron. The advanced soldiers are taught to use two swords at once: They keep their first double-edged sword, and are given various other swords to wield in their other hand. This makes six steps of attack training.
target: Se lehren de Angriff mit dree verschedenen Sweerten: Dat Lange, Brede un Tweesneidige Sweert. De lesten twee enthollen Gold, un alle Iesen. De beteren Soldaten bruken twee Sweerten up eenmaal: Se behollen hör eerstes Tweesneidigs Sweert, un kriegen verschedene anner Sweerten, de se mit hör anner Hand föhren könen. Dat sünd all tosamen sess Stappen vun Angriffs-Öven.

source: The long sword is the weapon used by level 1 soldiers. Level 4 soldiers are equipped with a long and a double-edged sword.
target: Dat Lange Sweert is de Wapen, de Soldaten vum Stand 1 bruken. Soldaten vum Stand 4 hebben een Langes un een Tweesneidigs Sweert.

source: Defeat Lanissa and capture the ancient castle.
target: Manntje Laniss’ un nehm dat steenolle Slött in.

source: Let’s hope that Lanissa – the warlord holding sway over that castle – has not discovered our movements yet. Perhaps we have a chance of conquering that mighty building without a bigger fight! However, it is essential that we capture it. It will be the key to our reign over this island!
target: Hopentlik hett uns Laniss’ – de Kummandantin, de dat Slött kuntrolleert – noch nich funnen. Villicht könen wi deesen gewaltigen Boo sünner grote Slachten innehmen! Wi mutten ’t driest innehmen. ’t is de Slötel tum Seggen över deese Insel!

source: Wonderful! Our troops have finally defeated Lanissa and her soldiers. The ancient castle is ours!
target: Hunnert! Uns’ Soldateree hett Laniss’ un hör Soldaten ennelk manntjet. Dat steenolle Slött hört to uns!

source: It is amazing how far one can see from the highest tower of the castle. We can watch the whole island. So now I wonder why Lanissa did not see us and thus did not prepare. Be that as it may, some things will never come to the light of day. The only important issue at the moment are the opposing troops still left. We have discovered enemy positions held by Erwyn to the north and east of the castle. He is known to be a strong warlord and surely commands the strongest warriors. In the south, we caught sight of some food infrastructures guarded by Jomo – a younger warlord – and we should take care of those infrastructures so we can cut off our enemies’ food supply.
target: ’t is nich to glöven, wo wied man vun de hoogsten Toorn im Slött sehn kann. Wi könen de ganze Insel sehn. Wunnerlik, dat Laniss’ uns nich sehn un sik för uns rüst hett. Aver egaal, mennig Dingen blieven man unbegriepelk. Wichtig is blot, dat de övrigen Soldatereen noch daar sünd. Wi hebben im Noorden un Oosten vum Slött Stellungen vun Feinden unner Erwin funnen. He is een gewaltiger Kummandant un hett wiss de starksten Soldaten. Im Süden hebben wi de Spiesen-Weertskupp vun Jomo – een junger Kummandant – funnen, um de wi uns kümmern mutten, um de Spiesen-Versörgung vun uns’ Feinden to unnerbreken.

source: The carrier working at this well can’t find any water in his well.
target: De Arbeider, de bi deese Well warkt, hett keen Water in de Quell mehr.

source: The carrier working at this well can’t find any water in his well.
target: De Arbeider, de bi deese Well warkt, hett keen Water in de Quell mehr.

source: The carrier working at this well can’t find any water in his well.
target: De Arbeider, de bi deese Well warkt, hett keen Water in de Quell mehr.

source: The carrier working at this well can’t find any water in his well.
target: De Arbeider, de bi deese Well warkt, hett keen Water in de Quell mehr.

source: The carrier working at this well can’t find any water in his well.
target: De Arbeider, de bi deese Well warkt, hett keen Water in de Quell mehr.

source: Six months ago, Lutius – a young general of the Empire – was sent with 150 soldiers to the frontier beyond the northern forests where Barbarian tribes were crossing onto land held by the Empire. His task was to defend the Empire’s land. At first, everything was calm. He even talked to a few Barbarian children and thought about a peaceful life – side by side with this archaic folk. He began to feel safer and his army began to drop their attention off the potential enemy. That was their undoing. One night in March his unprepared army was attacked by 100 Barbarian footmen and was completely scattered. Only with his bare life he and a handful of his soldiers survived.
target: Vör sess Maanten wurr Lutjus – een junger Offizeer vum Latiensken Riek – mit 150 Soldaten an de Grenz achtern de noordelken Walden schickt, waar de Willen Lüü ins Land vum Riek indrungen. Siene Upgaav weer, dat Land vum Riek to verdedigen. Eerst weer all friedelk. He snackde mit Willen Kinners un wullt in Freden leven – Sied an Sied mit de steenolle Volk. He meende, seker to wesen, un siene Soldaten achtden nich mehr up de mögelk Feinden. Dat weer een Fehler. In eener Määrtnacht wurren siene unrüsten Soldaten vun 100 Willen Stahfasten angrepen un heel un dall verjaggt. He un een paar vun sienen Soldaten överleevden mit nix as de blote Leven.

source: On their way home to defend the Empire, the crew of Lutius was surprised by the will of the gods.
target: As se na Huus gahn, um dat Latienske Riek to verdedigen, worden Lutjus un siene Lüü vun de Will vun de Gotten överrumpelt.

source: We need to finish the Empire off to have a chance to build a new home.
target: Wi mutten dat Riek manntjen, um eene Kans to hebben, hier eene neje Heimaad to bauen.

source: May Satul warm you, Kalitath! We have defeated the troops of the Empire in the north. Now we expect our princess to return home.
target: Satuul sall Jo warmen, Kalitat! Wi hebben de Soldateree vun de noordelk Riek manntjet. Nu verwachten wi, dat uns’ Königstochter na Huus torügg kummt.

source: Sidolus, during my stay with the Barbarians I learned a lot about their hospitality and bravery. They really impressed me and their warriors and gods seemed to be very strong in the battle against the Empire. Especially their leader Kalitath made a very good host and I started to think about uniting our tribes to make for a peaceful future on this island. So I want you to prepare our people for a marriage and peaceful coexistence with the Barbarians. This includes learning about their gods and preparing to worship them.
target: Sidoolus, as ick mit de Willen Lüü leevt hebb, hebb ick vööl över hör Gastlikheid un Mood lehrt. Se hebben mi unbannig imponeert, un hör Kriegers un Gotten weren im Stried tegen dat Riek baldadig machtig. Vör allem hör Anföhrer Kalitat weer een bannig goder Weert, un ick hebb anfangen, daaröver natodenken, uns’ Völkers för eene freedsame Tokunft up deeser Insel to vereenen. Also sallst Jo nu uns’ Lüü up eene Hochtied vörbereiden un up freedsamen Tosamenleven mit de Willen Lüü. Dat heet ok, dat se över hör Gotten lehren mutten un wo man se anbeedt.

source: They name themselves an Empire, and their leader is called Maletus. I want you to train your soldiers and help us defeat his lousy Empire.
target: Se nömen sik sülven een Riek, un hör Anföhrer heet Maletus. Ick will, dat Jo jo Soldaten utbildt un uns hülpt, sien lusig Riek to manntjen.

source: So I want you to defeat this Empire, but ensure that we will become and remain strong enough to enforce the respect we deserve.
target: Ick will also, dat Jo deeses Riek manntjet, aver pass up, dat wi machtig genoog worden un blieven, dat wi de Respekt, wat wi verdeent hebben, infördern könen.

source: The message was addressed to me, begging me to come back to Fremil. It says that the Empire is at war with the Barbarians. They were attacked from the north by the tribe that I was forbidden to attack. It is clear to me what I must do…
target: ’t was eene Naricht för mi, de mi daarum anging, dat ick na Freemilt torügg koom. Dat Latienske Riek is im Krieg mit de Willen Lüü. Se sünd vun Noorden angrepen worden, vun de Volk, wat ick nich angriepen dürde. Ick weet, wat ick doon mutt …

source: I really don’t know if and how we will get back home. And the war is going on without us. I hope my fellow soldiers are defending our empire well.
target: Ick weet würrelk nich, of un wo wo torügg na Huus komen sallen. Un de Krieg gaht sünner uns wieder. Ick hoop, miene Soldaten-Fründe verteidigen uns’ Riek good.

source: Yes my fellow soldiers, we have done it! We have met all the challenges that were put in front of us. But my heart is still with our home. We shall set sail as soon as possible to help defend the Empire from the Barbarian tribe.
target: Jau, miene Soldaten-Fründe, wi hebben ’t klaar brocht! Wi hebben all de Rutföderungen överwunnen, de vör uns laggen. Aver mien Hart is noch to Huus. Wi sallen tur See fahren, sobold wi nu könen, um dat Riek tegen dat Wille Volk mit to verteidigen.

source: Furthermore, we will have to live with the guilt of destroying a temple of an Empire goddess on our souls.
target: Un wi mutten nu alltied mit de Schuld leven, dat wi eenen Tempel vun eener Rieks-Gottin verneelt hebben.

source: Defeat the Barbarians and the Empire Colony
target: Manntje de Willen Lüü un dat Rieks-Dörp

source: The Barbarians and the Empire are too dangerous to allow them to live near us. We must defeat them both.
target: De Willen Lüü un dat Riek sünd to gefahrelk, as dat wi se in uns’ Naberskupp leven laten könen. Wi mutten se beide manntjen.

source: Strangers! I, Murilius, Proconsul of the Northern Lands, a province of the Empire, demand to know who you are and what business you have in these lands!
target: Frömde! Ick, Murilius, Prokonsul vun de Noordlannen, eene Provinz vum Latiensken Riek, will weten, well ji west un wat ji in deesen Landen doot!

source: If you seek to live peacefully here, you are not faced with a choice whether to allow them to live here – you are required to assist the Empire in driving them out.
target: Wenn ji hier in Free leven wullt, gifft ’t för ji keene Kör, of ji se hier leven laat – ji mutt vun Nöden de Riek daarbi stönen, se daarvun to drieven.

source: Also, as a sign of your good intentions, we demand a gift of friendship to the Empire. As you should have noticed, I have presented you with a new warehouse. Fill it with the required gifts to hand them over. I permit you to give us these wares:
target: Un as Teken för ji goden Willen verlangen wi eene Gaav vun Fründskupp an dat Riek. As ji wull wiss worden sünd, hebb ick ji een nejes Kraamhuus geven. Doot daar de nödigen Gaven in, um se an uns to langen. Ick verloov ji, uns deese Waren to geven:

source: Chieftain Reebaud – the demands of this arrogant Empire Proconsul are just outrageous. He treats us like we are his servants. And we certainly cannot afford to spare that many wares to aid him. I propose that we destroy that ugly warehouse and let him fight his own battles.
target: Mienheer Reebaud – wat deeser heerske Rieks-Prokonsul dwingt, is tum rasend worden. He behannelt uns as siene Slaven. Un wi könen heel nich so völe Waren verkroppen, um hüm to helpen. Ick slaa vör, deeses malle Kraamhuus oftobrannen un hüm siene egenen Slachten fechten to laten.

source: If you fail to deliver these wares, the Empire shall treat you like enemies. And so as to prevent you wasting your precious metal, I forbid you to expand your territory from this moment on until you have given us your gift. Fail to obey, and the Empire shall treat you like enemies.
target: Wenn ji uns deese Waren nich geevt, sall dat Riek ji as Feinde behanneln. Un daamit ji  jo dürabeles Metall nich verklüngelt, versegg ick ji vun nu of an, jo Gewest to vergrotern, bit ji uns jo Gaav geven hebbt. Dood dat nich, un dat Riek sall ji as Feinde behanneln.

source: You will have to fight those barbarians if you intend to live in the area; surely you can see that fighting them together with the Empire is easier than alone? And you really do not want the Empire as your enemy. Barbarians though you are, I do believe you will realize the truth of my words after some consideration.
target: Ji muttst tegen deese Willen kämpen, wenn ji in deese Kuntrei leven wullt; ji köönt wiss sehn, dat ’t lichter is, tosamen mit de Riek tegen se to fechten as alleen? Un ji wullt dat Riek würrelk nich as jo Feind. Wull sünd ji Wille Lüü, aver ick bün wiss, dat ji verstaht, dat ick Klookheid segg, nadeem ji daar een bietje över nadacht hebbt.

source: The Empire is Angry
target: Dat Riek is vergrellt

source: You are enemies of the Empire, and I shall treat you as such!
target: Ji sünd Feinde vum Latiensken Riek, un so sall ick mit ji umgahn!

source: The Empire is Grateful
target: Dat Riek is dankbaar

source: Strangers! I see you have kept your word. The Empire rewards its friends, therefore I shall reward you with the friendship of the Empire!
target: Frömde! Ick seh, ji hebbt jo Woord hollt. Dat Riek belohnt siene Frünnen, daarum belohn ick ji mit de Fründskupp vum Riek!

source: Did I understand him correctly? After all we have done for him, after so many of my soldiers have laid down their lives for his sake, he wants us to be servants of this Empire, and take away my leadership? And does the hypocrite dare call this a reward?
target: Hebb ick hüm recht verstahn? Na allem, wat wi för hüm daan hebben, nadeem so völe vun mienen Soldaten hör Leven för siene Saak geven hebben, will he uns as de Bedeenten vun deesem Riek hebben, un miene Leiderskupp wegnehmen? Un deeser Fliemstrieker waagt ’t, dat eenen Lohn to nömen?

source: Pay the Empire or Destroy Their Port
target: Betahl dat Riek of verneel hör Muu

source: Atterdag! The King of the Danish Empire, and my sworn enemy. Many times did I aid the dukes of the mainland as they defended themselves against his thirst for war and conquest, and most times we fought him off. But eight weeks ago he landed with some of his allies and a large and well-trained army on my own island, Föhr, and sought to seize it.
target: Atterdag! De König vun dat Däänsk Riek, un mien sworen Feind. Mennigmaal hebb ick de Herzogen up de Höövdland bistahn, as se sik tegen sien Dörst vör Krieg un Innehmen wehrt hebben, un meestens hebben wi hüm ok manntjet. Aver vör acht Weken is he mit een paar vun sienen Fründen up miener eegen Insel. Föhr, lannt, un hett versöcht, ’t intonehmen.

source: Greetings, Strangers! I am Marcus Caius Iniucundus, a legate of the Empire. Is this your island? We are only passing through, I hope you don’t mind. We don’t want any trouble.
target: Weest grööt, Frömden! Ick bün Marcus Caius Injucundus, een Legaat vum Riek. Is dat diene Insel? Wi reisen blot dör, ick hoop, dat maakt jo nix ut. Wi wullen keenen Stried.

source: This is most inacceptable. I am Marcus Caius Iniucundus, a legate of the Empire. To think that I was sent to investigate whether Murilius had neglected to pay his taxes from need or greed, and that I now discovered that he and all his men were foully murdered by arrogant invaders!
target: Dat kann nu unbannig nich so angahn. Ick bün Marcus Caius Injucundus, een Legaat vum Riek. Dat ick heerschickt wurr, um uttofinnen, of Murilius siene Stüren ut Nood of Gier unnerslagen hett, un ick nu utfinn, dat he un siene Lüü vun heersken Indringers naar vermoordet wurren!

source: By your deed, you have bestowed upon yourself the wrath of the Empire, and I swear by Jupiter Optimus Maximus that I will not rest until you and yours are lying in your own blood. I will be merciful only to those too young to have participated in the fighting then, whom I will keep alive to replace the handful of galley slaves who did not survive the latest journey.
target: Dör jo Daad hebbt jo jo sülven de Haat vun de Riek verdeent, un ick swöör bi Jupiter Optimus Maximus, dat ick keene Ruh geven sall, bit jo un jo Lüü in hör eegen Blood liggen. Gnaad sall ick blots de Lüü geven, wat to jung sünd, um dann in de Slacht kämpt to hebben, un ick sall se levig laten, um de paar Galeer-Slaven uttowesseln, wat de leste Fahrt nich överleevt hebben.

source: There are five different tribes in Widelands: the Barbarians, the Empire, the Atlanteans, the Frisians and the Amazons. All tribes have different economies, strengths, and weaknesses, but the general gameplay is the same for all. We will play the Barbarians for now.
target: In Widelands gifft ’t fief Völkers: de Willen Lüü, dat Latienske Riek, de Atlantinger, de Fresen un de Amazonen. All Völker hebben eene anner Weertskupp un hör Starkten un Swackten, aver in ’t Geheel is dat Speel för all gliek. Nu spölen wi de Wille Lüü.

source: In this game, you start out on a small piece of land with just a few resources. Using these, you’ll create an empire with many thousands of inhabitants. On your way towards this goal, you will have to establish an economic infrastructure, explore the land around you and face rivaling tribes.
target: In deesem Speel fangst du mit eenem lütten Deel Land an, waar du leep minn Materialien un Mineraale hest. Daarmit baust du een Riek mit dusenden Inwohners up. Up dienem Weg daarhen baust du eene starke Weertskupp up, förskst dat Land um di rum ut un kämpst tegen tegenstriedige Völker.

source: The Empire produces granite blocks in quarries and marble mines.
target: Dat Latienske Riek produzeert Blocken vun Flint in Flintslagerhusen un Marmel-Bargwarken.

source: Besides bread and meat, fish is also a foodstuff for the Empire. Fish are used in taverns, inns and training sites (arena, colosseum, training camp).
target: Tegen Brood un Fleesk is ok Fiss eene Spies för dat Latienske Riek. Fisse worden in Kneipen, Weertshusen un Övens-Boen (Ring, Groter Ring, Övens-Lager) bruukt.

source: Flour is produced by the mill out of wheat and is needed in the bakery to produce the tasty Empire bread.
target: Mehl word in Möhlen ut Weit maakt un word in Backereen bruukt, um dat gode Rieks-Brood to backen.

source: The bakers of the Empire make really tasty bread out of flour and water. It is used in taverns and inns to prepare rations and meals. Bread is also consumed at the training sites (arena, colosseum, training camp).
target: De Rieks-Backers maken bannig leckeres Brood ut Mehl un Water. ’t word in Kneipen un Weertshusen bruukt, um Happen un Mahltieden torechttomaken. Brood word ok vun Övens-Boen (Ring, Groter Ring, Övens-Lager) verbruukt.

source: Marble columns represent the high culture of the Empire, so they are needed for nearly every larger building. They are produced out of marble at a stonemason’s house.
target: Marmelpielers wiesen de hoge Kultuur un Wüürd vum Latiensken Riek un worden daarum för haast elkeen grotes Huus bruukt. Se worden in eenem Steenbickerhuus ut Marmel maakt.

source: The fires of the Empire smelting works, armor smithies and weapon smithies are usually fed with coal.
target: Dat Füür in de Rieks-Smeltwark, -Panzersmeden un -Wapensmeden verbrannt meest Köhl.

source: This wooden spear is the basic weapon in the Empire military system. It is produced in the weapon smithy. In combination with a helmet, it is the equipment to fit out young soldiers.
target: Deese Holtpieke is de eenfachste Wapen in de Rieks-Soldateree. Se word in de Wapensmee produzeert. Tosamen mit eenem Helm is se de Utrüstung för neje Soldaten.

source: This is the best and sharpest weapon the Empire weaponsmith creates for the soldiers. It is used in the training camp – together with food – to train soldiers from attack level 3 to level 4.
target: Dat is de beste un scharpste Wapen, de de Rieks-Wapensmidd för de Soldaten maakt. ’t word in de Wapensmee produzeert un im Övens-Lager – tosamen mit Spiesen – bruukt, um Soldaten vun Angriff-Stand 3 up Stand 4 uttobilden.

source: Basic armor for Empire soldiers. It is produced in the armor smithy and used in the training camp – together with food – to train soldiers from health level 1 to level 2.
target: De eenfachste Wapenrock för Rieks-Soldaten. ’t word in de Panzersmee produzeert un im Övens-Lager – tosamen mit Spiesen – bruukt, um Soldaten vun Gesundheid-Stand 1 up Stand 2 uttobilden.

source: The chain armor is a medium armor for Empire soldiers. It is produced in an armor smithy and used in a training camp – together with food – to train soldiers from health level 2 to level 3.
target: De Stahl-Wapenrock is de middelste Wapenrock för Rieks-Soldaten. ’t word in de Panzersmee produzeert un im Övens-Lager – tosamen mit Spiesen – bruukt, um Soldaten vun Gesundheid-Stand 2 up Stand 3 uttobilden.

source: The gilded armor is the strongest armor an Empire soldier can have. It is produced in the armor smithy and used in the training camp – together with food – to train soldiers from health level 3 to level 4.
target: De Goldene Wapenrock is de beste Wapenrock för Rieks-Soldaten. ’t word in de Panzersmee produzeert un im Övens-Lager – tosamen mit Spiesen – bruukt, um Soldaten vun Gesundheid-Stand 3 up Stand 4 uttobilden.

source: Proverb signifying the glory of the Empire and its capital
target: Seggwies, wat de Pracht vun de Riek un siener Höövdstadt wiest

source: History of the Empire, Part VII
target: De Rieks-Histoorje, Deel VII

source: History of the Empire, Part VI on the return of Lutius to Fremil
target: De Rieks-Histoorje, Deel VI över Lutjus sien Torüggkomen na Freemilt

source: History of the Empire, Part X – the decline
target: De Rieks-Histoorje, Deel X – dat Daalgahn

source: History of the Empire, Part III, preparation for the battle of Uliginosium
target: De Rieks-Histoorje, Deel III, Vörbereidungen up de Slacht von Uliginosium

source: Out of Clay Ponds
target: Hebb keene Kuhlen mehr

source: We offer to also produce the tabards for young soldiers and the golden tabards for officers for you in exchange. You will need them for sure as soon as you want to recruit new soldiers.
target: Wi könen daarför ok Kluften für neje Soldaten un Goldene Kluften för de besten Soldaten produzeren. Jo bruukst se vun Nood, wenn Jo neje Soldaten anhüren willst.

source: I am really worried about the weakness of our army. We should start to increase our military power. As a starting point, we should recruit at least ten new soldiers.
target: De Swackde vun uns’ Soldateree is leep slimm. Wi mutten begpnnen, uns’ Soldateree-Macht to verbetern. Toeerst laat uns teihn neje Soldaten anhüren.

source: Expanding would also provide more space for farming. We could use some extra barley to recruit more reindeer, as our roads are quite busy.
target: Uns’ Gewest to vergrotern gifft uns ok mehr Rüümte för Ackerland. Wi könen een bietje Garste bovendeem bruken, um mehr Sneeihirsken antohüren; uns’ Straten sünd hennig besig.

source: Look up which wares are needed to recruit soldiers
target: Kiek na, wat för Waren du bruukst, um Soldaten antohüren

source: You have closed the encyclopedia window, but I didn’t notice that you were trying to find out which wares are needed to recruit a soldier. Would you please reopen it and do so?
target: Du hest dat Fenster tum Naslaan dichtmaakt, aver ick hebb nich sehn, dat du versöcht hest, ruttofinnen, wat för Waren du bruukst, um eenen Soldaten antohüren. Maakst du ’t bidde weer open un deist dat?

source: The initiation site needs %s on average to recruit one soldier.
target: De Junglüü-Inföhreree bruukt dör de Bank %s um eene Soldatske antohüren.

source: The barracks needs %s on average to recruit one soldier.
target: De Kasern bruukt dör de Bank %s um eenem Soldaten antohüren.

source: At the moment, all mines are supplied with rations. If you want to prioritize a special mine, you simply have to open its window. In the wares tab, behind every ware, you can see a slider.
target: Upstünds worden all Bargwarken mit Happen versörgt. Wenn du een wisses Bargwark vörtrecken willst, kannst du eenfach sien Fenster opmaken. Achtern elkeen Waren-Riege süchst du eenen Schiever.

source: The first two tabs show you the production and consumption of any ware. You can toggle them by simply clicking on them.
target: De eersten twee Listenwessler wiesen, waar vööl vun elkeen Waar produzeert un verbruukt word. Du kannst se wiesen of verbargen, indeem du se anklickst.

source: Salve Lutius. While talking to all our brave builders, they told me that they have to use all our remaining gold for building the port. So, we won’t have any gold left after our port is built.
target: Salve Lutius. As ick mit uns’ dappern Baulüü redt hebb, hebben se mi vertellt, dat se all dat Gold, wat wi över hetten, bruukt hebben, um de Muu to bauen. Wi hebben also keen Gold mehr över, wenn de Muu beschickt is.

source: Salve Lutius. We just completed our weaving mill. Now we are very close to taking to the sea again. However, I thought it would be helpful to remind you that ship production is not the only industry that needs cloth.
target: Salve Lutius. Uns’ Spinnweelmöhlen is nu beschickt. Nu sünd wi bannig dicht daarbi, weer to schippern. Aver ick gloov, ’t is good, wenn du nich vergettst, dat wi Stoff nich blot för Schippen bruken.

source: The third one is to use the minimap. It is especially useful for traveling big distances.
target: Of du kannst de Lütte Kaart bruuken. Dat is besünners för grote Ofstannen gadelk.

source: Water is used in the bakery, the micro brewery and the brewery. The lime kiln and the cattle farm also need to be supplied with water.
target: Water word in de Backeree, de Lütten Broeree un de Broeree bruukt. De Kalkbranneree un de Ossentüchteree bruken ’t ok.

source: A tabard and a light trident are the basic equipment for young soldiers. Tabards are produced in the weaving mill.
target: Eene Kluft un een Lütter Dreespitz sünd de Utrüstung för neje Soldaten. Kluften worden in Spinnweelmöhlen produzeert.

source: Dismantle all unproductive small buildings to get some resources for new buildings.
target: Riet all unnützen lütten Husen platt, um Materialien för neje Husen to kriegen.

source: So, first of all we need some building materials to start correcting the mistakes made by the infamous secretary. I think we should try dismantling unproductive small buildings to recover some building materials from them and collect them in our headquarters. As far as I can see now, the fishermen’s houses and the quarries don’t have any resources near them. All of the lumberjacks’ houses and the wells seem also to be inefficient or worn out.
target: Toeerst bruken wi also een paar Baumaterialien, um de Fehlers vun deesem lepen Macker oftohelpen. Laat uns unnütze lütte Husen plattrieten, um een paar Baumaterialien torüggtokriegen un se in uns’ Raadhuus to sammeln. Ick seh, dat de Fisker-Husen un Flintslagerhusen keene Mineraale in de Naberskupp hebben. All de Boomhauer-Husen un Wellen sünd ok langsaam of leeg.

source: The lumberjack’s hut is a small building, so I will then go on to select the small buildings tab. Then I’ll choose the lumberjack’s hut.
target: Dat Boomhauer-Huus is een lüttes Huus, also köör ick de Listenwessler för de lütten Husen ut. Dann köör ick dat Boomhauer-Huus ut.

source: Just click on any house symbol next to the rocks, select the small buildings tab in the window that opens up, then click on the quarry symbol.
target: Klick eenfach een of anner Huus-Teken tegen de Stenen an, köör de Listenwessler för de lütten Husen ut un klick dann de Flintslagerhuus-Teken an.

source: Red building symbols can only hold small buildings and flags.
target: Up eenem roden Huus-Teken könen blot lütte Husen un Fahnen baut worden.

source: Click on a small, medium or big building space, then select the building from the small buildings tab.
target: Klick up eene lütte, middelgrote of grote Rüümte tum Bauen un köör dann dat Huus ut de Listenwessler för de lütten Husen ut.

source: A helmet is a basic tool to protect soldiers. It is produced in the small armor smithy and used to train soldiers from health level 0 to level 1.
target: Een Helm is een eenfacher Schuur för Soldaten. ’t word in de Lütten Wapensmee produzeert un bruukt, um Soldaten vun Gesundheid-Stand 0 up Stand 1 uttobilden.

source: We could use these weapons to equip some new soldiers. I hope we won’t find enemies here, but it is always better to be prepared. New soldiers are equipped in a barracks with a short sword and a fur garment, the uniform of all honorable warriors.
target: Wi könen deese Wapen bruken, um wat Soldaten uttobilden. Ick hoop, dat wi hier keene Feinde finnen, aver ’t is immer beter, sik klaartomaken. Neje Soldaten worden in eener Kasern mit eenem Lütten Sweert un eener Fellkluft, de Staat vun all ehrbaren Ridders, utstaffeert.

source: You have closed the building statistics window. I didn’t notice that you switched to the medium buildings to look up the number of taverns. Would you please be so nice and show it to me?
target: Du hest dat Fenster för Tahlen över Husen dichtmaakt. Ick hebb nich sehn, dat du de Listenwessler för middelmatige Husen utköört hest, um de Tahl vun Kneipen natokieken. Wees doch bidde so good un wies mi dat?

source: Click on a medium or big building space, then select the building from the medium buildings tab.
target: Klick up eene middelgrote of grote Rüümte tum Bauen un köör dann dat Huus ut de Listenwessler för de middelmatig Husen ut.

source: Fish is a very important food resource for the Frisians. It is fished from the shore or reared in aqua farms.
target: Fiss is eene bannig wichtige Spies för de Fresen. ’t word vun de Waterkant fiskt of in Fissbuurdereen tücht.

source: Sire, as a result of our attacks on the pirates they have started to regroup with pirates from other tribes. They could regain much of their previously lost strength. Our dwindling resources can become a problem with such a mighty enemy in front of us.
target: Mienheer, siet wi de Seerovers angriepen, sluten se sik mit Seerovers von anner Völkern neei tosamen. Bold worden se so machtig wesen as tovör. Dat wi uns’ Soldateree nich mehr so good nabetern könen word een Probleem, wenn wi so eenen slimmen Feind vör uns hebben.

source: Use the river wisely. Your opponents will do the same. You will find the main ore resources deep in the desert.
target: Bruuk de Stroom klook. Diene Feinde doon dat ok. Du finnst de wichtigsten Kluten-Lagers deep in de Wüüst.

source: When the wind swelled up and the first dunes were formed on these abandoned twin lagoons, nobody could have expected that two tribes that are desperately searching for more resources to support their endlessly ongoing wars, would end up in this forgotten place at the same time and for the same well-known reason.
target: As de Wind tonohmen hett un de eersten Dünen in deesen verlaten Twennel-Meren bildt hett, daar hett sik nüms vörstellen könen, dat twee Völkers, wat vertwiefelt na mehr Mineralen söken, um hör ewig Krieg antodrieven, in deeser vergetten Stee to de glieken Tied ankomen – un woll för de glieken, good bekennten Grund.

source: Build a forester’s house to preserve the wood resources of this island.
target: Bau een Förster-Huus, um de Walden up de Insel to wahren.

source: The repair of our ship will take a few weeks, anyway, and the resources we harvest now might be the base of strong and big buildings in another land.
target: Uns’ Schipp to repareren düürt sowieso eenige Weken, un wat wi nu arnten, kann de Grundlage för grote, machtige Husen in eenem annern Land sien.

source: Of course this means you will need more resources for preparing this food – like fish, meat or bread.
target: Daar bruukst du natürelk Waren to, um de Spiesen torechttomaken – Fiss, Fleesk of Brood.

source: To make matters even worse, all the land we can see is blocked by rocks and trees. I fear we won’t find the resources we need to build a new ship.
target: Un ’t is noch slimmer: All dat Land, wat wi sehn könen, is mit Stenen un Bomen dichtmüürt. Ick bün bang, dat wi de nödigen Materialien, de wi bruken, um een nejes Schipp to bauen, nich finnen könen.

source: As we don’t know how many resources we can get, we should be very restrictive in spending them. Even for military buildings, we should be very careful.
target: Wi weten nich, wo völe Materialien wi kriegen könen, also sallen wi blot nich to vööle verklüngeln. Ok för Soldateree-Boen mutten wi leep good uppassen.

source: Sire, Amalea is right about the resources. Therefore I correct myself. We should only build an outpost as this is the most effective military building.
target: Mienheer, Amalee’ hett Recht över de Materialien. Ick änner mienen Raad. Wi sallen blot eene Butenstee bauen, wat de goodkopenste Soldateree-Boo is.

source: Now that we have all resources ready for building a ship, we should explore the surrounding islands.
target: Nu dat wi alle Materialien paraat hebben, um een Schipp to bauen, sallen wi de Inseln umto utförsken.

source: Dismantle all unproductive small buildings to get some resources for new buildings.
target: Riet all unnützen lütten Husen platt, um Materialien för neje Husen to kriegen.

source: Use your resources wisely to train at least three fully promoted heroes.
target: Bruuk diene Waren klook, um tominnst dree Soldaten kumpleet uttobilden.

source: Excuse me Lutius, but I think the most critical resources in the current state of our economy are logs.
target: Dat deit mi Leed, Lutjus, aver uns’ Weertskupp bruukt nu vun Nood vör allem Boomstammen.

source: Dismantling the quarry: A builder will walk from the headquarters to dismantle the quarry piece by piece. Thereby, you regain some of the resources you used for the construction.
target: Dat Flintslagerhuus plattrieten: Een Baukeerl kummt vum Raadhuus, um dat Flintslagerhuus stückwies platttorieten. So kriggst du een paar vun de Materialien torügg, de tum Bauen verwendt wurren.

source: The citadel can house 12 soldiers, and it is the biggest military building the Barbarians can build. It also costs a lot of resources and takes a long time to build. It is most suited to guard strategically important points like constricted points or mountains.
target: Dat Kasteel hett Steden för 12 Soldaten un is de grootste Soldateree-Boo, wat de Willen Lüü bauen könen. ’t köst mennig Materialien un dat Bauen düürt lang. ’t is good gadelk, um taktisk dürable Steden as enge Passen of Bargen to schütten.

source: Keep an eye on your fishers and build a fish breeder’s house. After fish resources are exhausted in their work area, the fish supply cannot be regenerated.
target: Kiek up diene Fiskers un bau Fisstüchtereen. Wenn de Fiss leeg is, kann sik de Fiss-Versörgung nich verhalen.

source: Keep an eye on your fishers. After fish resources are exhausted in their work area, they will stop fishing.
target: Kiek up diene Fiskers. Wenn de Fiss leeg is, arbeiden se nich mehr.

source: The fish breeder working out of this fish breeder’s house can’t find any water where he can breed fish in his work area. Remember that you can only regenerate your fish resources if there ever were some fish in the vicinity in the first place.
target: De Fiss-Tüchter dat warkt bi deese Fisstüchteree hett keene Fiske tum Tüchten. Du kannst de Fiske blot dann vermehren, wenn daar jemaals welke weren.

source: Fish is one of the two major food resources of the Amazons. It is used by the food preserver to prepare rations for the workers digging for gold dust and granite. It is also consumed at the training sites (training glade and warriors’ gathering) and for recruiting new soldiers.
target: Fiss is eene vun de twee wichtigsten Aarden vun Spiesen för de Amazonen. De Spiesenköök maakt daarut Happen för de Arbeiderskes, wat na Goldstoff un Flint graven. ’t word ok vun de Övens-Boen (Övenshain un Soldatsken-Versammeln) bruukt un um neje Soldatsken antohüren.

source: A building is being dismantled at this dismantle site, returning some of the resources that were used during this building’s construction to your tribe’s stores.
target: Hier word een Huus plattreten, um eenige Waren torüggtokriegen, de tum Bauen verwendt wurren.

source: Fish is one of the biggest food resources of the Atlanteans. It has to be smoked in a smokery before being delivered to mines, training sites and scouts.
target: Fiss is eene vun de wichtigsten Spiesen för de Atlantinger. ’t mutt in eener Rökelkamer rökelt worden, ehr ’t vun Bargwarken, Övens-Boen un Bespejers bruukt worden kann.

source: This mine will exploit %1%%% of its resources. From there on out, it will only have a %2%%% chance of finding any more of them.
target: Deeses Bargwark haalt blot %1%%% vun de Mineraal ut de Grund. Vun dann an hett ’t blot eene Kans vun %2%%%, noch wat to finnen.

source: This mine will exploit all of its resources down to the deepest level. But even after having done so, it will still have a %1%%% chance of finding some more of them.
target: Deeses Bargwark haalt dat Mineraal kumpleet ut de Grund. Wenn ’t leeg is, kann ’t immer noch mit eener Kans vun %1%%% wat finnen.

source: Lutius. Well done. Well done. We have discovered all possible port locations in the complete region. Now we can strengthen our economy and we will manage to sail home soon.
target: Lutjus. Hunnert. Hunnert. Wi hebben all de Rüümte för Muden funnen, de ’t hier eenerwegens gifft. Nu könen wi uns’ Weertskupp starken un bold na Huus seilen.

source: Unlike ships which travel to any port where they’re needed, ferries have fixed transport routes called waterways. A waterway is built just like a road: You click on a flag near the shore, choose ‘Build a waterway’, and select the path for the waterway just as you would do for a road.
target: Schippen fahren tüsken elkeen Muden, waar se bruukt worden, aver eene Fähr hett eenen fasten Transpoort-Weg, wat Priel heet. Een Priel word jüüst as eene Straat baut: Du klickst up eene Fahn an de Küst, köörst »Priel bauen« ut, un köörst de Padd för de Priel ut, as du dat för Straten doost.

source: New port construction site is gone
target: Neje Rüümte för Muden is verswunnen

source: Widelands could not establish a connection to the given address. Either no Widelands server was running at the supposed port or the server shut down as you tried to connect.
target: Widelands kunn keen Verbinnen mit de angeven Adress maken. Of keen Widelands-Server leep an de angeven Port of de Server weer utknipst as du di verbinnen wullst.

source: Widelands was unable to use the local network. Maybe some other process is already running a server on port %s or your network setup is broken.
target: Widelands kunn dat stedenwies Nett nich bruken. Wahrschienelk bedrifft een anner Prozess al eenen Server up Port %s of diene Nett-Instellens sünd kaputt.

source: Connect to a different server port from the add-ons manager.
target: Vun de Verwiederns-Verwalter mit eenem anner Server-Port verbinnen.

source: To provide these foodstuffs, you can build a fisher’s house, a hunter’s house, a farm, a mill and a bakery.
target: Um deese Rohköst to produzeren, kannst du eene Fiskeree, een Jaggthuus, eene Buurderee un eene Backeree bauen.

source: Reebaud and his tribe are living happily in the North. Meanwhile, the countries they have left behind are all but peaceful, and an old friend is in desperate need for their help…
target: Reebaud un sien Volk leven glückelk im Noorden. In de Tüskentied sünd de Lannen, de se achter sik laten hebben, all anner as freedsaam, un een oller Fründ bruukt nödig hör Hülp …

source: An old legend tells that these seven kingdoms, that have flourished for ages in prosperity, will someday collapse into a devastating war. Has your latest betrayal been one too many and will the prophecy come true?
target: Een olles Vertellsel seggt, dat deese seven Königrieken, wat ewige Tieden lang in Riekdoom blöömt hebben, eenmaal in eenen alls verneelenden Krieg verfallen worden. Weer dien lester Verraad eener to vööl un word dat Vertellsel wahr worden?

source: It is said that the old war monks, living in the even older swamps, are the key to control over the whole island.
target: ’t heet, dat de ollen Kriegs-Mönken, wat in de noch ollern Broken leven, de Slötel tur Kuntroll över de ganze Insel sünd.

source: We found an old building, destroyed and burned by flames. I am very worried about this discovery. The building is not of any kind I’ve ever seen. It is certainly not designed by any Atlantean architect I’ve ever heard about. The building is crude, the assemblage is sloppy. But the materials are very enduring: the wood used for it seemed to have been burned in a strange way before it was used as building material – it is hard as stone.
target: Wi hebben een olles Huus funnen, verneelt un vun Füür verbrannt. Ick bün unbannig besörgt. Dat Huus sücht nich ut as elkeen, wat ick jemaals sehn hebb. Dat is wiss nich vun elkeen Atlantisken Baukeerl baut worden, vun well ick jemaals höört hebb. Dat Huus is simpel, dat Tosamenbauen sludderig. Aver de Materialien sünd bannig haart: Dat Holt is wull up eene komiske Aard brannt worden, ehr dat tum Bauen bruukt wurr – dat is so haart as Steen.

source: And yet another of these buildings. We know now that the tribe that built them once had complete control over the island. But I am no longer so scared of potential enemies. We know so much of this island already and there is no trace of this old economy to be found. I am starting to relax, but I will not let our guard down as we continue to explore this beautiful island. But without obvious dangers, I am feeling very much at home here already.
target: Un noch eens vun deesen Husen. Wi weten nu, dat de Lüü, well se baut hebben, maal de kumplete Insel kuntrolleert hebben. Aver ick bün nich mehr bang vör mögelken Feinden. Wi hebben al so vööl vun de Insel sehn un dat gifft keene Spoor vun deeser ollen Weertskupp. Ick bün verlichtert, aber natürelk mutten wir immer noch uppassen, as wi deese moje Insel wieder utförsken. Aver sünner grote Gefahren föhl ick mi hier al as tohuus.

source: It’s been months, and we are still hiding where the forests are old and dark.
target: ’t is Maanten her, un wi versteken uns immer noch in ollen, dunkeln Walden.

source: An old man says…
target: Een oller Mann seggt …

source: I have to hand it to you: you are right here, old man.
target: Dat mutt ick di geven, dat is wull so, oller Mann.

source: Well, old friend, this should ensure that our fortifications do not break down with our foes’ first battle cry! Now we can expand safely!
target: Na, oller Fründ, dat sall seker maken, dat uns’ Schanzen nich bi de eersten Slachtroop vun de Feinden kaputtgahn! Nu könen wi in Sekerheid verwiedern!

source: For now, we are resting at the borders of the old forest and preparing for the coming days.
target: Eerst maal maken wi bi de Grenzen vun de ollen Wald Rüst un maken all klaar för de anner Dagen.

source: The first fortification Thron ordered has just been completed. At the moment, he seeks to bring trust and belief to those who live inside the walls of our new habitat that we named ‘Ondun’, which means ‘those who wait’ in the old tongue. But Thron is not yet satisfied – and I fully understand his fears: the forests are deep, and the frontier to Al’thunran is near. I am sure that there are a thousand greater dangers out there than the unknown tracks.
target: De eersten Schanzen, wat Troon hett bauen laten, sünd nu beschickt. Jüüst nu will he Vertrauen un Free to de Lüü brengen, well in de Müren vun uns’ neje Stadt wohnen, wat wi »Onduun« benöhmt hebben. wat in de ollen Spraak »Se well wachten« hett. Aver Troon is noch nich tofree – un ick verstah siene Angst: De Walden sünd deep, un de Grenz vun Alltunraan is dicht bi. Ick bün mi seker, dat dat daar buten dusend slimmere Gefahren as de komsiken Sporen gifft.

source: Replace the old and ineffective forester’s houses
target: Verneei de ollen, unnützen Förster-Husen

source: Now we can start building farms to produce the beer which our miners need so desperately. Furthermore, the plans have enabled us to upgrade our old farms to get to work again.
target: Nu könen wi Buurdereen bauen, um dat Beer to produzeren, wat uns’ Bargwarkskeerls vun Nood bruken. Un de Planen maken dat ok mögelk, dat wi de ollen Buurdereen utbauen, daarmit se weer warken.

source: And guess what? They are very old. Their houses and tools are worn and their seed is degenerated. For this reason, they need much more time than usual for planting trees.
target: Na wat wull? Se sünd steenoll. De Husen un dat Warktüüg sünd bannig oll; de Saden ok. Daarum bruken se vööl langer as normaal, um Bomen to planten.

source: The only solution is to build two new forester’s houses near our lumberjacks. Be sure to first build a new forester’s house and then eventually destroy the old one or at least expel the forester to change houses.
target: De eenzigste Lösen is, twee neje Förster-Husen dicht bi de Boomhauers to bauen. Bau eerst een nejes Förster-Huus un dann brann dat olle of, of stüür tominnst de Förster weg, daarmit he in de nejen Husen gaht.

source: Unfortunately, we only have an arena and a very old and small training camp with very little storage capacity. And none of our builders knows how to improve this. Alas! But we need to use what we have to get prepared for battle.
target: Leider hebben wi blot eenen Ring un een bannig olles, lüttes Övens-Lager mit heel minn Rüümte för Waren. Un keener vun uns’ Baukeerls weet, wo man dat beter maakt. Ach! Wi mutten nehmen, wat wi kriegen könen, um uns för de Slacht to rüsten.

source: The barbarian tribe he mentioned is also a threat. I don’t want to share this land with anyone, as sharing only leads to conflicts and battles, as we saw in our old home. We must defeat the barbarians as well.
target: Dat Wille Volk, waar he vun sproken hett, is ok eene Gefahr. Ick will deeses Land mit nüms delen, wiel Delen blot to Stried un Kriegen föhrt, as wie in uns’ oller Heimaad sehn hebben. Wi mutten ok de Willen Lüü manntjen.

source: I want to find my old friend Reebaud as fast as I can. Every minute of idleness pains me as I imagine Atterdag gleefully trampling the green marshes of my Föhr under his dastard foot… Let’s make haste.
target: Ick will mien ollen Fründ Reebaud so fix finden as mögelk. Elkeen Menüüt in Nixdoon dood mi sehr, as ick mi vörstell, wo Atterdag bliede de grönen Marschen vun mien Föhr unner sienem mallen Foot vertrampelt … Wi mutten futtmaken.

source: Peace, King Angadthur! I am Claus Lembeck, and this is my son Henneke. We are searching for my old friend Reebaud, who has left our country several years ago to seek out a new home in the far North. If I may ask, have you heard of him before, and can you tell us where to find him?
target: Free, König Angadtuur! Ick bün Claus Lembeck, un dat is mien Söhn Henneke. Wi söken na uns’ ollen Fründ Reebaud, well uns’ Land vör een paar Jahren verlaten hett, um eene neje Heimaad in Noorden to bauen. Wenn ick jo fragen dür, hest du al vun hüm höört, un kannst du uns seggen, waar wi hüm finnen?

source: Peace, Sir Iniucundus! I am Claus Lembeck, and this is my son Henneke. We are just passing through as well. You are a legate, you say? You must be getting around a lot. Have you heard news of my old friend Reebaud? I only know that he is living in the North, can you tell us where to find him?
target: Free, Heer Iniucundus! Ick bün Claus Lembeck, un dat is mien Söhn Henneke. Wi sünd ok blot bi’m Dörreisen. Du büst een Legaat, seggst du? Du muttst völe Lannen kennen. Hest du Narichten vun mien ollen Fründ Reebaud höört? Ick weet blot, dat he im Noorden leevt, weetst du, waar wi hüm finnen könen?

source: Expand your territory until you meet your old friend Reebaud.
target: Vergroter dien Gewest, bit du dienen ollen Fründ Reebaud triffst.

source: An Old Friend
target: Een oller Fründ

source: Do my eyes deceive me, or is a spirit playing tricks on me? Surely it cannot be my old friend Claus who meets me so far away from home!
target: Verklappen mi miene Oogen, of trickt mi een Spöök ut? Dat kann man nich würrelk mien oller Fründ Claus wesen, well mi so wied von de Heimaad trifft!

source: An Old Enemy
target: Een oller Feind

source: The enemies have destroyed our last warehouse. No tribe could survive under these odds, and all we can do now is to face our certain fate with our heads held high. My only regret is that I will not be able to help my old friend Claus in his predicament. May the gods take pity on him, but I fear that all hope is lost.
target: De Feinden hebben uns’ lestes Kraamhuus verneelt. So kann keen Volk bestahn, un all wat wi nu noch könen, is, uns’ wiss Schicksaal mit hogem Kopp totogahn. Ich bedüür blot, dat ick mien ollen Fründ Claus in siener Nood nu nich hülpen kann. De Gotten sallen sik um hüm verbarmen, aver ick bün bang, dat ’t keen Hoop mehr gifft.

source: The remains of an old tree.
target: Wat vun eenem ollen Boom över blievt.

source: ‘New paths will appear when you are willing to tear down the old.’
target: »Neje Padden kummen ut, wenn du de ollen ok mal plattrietst.«

source: ‘Forming new stone from old with fire and water.’
target: »Nejen Steen ut ollem mit Füür un Water förmen.«

source:
An old Barbarian proverb
meaning that you need to take some risks sometimes.
target:
Eene olle Wille Seggwies,
wat bedüddt, dat du mennigmaal een Raakwark doon muttst.

source: Watch the replay of an old game
target: Dat Upteken vun eenem ollen Speel ankieken

source: You have two messages at the moment. This one, which you are currently reading, and the one that informed you that a new headquarters was added to your economy. Let’s learn how to archive messages:
