target: Du hest even twee Narichten. Deese hier, wat du upstünds leest, un eene, wat di över een nejes Raadhuus in diener Weertskupp informeert. Laat mi di lehren, wo dat Wegdoon vun Narichten gaht.

source: On MacOS, you can find the file called COPYING in the archive you downloaded from the website.
target: Up MacOS finnst du de Datei mit de Naam »COPYING« in de Paket, dat du vun de Internett-Sied runnerladen hest.

source: Manage your messages more efficiently: press ‘%1%’ to access the messages window, then use ‘%2%’ for Go To, and the ‘%3%’ key to archive messages.
target: Kümmer di fixer um diene Narichten: Drück »%1%«, um dat Narichten-Fenster opentokregen, bruuk dann »%2%«, um daarhen to gahn, un de »%3%«-Tast, um de Naricht wegtodoon.

source: It is produced by the smelting works and used by the armor smithy, the weapon smithy and the gold spinning mill.
target: ’t word vun de Smeltwark produzeert un in Panzersmeden, Wapensmeden un de Goldspinneree bruukt.

source: As your road network gets longer and more complicated, you should employ horses to help out your carriers. Horses are bred at horse farms using water and corn. A warehouse will also help to ensure that your transportation system does not collapse.
target: As dien Stratennett groter un kumplizeerter word, sallst du Peer in Deenst stellen, um dienen Lastendragers to helpen. Peer worden in Peertüchtereen mit Water un Mais tücht. Een Kraamhuus helpt ok, dat dien Stratennett nich tosamenbreckt.

source: But all seemed well. Only the horses seemed to feel something was wrong. During the nights, they went crazy and were full of fear. It was not long before the horse breeder Xydra figured out what was wrong with them: the sea level in front of their stable was rising with ever increasing speed.
target: Aver all sach good ut. Blot de Peer hebben sik een bietje komisk benohmen. In de Nacht weren se ganz dördreiht un rappelig. Na körter Tied hett de Peertüchter Skied’ utfunnen, wat löss weer: De See tegen hör Stallen leep immer gauer up.

source: People are complaining about crowded streets and slow transportation. We need to help out our carriers on the roads. I have decided to build a horse farm so that the horses can help with the heavy wares.
target: De Lüü beswaaren sik, dat de Straten to besig sünd un dat Transporteren to langsaam gaht. Wi mutten de Lastendragers up de Straten helpen. Ick will eene Peertüchteree bauen, daarmit de Peers mit de swaren Waren helpen könen.

source: A trader is a scout who needs a horse to transport the wares.
target: Een Hannelsmann is een Bespejer, well een Peer bruukt, um de Waren to dragen.

source: Water is used in the bakery and the horse and spider farms.
target: Water word in de Backeree, de Peertüchteree un de Spinnentüchteree bruukt.

source: This corn is processed in the mill into fine cornmeal that every Atlantean baker needs for a good bread. Also horse and spider farms need to be provided with corn.
target: Deeser Mais word in Möhlen to Maismehl verarbeidt, wat elkeen Atlantisker Backer för godes Brood bruukt. Ok Peertüchtereen un Spinnentüchtereen mutten mit Mais versörgt worden.

source: Horses help to carry items along busy roads. They are reared in a horse farm.
target: Peer dragen Waren över besige Straten. Se worden in de Peertüchteree tücht.

source: We need to send the wares to Kalitath with our trader. He will pick them up as soon as a batch is ready in his trading post.
target: Wi mutten de Waren mit uns’ Hannelsmann an Kalitat schicken. He nimmt se an, sobold een Packje in sienem Hannelsposten ankummt.

source: Expeditions can be started in every port. Then, all needed wares are transported to that port. The wares are exactly those your tribe needs to build a port (your goal is to build a port far away from home, so this is not surprising), and of course you need a builder, too. When everything is prepared, a ship will come and pick it up.
target: Du kannst eene Söke in elkeen Muu begünnen. Alle nödigen Waren worden dann to deese Muu brocht. De Waren sünd nau deese, de dien Volk bruukt, um eene Muu to bauen (du willst ja eene Muu wied weg bauen, also keene Överraschung), un du bruukst natürelk ok eenen Baukeerl. Wenn alls paraat is, kummt een Schipp un nimmt alls mit.

source:
‘Take your net and come to the sea
In the early morning the moon ya still see
Collect ya catch by net or by spear,
and don’t forget to give Satul his share.’
target:
Gah mit dien Nett tur Waterkant
Froh mörgens süchst’ noch Maan sien Rand
Treck de Angels ut de Fissen hör Muul
un vergeet nich to geven recht Pand an Satuul.

source: And you wouldn’t believe it, but nobody knows how to improve the technology or how to build more efficient buildings. I only heard some rumors about a monastery in the north where the priestesses are supposed to possess some knowledge about improved technologies.
target: Un wat wull, nüms weet, wo man se utbaut of betere Husen baut. Ick hebb blot Gerüchten över een Klooster im Noorden höört, waar de Preesterinnen na ’t Seggen wat över betere Techniken weten.

source: I’m not sure if that was the right thing to do. Yes, we have obtained the plans. But although we are now able to build and upgrade our mills and breweries with the improved technology, we will never know if and how Vesta and her priestesses could have helped us against the Barbarians.
target: Ick weet nich, wat wi doon sallen. Jau, wi hebben de Planen. Wi könen nu de Möhlen un Broereen mit de nejen Technik utbauen, aver wi worden nie weten, of un wo Vesta un hör Preesterinnen uns tegen de Willen Lüü hülpen könen.

source: General, our armies just swept over the priestesses and conquered the plans. That was a rather easy victory.
target: Offizeer, uns’ Soldateree hett de Preesterinnen mit links manntjet un de Planen innohmen. Dat weer een lichter Sieg.

source: In the temple of Vesta, the wares to worship are stored. It is the home of the priestesses and the guards of the goddess.
target: In Vestas Tempel worden de Waren lagert, wat man tum Anbeden bruukt. Daar wohnen ok de Preesterinnen un de Wahrders vun de Gottin.

source: The tribe or team that can defeat all others wins the game! This means the opponents do not have any headquarters, ports or warehouses left.
target: De Volk of Klottje dat manntjet all anner winnt dat Speel! Dat heet, dat de Feinden keene Raadhusen, Muden of Kraamhusen mehr hebben.

source: Begin or load a single-player campaign or free game
target: Eene Rutfödderung of frejes Speel för eenen Speler begünnen of wiederspölen

source:
‘Soon may the wellerman come,
to bring us bread and smoked fish.
We set sail for a faraway shore
we praise Satul the best we wish.’
target:
»Bold word kummen een Schipp vull Kisten,
dat brengt uns Brood un rökelt Fisken.
Wi sailen feern to frömden Küsten
un för Satuul dat Best wi wünsken.«

source: Great! Erwyn gave up when he saw his last buildings burning down. That’s one less strong warlord on this island!
target: Hunnert! Erwin hett upgeven as he siene lesten Husen ofbrannen sach. Dat is een machtiger Kummandant minner up de Insel!

source: Great! Jomo gave up when he saw his last buildings burning down. That’s one less warlord on this island!
target: Hunnert! Jomo hett upgeven as he siene lesten Husen ofbrannen sach. Dat is een Kummandant minner up de Insel!

source: Today I saw the first recruits gathering in front of the new barracks. If everything goes well, they should receive their training soon.
target: Ick hebb vandag de eersten Lehrwichter sehn, as se vör de neje Kasern stunnen. Se worden wull bold to Soldaten utbildt.

source: Last night however, we sighted a new island. We saw smoke hovering over it. The black comes from the fiery mountain in the north of the island, the grey however comes from settlers.
target: Aver leste Nacht hebben wi eene neje Insel to sehn kregen. Wi hebben Qualm daaröver sehn. De swarte kummt ut Füürbargen in de Noorden vun de Insel, de graue aver kummt vun Lüden.

source: When I looked around, I saw faithful faces, trusting that I could guide them through these dark days. Yet before I could speak any words of gratitude or encouragement, one of my warriors ran into the inn. He had been far out in the forest for the past days and I could see how weary he was.
target: As ick mi umsehn hebb, hebb ick Gesichten sehn, wat vull vun Toversicht mi trauen, dat ick se in deeser dunkern Tied föhren kann. Aver ehr ick wat vun Dankbaarheid of Tospraak seggen kunn, is een Soldat in de Kroog rannt. He weer eenige Dagen buten in de Wald un ick kunn sehn, wo sluff he weer.

source: When I gazed at the horizon, I still saw crimson lights flicker in the distance. It is incredible with how much passion my brethren fight this war. I fear the moment I will see Al’thunran again – will there be anything but ashes and wasted ruins left of our once beautiful capital when we get there?
target: As ick to de Kimm kiekt hebb, hebb ick bloodrode Lüchten in de Feernte flackern sehn. Dat is nich to faten, mit wo vööl Begeisterung miene Bröörs deesen Krieg föhren. Ick hebb Angst vör de Tied, wenn ick Alltunraan weer seh – is noch wat anners as Aske un Ruinen vun uns’ maal-wunnermojen Höövdstadt över, wenn wi daar hen komen?

source: The traitor left his armies dying where they lay when he saw that he would not keep my forces back. Kalitath disappeared in the confusion of the war, but I don’t care now. Shall he flee and be forgotten for all times as a tribal leader that would not bow before the wooden throne, that is mine to take now.
target: De Verräter hett siene Soldaten liegen laten, waar se starven, as he sehn hett, dat he miene Soldateree nich torügghollen kann. Kalitat is im Krieg wegslichen, aver dat is mi egaal. Sall he doch weglöpen un för all Tieded as een Anföhrer vergeten worden, well sik nich vör de holten Throon verbugen wull, wat ick nu innehmen sall.

source: Still, I saw no way that I could erase my shame without fighting against these Barbarians. So, I left Fremil by boat to find a new world and a new life for myself, somewhere in the south. Now I am sailing on the Gulf of Perl with my family, some of my friends and a few of my best warriors.
target: Ick wuss nich, wo ick mien Schann ohne eene Slacht tegen de Willen Lüü liekmaken kann. Also hebb ick Freemilt up eenem Schipp verlaten, um eene neje Heimaad un een nejes Leven to finnen, enerwaar im Süden. Upstünds seil ick in de Parrelsbucht mit mien Familie, eenigen Frünnen un een paar vun mienen besten Soldaten.

source: We landed on an unknown coast and found peaceful rest under the palm trees growing at the shore. But that is about as good as it gets. The truth is: when I woke up this morning, I saw nothing but sand around us.
target: Wi sünd up eener frömden Küst lannt un kunnen uns unner de Palmen an de Waterkant hagelk verhalen. ’t is as ’t is, man nich as ’t wesen mutt. De Wahrheid is: as ick vunmörgens upwaakde, hebb ick nix as Sand sehn.

source: Sire, I saw that the construction of the blockhouse was completed, so I have assigned one of my best soldiers to it to keep watch on the desert.
target: Mienheer, ick hebb sehn, dat de Wachters-Kamerke nu beschickt is. Ick hebb eenen vun mienen besten Soldaten schickt, över de Wüüst to wachten.

source: At first, I was naive and hoped that they were peaceful, but as soon as one of them saw me, they charged towards me and started attacking me with their throwing spears. Thanks be to the Gods that I was able to flee and hide myself, before retreating back to our colony under cover of darkness.
target: Vörderhand was ick so eenfoldig, to glöven, se wesen villicht freedsam, aver as eener vun hör mi sehn hett, sünd se all to mi henlöpptun hebben Speren na mi smeten. De Gotten Loff un Dank dat ick flüchten un mi versteken kunn, ehr ick im Dunkeln torügg in uns’ Dörp gahn kunn.

source: Sire, I saw that the construction of the outpost was completed, so I have assigned some of my best soldiers to it to keep the watch.
target: Mienheer, ick hebb sehn, dat de Butenstee nu beschickt is. Ick hebb een paar vun mienen besten Soldaten tum Schildern schickt.

source: The barbarian tribe he mentioned is also a threat. I don’t want to share this land with anyone, as sharing only leads to conflicts and battles, as we saw in our old home. We must defeat the barbarians as well.
target: Dat Wille Volk, waar he vun sproken hett, is ok eene Gefahr. Ick will deeses Land mit nüms delen, wiel Delen blot to Stried un Kriegen föhrt, as wie in uns’ oller Heimaad sehn hebben. Wi mutten ok de Willen Lüü manntjen.

source: In every military building, you can set the preference for heroes (trained soldiers) or rookies. From time to time, a soldier will walk out of the building and be replaced by a stronger/weaker one automatically – this is what you saw earlier.
target: För elkeen Soldateree-Boo kannst du fastleggen, of Helden (utbildt Suldaten) of Snöttbaarten vörtrucken worden. Of un an verlaat een Soldat dat Huus un word automatisk mit eenem starkeren/swackeren utwesselt – dat hest du vörhen sehn.

source:
‘When I saw the Saxnot for the first time, her majestic dragon head already looked up to the skies and the master was about to install the square sail.
It was the most noble ship I ever saw.’
target:
»As ick de ›Saxnot‹ tum eersten Maal sehn hebb, hett hör machtiger Draak al tu de Hemel kiekt un de Baukeerl hett jüüst dat Quadraat-Seil inbaut.
Dat weer dat mooiste Schipp, wat ick jemaals sehn hebb.«

source: I came, I saw, I conquered!
target: Ick kamm, ick sach, ick siegde!

source: An expedition ship reached a coast and is waiting for further commands.
target: Een Schiüü up Söke hett een Küst funnen un wacht för dien Gebodd.

source: In this tutorial, you will get to know seafaring, which is how to handle ships and ports, and how to use ferries and waterways.
target: In deeser Inföhren lehrst du, wo du Schippen, Muden, Fähren un Prielen bruukst.

source: Isn’t it lovely, the view of golden fields, growing peacefully, dancing to the wind? And I believe the baker is just on his way here, with his most delicious bread reserved for our chieftain alone!
target: Is dat nich ewigsmooi, deese gülden Ackers, wo se in Free wassen un im Wind danzen? Un ick gloov, de Backer is jüüst up de Weg na hier, mit sienem besten Brood, wat alleen för uns’ Anföhrer dacht is!

source: Center view on this
target: Hierher springen

source: Center the main view on this
target: Hierher springen

source: But all seemed well. Only the horses seemed to feel something was wrong. During the nights, they went crazy and were full of fear. It was not long before the horse breeder Xydra figured out what was wrong with them: the sea level in front of their stable was rising with ever increasing speed.
target: Aver all sach good ut. Blot de Peer hebben sik een bietje komisk benohmen. In de Nacht weren se ganz dördreiht un rappelig. Na körter Tied hett de Peertüchter Skied’ utfunnen, wat löss weer: De See tegen hör Stallen leep immer gauer up.

source: If you don’t have iron, change your name from blacksmith to lacksmith!
target: Wenn du keen Iesen hest, maak ick ut diener Smede eene Mede!

source: To learn how far your soldiers have progressed in their training, you can have a look at their icons. They are modified by red dots:
target: Um to sehn, welke Öven-Standen een Soldat hett, kiek di siene Tekens an. Daar worden rode Punkten upmaalt:

source: Your soldiers have occupied your fortification.
target: Diene Soldatsken hebben dien Kasteel besett.

source: The enemy defeated your soldiers at the fortification.
target: De Feinde hebben diene Soldatsken in eenem Kasteel manntjet.

source: Your soldiers defeated the enemy at the fortification.
target: Diene Soldatsken hebben de Feinde in eenem Kasteel manntjet.

source: Your soldiers have occupied your fortress.
target: Diene Soldatsken hebben diene Schanz besett.

source: The enemy defeated your soldiers at the fortress.
target: De Feinde hebben diene Soldatsken in eene Schanz manntjet.

source: Your soldiers defeated the enemy at the fortress.
target: Diene Soldatsken hebben de Feinde in eene Schanz manntjet.

source: Your soldiers have occupied your observation tower.
target: Diene Soldatsken hebben dienen Wachtoorn besett.

source: The enemy defeated your soldiers at the observation tower.
target: De Feinde hebben diene Soldatsken in eenem Wachtoorn manntjet.

source: Your soldiers defeated the enemy at the observation tower.
target: Diene Soldatsken hebben de Feinde in eenem Wachtoorn manntjet.

source: Your soldiers have occupied your patrol post.
target: Diene Soldatsken hebben dien Vörpostje besett.

source: The enemy defeated your soldiers at the patrol post.
target: De Feinde hebben diene Soldatsken in eenem Vörpostje manntjet.

source: Your soldiers defeated the enemy at the patrol post.
target: Diene Soldatsken hebben de Feinde in eenem Vörpostje manntjet.

source: Your soldiers have occupied your tower.
target: Diene Soldatsken hebben dienen Toorn besett.

source: The enemy defeated your soldiers at the tower.
target: De Feinde hebben diene Soldatsken in eenem Toorn manntjet.

source: Your soldiers defeated the enemy at the tower.
target: Diene Soldatsken hebben de Feinde in eenem Toorn manntjet.

source: Your soldiers have occupied your treetop sentry.
target: Diene Soldatsken hebben dien Boompostje besett.

source: The enemy defeated your soldiers at the treetop sentry.
target: De Feinde hebben diene Soldatsken in eenem Boompostje manntjet.

source: Your soldiers defeated the enemy at the treetop sentry.
target: Diene Soldatsken hebben de Feinde in eenem Boompostje manntjet.

source: Your soldiers have occupied your warriors’ dwelling.
target: Diene Soldatsken hebben diene Soldatskenstuuv besett.

source: The enemy defeated your soldiers at the warriors’ dwelling.
target: De Feinde hebben diene Soldatsken in eener Soldatskenstuuv manntjet.

source: Your soldiers defeated the enemy at the warriors’ dwelling.
target: Diene Soldatsken hebben de Feinde in eener Soldatskenstuuv manntjet.

source: Your soldiers have occupied your tower.
target: Diene Soldatsken hebben dienen Toorn besett.

source: The enemy defeated your soldiers at the tower.
target: De Feinde hebben diene Soldatsken in eenem Toorn manntjet.

source: Your soldiers defeated the enemy at the tower.
target: Diene Soldatsken hebben de Feinde in eenem Toorn manntjet.

source: Your soldiers have occupied your fortress.
target: Diene Soldatsken hebben diene Schanz besett.

source: The enemy defeated your soldiers at the fortress.
target: De Feinde hebben diene Soldatsken in eene Schanz manntjet.

source: Your soldiers defeated the enemy at the fortress.
target: Diene Soldatsken hebben de Feinde in eene Schanz manntjet.

source: Your soldiers have occupied your tower.
target: Diene Soldatsken hebben dienen Toorn besett.

source: The enemy defeated your soldiers at the tower.
target: De Feinde hebben diene Soldatsken in eenem Toorn manntjet.

source: Your soldiers defeated the enemy at the tower.
target: Diene Soldatsken hebben de Feinde in eenem Toorn manntjet.

source: Your soldiers have occupied your fortress.
target: Diene Soldatsken hebben diene Schanz besett.

source: The enemy defeated your soldiers at the fortress.
target: De Feinde hebben diene Soldatsken in eene Schanz manntjet.

source: Your soldiers defeated the enemy at the fortress.
target: Diene Soldatsken hebben de Feinde in eene Schanz manntjet.

source: Your soldiers have occupied your tower.
target: Diene Soldatsken hebben dienen Toorn besett.

source: The enemy defeated your soldiers at the tower.
target: De Feinde hebben diene Soldatsken in eenem Toorn manntjet.

source: Your soldiers defeated the enemy at the tower.
target: Diene Soldatsken hebben de Feinde in eenem Toorn manntjet.

source: Your soldiers have occupied your fortress.
target: Diene Soldatsken hebben diene Schanz besett.

source: The enemy defeated your soldiers at the fortress.
target: De Feinde hebben diene Soldatsken in eene Schanz manntjet.

source: Your soldiers defeated the enemy at the fortress.
target: Diene Soldatsken hebben de Feinde in eene Schanz manntjet.

source: Your soldiers have occupied your tower.
target: Diene Soldatsken hebben dienen Toorn besett.

source: The enemy defeated your soldiers at the tower.
target: De Feinde hebben diene Soldatsken in eenem Toorn manntjet.

source: Your soldiers defeated the enemy at the tower.
target: Diene Soldatsken hebben de Feinde in eenem Toorn manntjet.

source: This tasty bread is made in cassava root cookeries out of cassava root and water. It is the basic ingredient of a ration that is made by a food preserver. Soldiers like it too.
target: Deeses leckere Brood word in eener Maniok-Wuddel-Köök ut Maniok-Wuddels un Water maakt. Daarut maakt de Spiesenköök Happen. Ok Soldatsken mögen dat.

source: This spear has a stone spike. It is produced in a stone workshop and used in a warriors’ gathering – together with food – to train soldiers from attack level 0 to attack level 1.
target: Deese Pieke hett eene Tipp vun Steen. ’t word in de Steenwarkeree produzeert un in de Soldatsken-Versammeln – tosamen mit Spiesen – bruukt, um Soldatsken vun Angriff-Stand 0 up Stand 1 uttobilden.

source: This is a hardened spear with a stone tip. It is produced in a stone workshop and used in a warriors’ gathering – together with food – to train soldiers from attack level 1 to level 2.
target: Deese haarte Pieke hett eene Tipp vun Flint. ’t word in de Steenwarkeree produzeert un in de Soldatsken-Versammeln – tosamen mit Spiesen – bruukt, um Soldatsken vun Angriff-Stand 1 up Stand 2 uttobilden.

source: A wooden helmet is a basic piece of equipment for protecting soldiers. It is produced by the dressmaker and used to train soldiers from health level 1 to level 2.
target: Een Holthelm is een eenfacher Schuur för Soldatsken. ’t word vun de Naihsterske produzeert un bruukt, um Soldatsken vun Gesundheid-Stand 1 up Stand 2 uttobilden.

source: Rubber can be bound into a tunic, which is used as basic armor. All new soldiers are clothed in a tunic.
target: Gummi elasticum kann man to Umhangen warken, wat eenen eenfachen Wapenrock bilden. All nejen Soldatsken bruken sülk eenen Umhang.

source: Sturdy boots are excellent footwear for soldiers to be quicker on their feet. They are produced by the dressmaker and used to train soldiers’ evade from level 0 to level 1.
target: Mit Goden Stevels könen de Soldatsken fixer lopen. Se worden vun de Naihsterske produzeert un bruukt, um Soldatsken vun Utwieken-Stand 0 up Stand 1 uttobilden.

source: Swift boots are light and durable footwear for soldiers to be quicker on their feet. They are produced by the dressmaker and used to train soldiers’ evade from level 1 to level 2.
target: Gaue Stevels sünd lichte un stevige Stevels, daarmit de Soldatsken fixer lopen könen. Se worden vun de Naihsterske produzeert un bruukt, um Soldatsken vun Utwieken-Stand 1 up Stand 2 uttobilden.

source: Produces spears for soldiers and tools for workers.
target: Produzeert Pieken för Soldatsken un Warktügen för Arbeidersken.

source: Your workers and soldiers will find shelter here. Also stores your wares and tools.
target: Brengt diene Lüü un Soldatsken unner un verwahrt diene Waren un anner Kraam.

source: Serves as a base for overseas colonization and trade. Also stores your soldiers, wares and tools.
target: Deent tum Begünnen vun Hannel un Söken över Seefahrt. Brengt ok diene Lüü un Soldatsken unner un verwahrt diene Waren un anner Kraam.

source: Similar to the Headquarters a Port can be attacked and destroyed by an enemy. It is recommendable to send soldiers to defend it.
target: As ok dat Raadhuus, kann eene Muu vun Feinden angriepen un verneelt worden. Schick beter Soldatsken, um se to verteidigen.

source: Trains soldiers in Attack up to level 2. Equips the soldiers with all necessary weapons.
target: Lehrt Soldatsken Angriff bit tum Stand 2. Rüst de Soldatsken mit all nödigen Wapen ut.

source: Amazon soldiers need chocolate to train properly.
target: Amazoonsk Soldatsken bruken Schokolaa bi’m Öven.

source: Garrisons soldiers to expand your territory.
target: Brengt Soldatsken unner, um dien Gewest to vergrotern.

source: If you’re low on soldiers to occupy new military sites, use the downward arrow button to decrease the capacity. You can also click on a soldier to send her away.
target: Wenn du nich genoog Soldatsken hest, um neje Soldateree-Boen to besetten, kannst du de Tahl vun Soldatsken mit de Piel-runner-Knoop minnern. Du kannst ok eene Soldatske anklicken, um se wegtostüren.

source: %1% soldiers (+%2%)
target: %1% Soldatsken (+%2%)
%1%(+%2%) Soldatsken (+%3%)

source: Food is very important for mines and military training areas. Establish a well working food environment by building at least one farm, one blackroot farm and a mill. The two kinds of flour together with water from a well will be baked into bread in a bakery, so build a bakery and a well, too.
target: Spiesen sünd leep wichtig för Bargwarken un Övens-Boen för Soldaten. Bau eene gode Versörgung mit Spiesen up, indeem du tominnst eene Buurderee, eene Swartwuddel-Buurderee un eene Möhlen baust. De twee Aarden vun Mehl worden mit Water ut eener Well in eener Backeree to Brood backen, bau also ok eene Backeree un eene Well.

source: In this scenario, I’m going to tell you about soldiers, their training and their profession: warfare. Although Widelands is about building up, not burning down, there is an enemy you sometimes have to defeat. Yet warfare is mainly focused on economics, not on military strategies, and its mechanics deserve explanation.
target: In deese Inföhren verklaar ick di Soldaten, hör Utbildung un hör Beruf: Krieg. In Widelands gaht ’t um Upbauen, nich Ofbrannen, aver of un an mutt du eenen Feind manntjen. Bi’m Krieg gaht ’t in ’t Geheel um de Weertskupp, nich taktiske Dingen, aver Slachten mutten doch verklaart worden.

source: Your soldiers will leave the fortress while the construction is going on. This means that your fortress will lose its military influence, as I described above.
target: Diene Soldaten verlaten de Schanz as ’t utbaut word. Diene Schanz schütt unnertüsken dat Land nich mehr, as ick al beschreven hebb.

source: Some say that impenetrable lands to the far north scared away even the most courageous settlers and the bravest of the brave warriors. Big and old forests, full of big and predatory game, cut across by wetlands and hills were shrouded in mystery. The ones who had managed to come back mentioned tremendous buildings, decorated with carvings and gold from majestic mountain ranges somewhere amongst the wilderness. Dozens of years after only some crumbly ruins remain of these good old times, covered with moss and trees. Their shapes give only an idea about the craftsmanship of ancient constructors. Nobody knows why they (have) disappeared. Nobody knows why. People say that now nothing is blocking the road to wealth. But many will die pulled apart by wolves, engulfed by swamp… encircled by hostile tribes.
target: Eenige seggen, dat de unbetredtbaren Lannen wied im Noorden sülvst de modigsten Siedlers un de dappersten vun all dappern Kriegers ofschricken. Grote, olle Walden, vull vun groten wilden Deerten; daartüsken Broken un Höchten vull vun Geheemnissen. De minnen, well torügg komen sünd, hebben vun machtigen Husen vertellt, updaan mit Sniddjereen un Gold vun baldadigen Bargen in de Midde vun de Wildernis. Hunnerte Jahre daarna sünd vun deesen goden ollen Tieden nix as grusige Ruinen över, bedeckt vun Moss un Bomen. Hör Formen laten de Künst vun de ollen Baukeerls blot ahnen. Nüms weet, waarum se nich mehr daar sünd. Nüms weet dat. De Lüü seggen, dat nu nix mehr up de Straat tum Riekdoom liggt. Aver völe mutten vun Wulfen freten worden, vun Broken verslungen … vun feindelk Völkers umringt.

source: Wilderness keepers ensure fresh game for hunting and fish for fishing. Game is only released near trees uninhabited by sentries.
target: Fauna-Wahrdersken passen up, dat ’t alltieden Deerten tum Jagen un Fisse tum Fisken gifft. Deerten worden blot bi Bomen freeilaten, waar keene Postjes stationeert sünd.

source: No Game, No Fish
target: Keene Deerten un keen Fiss

source: Out of Game and Fish
target: Hebb keene Fiske un Deerten mehr

source: The hunter-gatherer working out of this hunter-gatherer’s hut can’t find any game or fish in her work area.
target: De Jägerske-Pottjerske, de bi deese Jägerske- un Pottjerske-Kaat warkt, hett keene Fisse tum Fangen un keene Deerten tum Jagen.

source: The hunter working out of this hunter’s house can’t find any game in his work area.
target: De Jäger, de bi deese Jaggthuus warkt, hett keene Deerten tum Jagen.

source: The hunter working out of this hunter’s hut can’t find any game in his work area. Remember that you can build a gamekeeper’s hut to release more game into the wild.
target: De Jäger, de bi deese Jaggthuus warkt, hett keene Deerten tum Jagen. Du kannst neje Deerten tüchten, wenn du een Deertentüchteree baust.

source: The hunter working out of this hunter’s house can’t find any game in his work area.
target: De Jäger, de bi deese Jaggthuus warkt, hett keene Deerten tum Jagen.

source: The hunter working out of this hunter’s house can’t find any game in his work area.
target: De Jäger, de bi deese Jaggthuus warkt, hett keene Deerten tum Jagen.

source: Meat contains a lot of energy, and it is obtained from wild game taken by hunter-gatherers.
target: In Fleesk steckt bannig vööl Energie. ’t word vun Jägerske-Pottjersken produzeert, indeem se wille Deerten jaggen.

source: Breeds game or fish.
target: Tücht Deerten of Fiske.

source: Breeds fish and game to renew food resources.
target: Tücht Fiss un Deerten, um de Spiesen-Versörgung sekertostellen.

source: The wilderness keeper will only release new game at a nearby tree which is not being used as a lookout.
target: De Fauna-Wahrderske kann neje Deerten blot bi Bomen, wat nich as Postjes bruukt worden, in de Naberskupp freeilaten.

source: Meat contains a lot of energy, and it is obtained from wild game taken by hunters.
target: In Fleesk steckt bannig vööl Energie. ’t word vun Jägers produzeert, indeem se wille Deerten jaggen.

source: Sometimes we end up in a region with no fish, so we must hunt. Game will reproduce by itself, if not hunted too much. But yes, fish is our main meal.
target: Of un an komen wi in een Geweest sünner Fiss, un dann mutten wi jagen. Deerten vermehren sik von sülvst, wenn man se nich to vööl jaggt. Aver jau, Fiss is unser leevstes Mahl.

source: ‘Fresh from the countryside: Bread, fish or game to go.’
target: »Frisk ut de Lannen: Brood, Fiss of Fleesk tum Mitnehmen.«

source:
‘Seasonal fish and game specialties served with pitta bread.
Choose from a prime selection of regional craft beer brands.’
target:
»Fiss- un Deerten- Gerichten na Jahrestied mit Pitta-Brood daarto.
Köör ut eenem Angebood vun de besten stedenwies Beer-Sorten ut.«

source: Whether to use the whole display for the game screen.
target: Of de hele Billschirm bruukt worden sall.

source: We have not much water left; our food is running low; we lost all our tools and most of our building materials with the third ship. We can’t afford to sail any further, and we must attempt to settle on this island as close as possible to our current position.
target: Wi hebben nich mehr vööl Water över; uns’ Eten word knapp; wi hebben all uns’ Warktüüg un dat Meest vun uns’ Baumaterialien mit de darden Schipp verloren. Wi könen eenfach nich wieder sailen un mutten vun Nood up deeser Insel lannen – so dicht bi uns’ aktuelle Stee as wi könen.

source: You may of course enhance all mines to deep mines instantly given you have the workers – bigger mines work a bit faster, smaller mines need cheaper food. It’s up to you which strategy you prefer.
target: Natürelk kannst du all Bargwarken stracks utbauen, wenn du de nödigen Arbeiders hest – deepe Bargwarken arbeiden een bietje gauer, lütte Bargwarken bruuken billigers Eten. Du maakst of, wat di lever is.

source: We need to build a tavern for preparing rations. To get the raw food, we have to build a fisher’s house, and as nobody likes raw fish, a smokery to smoke it. Furthermore, build a berry farm which will plant berry bushes, and a fruit collector’s house so the bushes will be harvested.
target: Wi bruken eene Kneipe, um Happen torechttomaken. Um dat ruge Eten to kriegen bruken wi eene Fiskeree, un wiel nüms rugen Fiss mag, eene Rökelkamer, um ’t to rökeln. Bau ok eene Buskenplanteree, de Busken för Früchten anplant, un eene Früchtenpottjeree, um de Busken to arnten.

source: First of all, he will need to take some food with him on his scouting trips. Fortunately, we have some rations in our warehouse.
target: Toeerst mutt he een bietje wat to Eten up sienen Spazeergang mitnehmen. Glückelkerwies hebben wi een paar Happen in uns’ Kraamhuus.

source: When provided with food, he will walk randomly around the area. You should follow his movement before fog of war hides what he saw.
target: Wenn he Eten hett, löppt he tofällig in de Kuntrei rum. Di sallst sienem Loop nagahn, ehr de Kriegsnevel weer verbargt, wat he sehn hett.

source: This tasty bread is made in bakeries out of cornmeal, blackroot flour and water. It is appreciated as basic food by miners, scouts and soldiers in training sites (labyrinth and dungeon).
target: Deeses leckere Brood word in Backereen ut Maismehl, Swartwuddel-Mehl un Water maakt. ’t is eene gode Spies för Bargwarkskeerls, Bespejers un Soldaten in Övens-Boen (Dwaalwegen un Gefahrelke Gangen).

source: A meal is made out of pitta bread, strong beer and fish/meat in a big inn. This substantial food is exactly what workers in a deeper mine need.
target: Een Mahl word in eenem Weertshuus ut Pitta-Brood, Deftigen Beer un Fiss of Fleesk maakt. Dat is wat de Arbeiders in eenem Bannig deepen Bargwark bruken.

source: The warrior’s ax is the most dangerous of all Barbarian weapons. Only a few soldiers ever were able to handle this huge and powerful ax. It is produced in a war mill and used – together with food – in a training camp to train soldiers from attack level 4 to level 5.
target: De Ridderext is de machtigste Wapen vun allen, de de Willen Lüü hebben. Bedröövt minn Soldaten könen deese grote, baldadige Ext bruken. ’t word in de Oorlogs-Smee produzeert un – tosamen mit Spiese – im Övens-Lager bruukt, um Soldaten vun Angriff-Stand 4 up Stand 5 to verbetern.

source: Fish is a very important food resource for the Frisians. It is fished from the shore or reared in aqua farms.
target: Fiss is eene bannig wichtige Spies för de Fresen. ’t word vun de Waterkant fiskt of in Fissbuurdereen tücht.

source: On the hidden and lost island of Atlantis, a proud tribe settled since the world was very young. Ruled by the bloodline of King Ajanthul – the first human to be empowered by the sea god Lutas to breathe above sea level – and the wise clerics, who provided the link to Lutas – they prospered and became civilized.
target: Up de verbargen un verlesen Insel Atlantis hett sik, as de Welt leep jung weer, een stoltes Volk daallaten. Vun de Stamm vun König Ajanthul – de eersten Minsk, de de Seegott Luutas de Macht geven hett, boven Water to amen – un de wiesen Pastoren, well de Verbinnen to Luutas weren, regeert, sünd se groot un kultüürriek worden.

source: But all seemed well. Only the horses seemed to feel something was wrong. During the nights, they went crazy and were full of fear. It was not long before the horse breeder Xydra figured out what was wrong with them: the sea level in front of their stable was rising with ever increasing speed.
target: Aver all sach good ut. Blot de Peer hebben sik een bietje komisk benohmen. In de Nacht weren se ganz dördreiht un rappelig. Na körter Tied hett de Peertüchter Skied’ utfunnen, wat löss weer: De See tegen hör Stallen leep immer gauer up.

source: The heavy weight plus the strong current was too much for the ship and it was pulled below the sea level by Lutas’ forces and we lost most men and all wares it carried.
target: De sware Last un daarto de baldadigen Drifften weren to vööl för dat Schipp, un Luutas in sien Macht hett ’t unner de See trocken, so dat wi de meesten Lüü un all de Waren daarup verloren hebben.

source: Enhance your metal workshop to an ax workshop in order to produce weapons, and build up a second metal workshop to ensure the production of tools. When the blacksmith reaches his next level (master blacksmith), you can even enhance the ax workshop to a war mill, which will produce additional weapons.
target: Bau diene Metalldreihbank to eener Extensmede ut, um Wapen to produzeren, un abu noch eene Metalldreihbank, um Warktüüg to produzeren. Wenn de Smidd mehr Erfahrung hett (een Meistersmidd word), kannst du de Extensmede to eener Oorlogs-Smee utbauen, wat noch mehr Wapen produzeren kann.

source: Most buildings will only produce something when the stock level in your warehouses falls below the target quantity, so you should indicate the reserve you want to stockpile.
target: De meesten Husen produzeren blot dann wat, wenn diene Kraamhusen minner Waren hebben, as de End-Tahl fastleggt. Du kannst so also fastsetten, wo völe Waren du överhollen willst.

source: No Level Ground
target: Hebb keen Klei mehr

source: The clay digger working at this clay pit can’t find any level ground in his work area. Consider dismantling this clay pit and rebuilding it somewhere else.
target: De Lehmgraver dat warkt bi deese Lehmkuhl hett keen Klei tum utbuddeln. Överlegg di, of du dat Huus plattrieten of ofbrannen un annerwegens wedde hensetten willst.

source: This mine will exploit all of its resources down to the deepest level. But even after having done so, it will still have a %1%%% chance of finding some more of them.
target: Deeses Bargwark haalt dat Mineraal kumpleet ut de Grund. Wenn ’t leeg is, kann ’t immer noch mit eener Kans vun %1%%% wat finnen.

source: This island once appeared out of the deepest depths of the sea. In those days, fire rose out of the salty seawater and brought ash, stones and soil to light. And the fire came nearer and nearer to the sun, while the mountain grew and grew. Until one day, when the whole fire mountain exploded. Nowadays only this ring is left from that mighty fire mountain. Do you think that it is big enough for more than one tribe?
target: Deese Insel is ut de deepsten Deepden vun de See komen. In deeser Tied is Füür ut de soltigen Seewater upstegen un hett Aske, Steen un Klei na boven brocht. Un dat Füür is naher un naher tur Sunn komen, as de Barg wasst un wasst. Bit de ganze Füürbarg an eenem Dag hooggahn is. Vandaag is vun deesem machtigen Füürbarg blot noch deeser Ring över. Gloovst du, dat is genoog för mehr as een Volk?

source:
‘Way down here in these golden grounds
with stones above us the thousand pounds
I dig in the dust until I see the spark;
The golden ore I find in the dark.’
target:
»In deesen depen golden Grünnen
unner Fels to dusend Tünnen
graav ick im Klei dör de stoffig Spold
bit ick finn im Düüster dat lechte Gold.«

source: If the food supply is steady, the rock mine can produce two blocks of granite in %s on average.
target: Wenn de Spiesen to rechter Tied ankomen, produzeert deeses Bargwark dör de Bank all %s twee Blocken Flint.

source: As your road network gets longer and more complicated, you should employ horses to help out your carriers. Horses are bred at horse farms using water and corn. A warehouse will also help to ensure that your transportation system does not collapse.
target: As dien Stratennett groter un kumplizeerter word, sallst du Peer in Deenst stellen, um dienen Lastendragers to helpen. Peer worden in Peertüchtereen mit Water un Mais tücht. Een Kraamhuus helpt ok, dat dien Stratennett nich tosamenbreckt.

source: Clear Road Network
target: Stratennett uprümen

source: Resolve the chaotic road network by clearing all unnecessary roads.
target: Rüüm deeses Kuddelmuddel vun eenem Stratennett up, indeem du all unnützen Straten wegdoost.

source: Oh no! Amalea is right. In fact, I can’t see any productivity at all. And the road network seems to be completely in shambles as well. Who might be responsible for this chaos?
target: Och nee! Amalee’ hett recht. Ick kann överhoopt keene Wöörde sehn. Un dat Stratennett is ok heel un daal in ’t Wilde. Well is wull för deeses Dörnanner verantwoordelk?

source: Oh, before I forget, there is another task to accomplish. While our builders are doing their job, somebody should clear up our road network. They are leaving us no space to place the buildings that we need.
target: Ach, un ehr ick dat vergeet, dat gifft noch mehr to doon. As uns’ Baukeerls warken, sall man uns’ Stratennett uprümen. Wi hebben vör luter Straten haast keene Rüümte för all de Husen, wat wi bruken.

source: Well done, well done. Our road network looks a lot more structured than before.
target: Hunnert, hunnert. Uns’ Stratennett sücht al beter ut as ehr.

source: Amalea Reminds to Clear Road Network
target: Amalee’ mahnt, dat Stratennett uptorümen

source: Amalea reminds Lutius of the scrambled road network…
target: Amalee’ mahnt Lutjus an dat bregenklöterge Stratennett …

source: Look Brother, I have just realized we haven’t cleared the road network yet. I think we should do so very quickly to free enough space for new buildings.
target: Broor, wi hebben immer noch nich dat Stratennett uprüümt. Dat mutten wi fix maken, um mehr Rüümte för neje Husen to kriegen.

source: That won’t do yet. I still need to connect the lumberjack’s hut to the rest of my road network. After ordering the construction site, I was automatically put into road building mode, so all I have to do is click on the blue flag in front of my headquarters.
target: Dat langt noch nich. Ick mutt dat Boomhauer-Huus eerst mit de Stratennett verbinnen. Nadeem ick de Baustee anörnt hebb, bün ick automatisk klaar tum Stratenbau. Ick mutt also blot de blaue Fahn vör mienem Raadhuus anklicken.

source: The shorter your road segments are, the faster your wares will be transported. You should therefore make sure that your roads have as many flags as possible.
target: So körter diene Straten-Delen sünd, so fixer worden diene Waren transporteert. Daarum sallst du so völe Fahnen as mögelk up diene Straten stellen.

source: Keep the slopes in mind while placing roads and use them to your advantage. Also, try to keep roads as short as possible and always remember to place as many flags as you can on road segments to share the load better.
target: Denk an de Schüünten wenn du Straten baust un bruuk se tu dienem Vördeel. Maak de Straten immer so kört un stell so völe Fahnen up as mögelk, daarmit de Last good verdeelt word.

source: Build a second quarry near the rocks and connect it to your road network.
target: Bau noch een Flintslagerhuus dicht bi de Stenen un verbinn ’t mit dienen Straten.

source: Never forget that these rowboats are too small to carry workers. You can use them as shortcuts for ware transport within parts of your territory, but not to claim regions you can reach neither by road nor by ship. Never cut all your roads between two places connected by waterways unless you are certain no worker will ever have to walk there.
target: Vergeet nie, dat deese Ruderboten to lütt sünd, um Arbeiders to dragen. Du kannst se as Ofkörtens för de Waren-Transpoort in dienem Gewest bruken, aver nich, um an Steden to komen, waar Straten un Schippen di nich henbrengen. Riet nie all Straten tüsken twee Steden, wat mit Prielen verbunnen sünd, of, wenn du nich seker büst, dat keen Arbeider daar jemaals lopen mutt.

source: And if your waterways present a significant shortcut between your road networks, your economy will tend to send many wares over the waterway. As a waterway can hold only one ferry – unlike roads, which receive a second carrier if they are very busy –, and as they often tend to be rather longer than the two or three fields recommended for roads, there is always a risk of waterways becoming severe bottlenecks in your economy. Try to build several of them in parallel to distribute the strain. If this is not possible, it is in some cases even more efficient not to use waterways.
target: Un wenn diene Prielen eene grote Ofkörten in dienem Stratennett sünd, word diene Weertskupp völe Waren över de Priel schicken. Een Priel kann blot eene Fähr hebben – anners as Straten, wat eenen tweden Lastendrager kriegen, wenn ’t vööl to doon gifft –, un wiel se oft länger sünd as de twee of dree Delen, wat för Straten anraden worden, könen Prielen licht to slimmen Buddelhalsen in diener Weertskupp worden. Versöök, een paar Prielen parallel to bauen, um de Last to verdeelen. Wenn dat nich gaht, kann dat sogaar beter wesen, keine Prielen to bruken.

source: When a building is destroyed, its workers will start looking for a nearby flag from which they can move by road to a connected warehouse. If there are no such flags in the vicinity, they will keep wandering around and eventually die.
target: Wenn een Huus ofrieten word, söken de Arbeiders na eener Fahn, vun waar se över Straten to een Kraamhuus komen könen. Wenn keene sülke Fahn in de Naberskupp is, wannern se sünner Stüür rum bit se starven.

source: I know it seems much, but the Senate did not furnish me with much money for this expedition, so I must admit I am in need of some.
target: Ick weet, wat dat vööl is, aver de Senaat hett mi nich mit vööl Geld för deese Upgaav utstaffeert, un ick mutt togeven, dat ick welkes bruuk.

source: The double-edged sword is the weapon used by level 3 soldiers. Level 6 soldiers are equipped with two of these ferocious swords.
target: Dat Tweesneidige Sweert is de Wapen, de Soldaten vum Stand 3 bruken. Soldaten vum Stand 6 hebben twee vun deesen grieselken Sweerten.

source: Now see where your foolishness has led us. The storm has broken and we’re all stuck here since you burnt down our port. The gods are just – even though you appear to be more powerful in combat than us, they force you to remain on this island for such a long time that you will never accomplish the objective of your futile journey. Despair in your triumph!
target: Nu kiekt, waar jo Dösigheid uns brocht hett. De Störm hett anfangen un wi sitten hier all fast, denn uns’ Muu hebbt jo daalbrannt. De Gotten sünd gerecht – ok wenn jo wull im Kampf machtiger weest as wi, dwingen se jo, up deeser Insel so lang to blieven, dat jo dat Enn vun jo vergeevs Fahrt nienich winnen könnt. Vertwiefelt in jo Sieg!

source: We do not train soldiers to evade attacks; a true warrior can block his opponent’s blows with a skillful twist of the sword instead of jumping away like a coward.
target: Wi lehren uns’ Soldaten nich, Angriffen uttowieken; een echter Soldat kann de Slagen vun sienem Tegenpart mit sienem Sweert mooi upfangen, in Stee, dat he as een Bangbüx herumhüppkt.

source: May Satul warm you, Jundlina. My name is Opol, and I am the highest weaver of the guild abandoning Atlantis and Lutas with you. I come with sad news indeed: we have no more spidercloth. Not a single piece is to be found in our warehouses. Could you not help the weavers’ guild by arranging the building of a weaving mill and a spider farm? The spiders deliver the finest silk and we will produce the finest spidercloth from it.
target: Satuul sall Jo warmen, Jundlin’. Mien Naam is Öpoll, un ick bin de eerste Spinner vun de Gild. wat Atlantis un Luutas mit Jo verlaten hett. Ick komm mit bannig slechten Narichten: Wi hebben keenen Spinnenstoff mehr. Nich een enkelt Deel is noch in uns’ Kraamhusen över. Kannst Jo de Spinners nich helpen, indeem Jo eene Spinnweelmöhlen un eene Spinnentüchteree bauen lettst? De Spinnen produzeren de beste Sied, un wi maken daar de beste Spinnenstoff vun.

source: May Satul warm you, Jundlina! The weaving mill, gold spinning mill and spider farm buildings are complete and are starting their work at this very moment. The weavers’ guild is very grateful for your support and we will stand by our word and deliver the first tabard very soon.
target: Satuul sall Jo warmen, Jundlin’! De Spinnweelmöhlen, Goldspinneree un Spinnentüchteree sünd kumpleet un begünnen jüüst nu to warken. De Spinners sünd bannig dankbaar för dien Unnerstütten und begünnen, as se versprocken hebben, bold de eersten Kluften to produzeren.

source: This is good news indeed, Opol. Our economy is developing very well. Go back to your work now, Opol, and may Satul warm you and all your guild members!
target: Dat sünd würrelk gode Narichten, Öpoll. Uns’ Weertskupp löppt bannig good. Gah nu torügg to diener Arbeid, Öpoll, un Satuul sall jo un all de anner Spinners warmen!

source: May Satul warm you, %s. As the highest weaver of the guild I have bad news for you. I just realized that we are running out of spidercloth. This is a most perilous case, for as you know, spidercloth is needed for many buildings.
target: %s, Satuul sall Jo warmen. As de hoogste vun all de Spinners breng ick slimme Narichten. Ick hebb jüüst markt, dat Spinnenstoff knapp word. Dat is bannig gefahrelk, denn as Jo weetst bruukt man Spinnenstoff för völe Husen.

source: %s, may Satul warm you! The weaving mill and spider farm are complete and the weavers’ guild can start their work again. I promise we will deliver the finest cloth and some tabards soon. Maybe we can build a gold spinning mill later on to make better tabards as well.
target: %s, Satuul sall Jo warmen! De Spinnweelmöhlen un Spinnentüchteree sünd fardig un de Spinners könen weer warken. Ick verspreck, dat wi bold de besten Stoff un ok een paar Kluften levern worden. Villicht könen wi later ok eene Goldspinneree bauen, um noch betere Kluften maken to könen.

source: You have completed all goals and defeated all our enemies. You have not only conquered our rivalling tribes, but you have also captured the hearts of your loving people.
target: Du hest all diene Upgaven ofsluten un all uns’ Feinden manntjet. Du hest nich blot de feinelk Volken innohmen, sünnern ok de Harten vun dienen Lüü, well di all good leven.

source: Six months ago, Lutius – a young general of the Empire – was sent with 150 soldiers to the frontier beyond the northern forests where Barbarian tribes were crossing onto land held by the Empire. His task was to defend the Empire’s land. At first, everything was calm. He even talked to a few Barbarian children and thought about a peaceful life – side by side with this archaic folk. He began to feel safer and his army began to drop their attention off the potential enemy. That was their undoing. One night in March his unprepared army was attacked by 100 Barbarian footmen and was completely scattered. Only with his bare life he and a handful of his soldiers survived.
target: Vör sess Maanten wurr Lutjus – een junger Offizeer vum Latiensken Riek – mit 150 Soldaten an de Grenz achtern de noordelken Walden schickt, waar de Willen Lüü ins Land vum Riek indrungen. Siene Upgaav weer, dat Land vum Riek to verdedigen. Eerst weer all friedelk. He snackde mit Willen Kinners un wullt in Freden leven – Sied an Sied mit de steenolle Volk. He meende, seker to wesen, un siene Soldaten achtden nich mehr up de mögelk Feinden. Dat weer een Fehler. In eener Määrtnacht wurren siene unrüsten Soldaten vun 100 Willen Stahfasten angrepen un heel un dall verjaggt. He un een paar vun sienen Soldaten överleevden mit nix as de blote Leven.

source: The mighty tribes of the east-lands.
target: De furchtbaaren Lüü vun de Lannen im Oosten.

source: Your territory can be expanded by building various military buildings – Sentry, Fortress, Blockhouse, etc.
target: Du kannst dien Gewest groter maken, indeem du Soldateree-Boen baust – to ’n Bispööl Wachters-Kamern, Schanzen of Toorns.

source: ‘2/4’ below your sentry: For military buildings, the stationed soldiers are shown instead of a productivity. You want to have four soldiers in your sentries, but only two soldiers are stationed in this kind of building. This leaves two vacant positions – we really need more soldiers.
target: »2/4« unner diener Wachters-Kamer: För Soldateree-Boen wiest dat Fenster de Tahl vun Soldaten un nich de Wöörde. Du willst veer Soldaten in dienen Wachters-Kamerken hebben, hest aver blot twee Soldaten in deesen Husen. ’t gifft also twee lege Steden – wi bruken absolut mehr Soldaten.

source: By the Gods, this is an unbelievable stroke of fortune! There are two more mountains, and it seems that one has a large quantity of coal and the other of iron ore. I advise you to immediately build iron and coal mines (or at least charcoal kilns), smelting works, toolsmithies, armor and weapon smithies.
target: Bi de Gotten, wat för een unbannigs Glück! ’t gifft noch twee anner Bargen, un ick gloov, de eene hett een Bült vun Köhle un de anner vun Iesenkluut. Ick raad Jo, stracks Iesen- un Köhle-Bargwarken (of tominnst Holtköhl-Brannereen), Smeltwarken, Warktüügsmeden, Wapensmeden un Panzersmeden to bauen.

source: I advise to build all those buildings within a short distance of each other, and to construct two warehouses nearby: One should be set to store only weapons, armor, ores, metal and coal; the other to store building materials.
target: Ick raad an, dat all deese Husen dicht binanner baut worden, un twee Kraamhusen in de Naberskupp: För eens sall fastleggt worden, dat ’t nix as Wapen, Panzers, Kluten, Metallen un Köhle verwahrt; de anner sall Baumaterialien upbewahren.

source: We will need a tailor’s shop to sew more protective garments, and another sewing room to keep producing normal fur garments. Also, you should enhance the small armor smithy to produce better weapons and helmets, and build a new small one so we will still get basic weapons. We need at least one gold mine now, because the best weapons and armor use gold.
target: Wi bruken eene Sniederee, um betere Schuulkluften to naihen, un eene neje Naiheree, um noch normaale Fellkluften to kriegen. Un du sallst de Lütte Wapensmee utbauen, um betere Wapen un Helms to produzeren, un eene neje Lütte bauen, darmit wi noch eenfache Wapen kriegen. Wi bruken nu tominnst een Gold-Bargwark, wiel de besten Wapen un Panzers Gold bruken.

source: However, we can already start focusing on recruiting and training soldiers. We can now afford to use metal for weapons, helmets and garments. I propose building armor smithies, a barracks, a training arena and a tailor’s shop now.
target: Aver wi könen al begünnen, uns um dat Anhüren un Utbilden vun Soldaten to kümmern. Wi könen uns nu günnen, Metall för Wapen, Helms un Kluften to bruken. Ick slaa vör, nu Wapensmeden, eene Kasern, eene Övens-Ring un eene Sniederee to bauen.

source: The Atlantean fires in smelting works, armor smithies and weapon smithies are fed with coal.
target: Dat Füür in Atlantisken Smeltwark, Panzersmeden un Wapensmeden verbrannt Köhl.

source: Only very important things are embellished with gold. It is produced by the smelting works and used as a precious building material and to produce different axes (in the war mill) and different parts of armor (in the helm smithy).
target: Blot bannig wichtige Dingen worden mit Gold utrüst. ’t word vun de Smeltwark produzeert un is een düres Baumaterial, un ’t word bruukt um (in de Oorlogs-Smee) eenige Exten un (in de Helmsmee) verschedene Helms to produzeren.

source: A mask is an enhanced armor for Barbarian soldiers. It is produced in the helm smithy and used in the training camp – together with food – to train soldiers from health level 1 to level 2.
target: Eene Mask is een goder Schuur för Wille Soldaten. Se word in de Helmsmee produzeert un im Övens-Lager – tosamen mit Spiesen – bruukt, um Soldaten vun Gesundheid-Stand 1 up Stand 2 uttobilden.

source: This is the most enhanced Barbarian armor. It is produced in a helm smithy and used in a training camp – together with food – to train soldiers from health level 2 to level 3.
target: Dat is de beste Wille Helm. ’t word in de Helmsmee produzeert un im Övens-Lager – tosamen mit Spiesen – bruukt, um Soldaten vun Gesundheid-Stand 2 up Stand 3 uttobilden.

source: The fires of the Empire smelting works, armor smithies and weapon smithies are usually fed with coal.
target: Dat Füür in de Rieks-Smeltwark, -Panzersmeden un -Wapensmeden verbrannt meest Köhl.

source: The fires of the brick kilns, furnaces and armor smithies are fed with coal.
target: Dat Füür in Backsteen-Brannereen, Smeltereen un Wapensmeden bruukt Köhl.

source: It is produced by the furnace. Tools and weapons are made of iron. It is also used as jewellery for fur garment armor to give it a silver shine.
target: ’t word vun de Smelteree produzeert. Warktüüg un Wapens worden ut Iesen maakt. ’t word ok bruukt, um Fellkluften to verbetern.

source: Breeds strong reindeer for adding them to the transportation system. Also keeps them for their fur, which is turned into armor and cloth.
target: Tücht stevige Sneeihirsken för dat Stratennett. Se worden ok för hör Fell tücht, wat man för Kluften un Stoff bruukt.

source: It is produced by the smelting works and used by the armor smithy, the weapon smithy and the gold spinning mill.
target: ’t word vun de Smeltwark produzeert un in Panzersmeden, Wapensmeden un de Goldspinneree bruukt.

source: To establish a smuggling route, you need to build a warehouse on a sending/receiving spot while your team mate has to build one on the corresponding receiving/sending spot. A ware is then transported every 10 seconds.
target: Um een Smuggel-Padd intorichten, mutt du up eenem Enn vun eenem Tunnel een Kraamhuus bauen, un dien Partner an de glieke Stee in sienem Gewest ok eens bauen. Dann word all 10 Sekünnen eene Waar smuggelt.

source: For harder to defend smuggling routes, you get 2 or 3 points per ware smuggled. The first team to collect %s wins.
target: För Smuggel-Padden, de swaar to verdedigen sünd, kriggst du 2 of 3 Punkten för elkeen smuggelt Waar. De eerste Klottje, de %s sammelt, winnt.

source: A new smuggling route from %1$s to %2$s has been established! Every ware they smuggle there is worth %3$s.
target: Een nejer Smuggel-Padd vun %1$s na %2$s is klaar! Elkeen Waar, wat daar smuggelt word, is %3$s weert.

source: This is only the first example of a ware which has to be refined before being used in a secondary building – others will follow.
target: Dat is blot een Bispööl för eene Waar, de eerst verarbeidt worden mutt, ehr se in eenem tweeden Huus bruukt worden kann – ’t gifft mennig anner Bispölen.

source: For example, it might be a good idea to produce a reasonable amount of a ware and afterwards dismantle the building to gain space for another building.
target: To ’n Bispööl is ’t villicht eene gode Idee, eenen lepen Bült vun eener Waar to produzeren un dann dat Huus platt to rieten, um Rüümte för een anners Huus to kriegen.

source: The shipwright will take the ware he needs to a free spot at the shoreline and build a ship there. When the first ship is finished, it will launch onto the sea, and the shipwright will construct another one.
target: De Schippebauer nimmt de Waar, de he jüüst bruukt, to eener frejen Stee an de Küst mit un baut daar een Schipp. Wenn dat eerste Schipp kumpleet is, seilt ’t tur See, un de Schippebauer baut een nejes.

source: This is where ferries come in. Ferries are small rowboats that can carry only one ware at a time, and no workers (other than the one who rows it and who never leaves his boat).
target: Un daar gifft ’t Fähren för. Fähren sünd lütte Ruderboten, wat blot eene Waar up eenmaal dragen könen, un keene Arbeiders (blot de eenen, well rooit un sien Boot nie verlett).

source: The first two tabs show you the production and consumption of any ware. You can toggle them by simply clicking on them.
target: De eersten twee Listenwessler wiesen, waar vööl vun elkeen Waar produzeert un verbruukt word. Du kannst se wiesen of verbargen, indeem du se anklickst.

source: The third tab shows you the economy health of the ware. When the value is positive, this means your stock is growing.
target: De darde Listenwessler wiest de Weertskupp-Utglekenheid för elkeen Waar. Wenn de Weert groter as null is, heet dat, dat de Bestand wasst.

source: In this tab, you can see the difference between production and consumption, called ‘economy health’. You can see at one glance which one of those two is higher for the selected ware, that means whether the amount increases or decreases.
target: Deese Listenwessler wiest de Ofstand tüsken dat, wat produzeert word, un dat, wat verbruukt word. Dat heet »Weertskupp-Utglekenheid«. Du kannst stracks sehn, welkes vun beiden för de utköörte Waar hoger is, also of de Bestand verhoogt of minnert word.

source: the economy needs the ware ‘%s’
target: de Weertskupp bruukt de Waar »%s«

source: the economy doesn’t need the ware ‘%s’
target: de Weertskupp bruukt de Waar »%s« nich

source: The other two important food wares are smoked fish and smoked meat. Raw meat is delivered from a hunter. A fisher gets the fish out of the sea while a fish breeder makes sure that a school of fish does not go extinct by breeding more. Make sure that there are always fish left, otherwise the fish breeder won’t be able to breed new ones. The smoking happens in a smokery, you will need at least two of those.
target: De annern twee wichtigen Spiesen sünd Rökelfiss un Rökelfleesk. Een Jäger levert rauhes Fleesk. Een Fisker hollt Fisse ut de See un een Fisstüchter kümmert sik daarum, dat de Fisse nich all fiskt worden, indeem he welke tücht. Pass up, dat immer een paar Fisse övrig sünd, anners kann de Fisstüchter keene mehr tüchten. Fiss un Fleesk worden in eener Rökelkamer rökelt, bau daar tominnst twee vun.

source: Praise Satul! Ostur, the young ship builder did it. We have three ships – never have I seen sturdier ones – with enough room to carry all of us and some wares too. And this rescue came just in time: Lutas is about to swallow the rest of this island, the water rises faster by the hour. But we can make our escape now and start over in some country farther away…
target: Satuul wees Pries! Ostuur, de Schippebauer, hett ’t daankregen. Wi hebben dree Schippen – un ick hebb nie hardere sehn – wat jüüst groot genoog sünd, um uns all to dragen. Un dat weer jüüst bi Tied: Luutas word nu bold de Insel kumpleet versluken, dat Water löppt alltied fixer up. Aver wi könen nu utnaihen un in eenem anner Land, wied weg, neei begünnen …

source: I almost forgot in this haste – wherever we will land, we’ll need some construction materials to get started, and soldiers to secure and expand our new colony. Even after loading the expedition, the ship should have enough free space for a few wares and workers. On top of that, there should be room for up to %d soldier, if nobody minds being all crammed together. Let’s send some building supplies and our best men to the port when it’s completed, to get ready to embark when we set sail!
target: Ick hebb dat in deeser Iel haast vergeten – waar wi ok lannen sallen, wi bruken Materialien tum Bauen, um mit de Upbauen vun uns’ neei Dörp to begünnen, un Soldaten, um uns’ nejes Dörp to sekern und to vergrotern. Ok nadeem wi de Söök laden hebben, könen wi bit to %d Soldat up uns’ Schipp mitnehmen, wenn ’t hör nix utmaakt, all vollstoppt to wesen. Laat uns een paar Baumaterialien un uns’ besten Keerls tur Muu schicken, wenn se kumpleet is, daarmit se an Boord gahn könen, wenn wi lössseilen!

source: I almost forgot in this haste – wherever we will land, we’ll need some construction materials to get started, and soldiers to secure and expand our new colony. Even after loading the expedition, the ship should have enough free space for a few wares and workers. On top of that, there should be room for up to %d soldiers, if nobody minds being all crammed together. Let’s send some building supplies and our best men to the port when it’s completed, to get ready to embark when we set sail!
target: Ick hebb dat in deeser Iel haast vergeten – waar wi ok lannen sallen, wi bruken Materialien tum Bauen, um mit de Upbauen vun uns’ neei Dörp to begünnen, un Soldaten, um uns’ nejes Dörp to sekern und to vergrotern. Ok nadeem wi de Söök laden hebben, könen wi bit to %d Soldaten up uns’ Schipp mitnehmen, wenn ’t hör nix utmaakt, all vollstoppt to wesen. Laat uns een paar Baumaterialien un uns’ besten Keerls tur Muu schicken, wenn se kumpleet is, daarmit se an Boord gahn könen, wenn wi lössseilen!

source: The fisher working at this aqua farm can’t find any fish ponds in his work area. Please make sure there is a working clay pit nearby and the aqua farm is supplied with all needed wares, or consider dismantling or destroying this building.
target: De Fisker dat warkt bi deese Fissbuurderee hett keene Polen mehr. Bidde pass up dat eene Lehmkuhl in de Naberskupp arbeidt un de Fissbuurderee all’s hett wat se tum Arbeiden bruukt. Of överlegg di, of du dat Huus ofbrannen of plattrieten willst.

source: The charcoal burner working at this charcoal burner’s house can’t find any clay ponds in his work area. Please make sure there is a working clay pit nearby and the charcoal burner’s house is supplied with all needed wares, or consider dismantling or destroying this building.
target: De Holtköhlbranner dat warkt bi deese Köhleree hett keene Kuhlen mehr. Bidde pass up dat eene Lehmkuhl in de Naberskupp arbeidt un de Köhleree all’s hett wat se tum Arbeiden bruukt. Of överlegg di, of du dat Huus ofbrannen of plattrieten willst.

source:
‘Row, row, row your boat
gently ’long the shore.
Steadily steadily steadily steadily
bring the wares ashore.’
target:
»Rooi, rooi, rooi dien Boot
sachte langs de Priel.
Stevigens stevigens stevigens stevigens
breng de Kraam tum Siel.«

source: Any wares left in the building will be dropped out by the builder, increasing the dismantling time
target: Elkeen Waar, wat noch im Huus is, word vun de Baukeerl rutsmieten. Dat Plattrieten düürt dann langer.

source: Any wares left in the building will be dropped out by the builder, increasing the enhancing time
target: Elkeen Waar, wat noch im Huus is, word vun de Baukeerl rutsmieten. Dat Utbauen düürt dann langer.

source: This house may be called a shipyard, but my ships are rather longer than one yard!
target: Ick heet Schippebauer, aver Schippe to bauen is wull eeniges swarer, as Planten antobauen!

source: An example: the default value for scythes is 1. If you build a farm, a carrier will take a scythe and become a farmer. Then there will be no scythes left, but the target quantity is 1, therefore your toolsmith will start producing another one.
target: To ’n Bispööl is de End-Tahl för Sichten 1. Wenn du eene Buurderee baust, nimmt een Lastendrager eene Sichte un word een Buur. Dann sünd keene Sichten över, aver de End-Tahl is 1, also maakt diene Warktüügsmee eene neje.

source: Our ship is badly damaged and is taking in more and more water. We can thank the Gods if we survive this black night with our lives.
target: Uns Schipp is heel un dall in de Dutt un vull mit Lecks. Wi mutten de Gotten Loff un Dank seggen, wenn wi deese swarte Nacht överleven.

source: The fish breeder working out of this fish breeder’s house can’t find any water where he can breed fish in his work area. Remember that you can only regenerate your fish resources if there ever were some fish in the vicinity in the first place.
target: De Fiss-Tüchter dat warkt bi deese Fisstüchteree hett keene Fiske tum Tüchten. Du kannst de Fiske blot dann vermehren, wenn daar jemaals welke weren.

source: The carrier working at this water gatherer’s hut can’t find any water in its vicinity.
target: De Lastendragerske, de bi deese Well warkt, kann keen Water in de Naberskupp finnen.

source: Failed to host the server!
target: Kunn de Server nich berieten!

source: The jewel of the alps, the dolomites mountain range has been declared a world heritage site for its pristine beauty. This map is an as-faithful-as-reasonable reconstruction of the area delimited by Cortina d’Ampezzo in the north-east and Canazei in the south-west. If you have to be pitted in a duel to the death with your enemies, it may as well be in a beautiful place.
target: De Dolomiten, de Kroon vun de Alpen, sünd för hör unbannig Mooigheid eene Weltarve-Stee. Deese Kaart is so genau as mit Verstand mögelk na de Kuntrei baut, wat im Noordoost vun Cortina d’Ampezzo un im Südwest vun Canazei begrenzt word. Wenn du mit dienen Feinden bit tum Dood kämpen muttst, kannst du dat tominnst an eener ewigsmojen Stee doon.

source: Your well established smuggling routes suddenly got busy: two other tribes have appeared and now a rivalry among smugglers has started. Which team will be the first to smuggle a certain number of wares?
target: Diene goden, ollen Smuggelpadden sünd up eenmaal besig worden: Twee anner Völker sünd ankomen un een Wettstried tüsken Smuggel-Lüü hett begunnen. Welke Klottje is de eerste, wat eene wisse Tahl vun Waren smuggelt?

source: But all seemed well. Only the horses seemed to feel something was wrong. During the nights, they went crazy and were full of fear. It was not long before the horse breeder Xydra figured out what was wrong with them: the sea level in front of their stable was rising with ever increasing speed.
target: Aver all sach good ut. Blot de Peer hebben sik een bietje komisk benohmen. In de Nacht weren se ganz dördreiht un rappelig. Na körter Tied hett de Peertüchter Skied’ utfunnen, wat löss weer: De See tegen hör Stallen leep immer gauer up.

source: Our building infrastructure is finished and I spent some days making sure that everybody is working well together. Now, there are other pressing matters. I called Colionder, my personal cook, before me to get his help with sorting some things out.
target: Uns’ Bau-Weertskupp is kumpleet un ick hebb een paar Dagen daarmit verbrocht, uptopassen, dat all Lüü good tosamen warken. Nu gifft dat anner wichtige Dingen. Ick hebb Kojonder, mienen persönelken Kock, to mi ropen laten, um mit siener Hülp een paar Dinge klaar to maken.

source: This is good news indeed, Opol. Our economy is developing very well. Go back to your work now, Opol, and may Satul warm you and all your guild members!
target: Dat sünd würrelk gode Narichten, Öpoll. Uns’ Weertskupp löppt bannig good. Gah nu torügg to diener Arbeid, Öpoll, un Satuul sall jo un all de anner Spinners warmen!

source: May Satul warm you as well, Loftomor. That is good news to hear. However please remember that our toolsmiths need to be equipped with a saw. Making tools is an art for us, requiring a precise tool like a saw, not a brutal hammer like for the other tribes.
target: Satuul sall Jo ok warmen, Loftomoor. Dat is eene gode Naricht. Vergeet man bidde nich, dat uns’ Warktüügsmidden mit eener Saag utstaffeert worden mutten. Warktüüg to maken is för uns eene Kunst, för wat man sülk een akkeraates Warktüüg as eene Saag bruukt, un nich eenen rugen Klöpper as anner Völkers.

source: Today I saw the first recruits gathering in front of the new barracks. If everything goes well, they should receive their training soon.
target: Ick hebb vandag de eersten Lehrwichter sehn, as se vör de neje Kasern stunnen. Se worden wull bold to Soldaten utbildt.

source: I received an invitation from Sidolus. The first day of training in the newly finished labyrinth will be tomorrow. The dungeon is done as well and will start its work soon. I am looking forward to tomorrow; I am very interested in how our soldiers are trained, and I wonder if the additional workload will keep them from bullying the civilian population.
target: Ick bün vun Sidoolus inladen worden. De eerste Övens-Dag in de neje Dwaalwegen is mörgen. De Gefahrelke Gangen sünd ok kumpleet un begünnt bold to warken. Ick freei mi up mörgen; ick will geern sehn, wo de Soldaten öven, un ick hoop, dat deese nejen Upgaven se ofhollen, uns’ Lüü to schikaneren.

source: We need to build a temple for Satul and we need to worship him well. By this he might show these Barbarians his might and our princess might come back to her senses.
target: Wi mutten eenen Tempel för Satuul bauen un hüm akkeraat anbeden. Dann wiest he villicht deesen Willen Lüü siene Macht un uns’ Königstochter kummt hopentlik weer to Sinnen.

source: All of us were fiercely afraid. We expected the other ships to be sunken as well, but they persisted. We escaped the island and began our smooth sailing to other coasts.
target: Wi weren all unbannig bang. Wi hebben glöövt, de anner Schippen worden ok noch unnergahn, aver se hebben dat överstahn. Wi sünd vun de Insel utnaiht un hebben begunnen, sachte to annern Küsten to sailen.

source: Well done, Loftomor, well done. May Satul warm our strong and brave miners. But now we need to ensure we can feed them. We need to build up bakeries and smokeries and all buildings to supply them.
target: Good, Loftomoor, bannig good. Satuul sall uns’ stark un dapper Bargwarkskeerls warmen. Un nu mutten wi noch uppassen, dat wi se ok föden könen. Wi mutten Backereen un Rökelkamers bauen, un all de Husen, wat deese versörgen.

source: Oh, and I almost forgot this one. We demand to have your princess in our headquarters as well to coordinate our war plannings.
target: Ach, un dat hebb ick haast vergeten. Wi verlangen, ok Jo Königstochter in uns’ Raadhuus to hebben, um uns’ Kriegsplanens topass to brengen.

source: Well done, Loftomor, well done. May Satul warm our princess and our whole people. Now we need to begin sending goods to this Barbarian.
target: Good, Loftomoor, bannig good. Satuul sall uns’ Königstochter un all uns’ Lüü warmen. Nu mutten wi anfangen, deesem Willen Waren to schicken.

source: So you want to prepare us for a longer stay in these forests, Thron? Well, I see the wisdom in doing so, yet my heart is yearning for a glorious return to Al’thunran. Too long have we waited while our brethren have fought on the battlefield, and our axes and swords have turned rusty over time.
target: Du willst also all klaarmaken, dat wi langer im deesen Walden blieven, Troon? Na good, ick seh de Klookheid daarvun, ofschoon mien Hart sik sehnt, dat wi in Ehr na Alltunraan torügg gahn. Wi hebben to lang wacht as uns Sippskupp in Kriegen kämpt hett, un uns’ Exten un Sweerten worden in de Loop vun de Tied rusterig.

source: Chieftain, this is a disgrace! It is well that we can produce grout for mighty fortifications and great buildings now – only this does not prevent our roofs from becoming leaky! Maybe the young ones like spending their nights in the rain, but I just can’t find any sleep with these raindrops dripping on my face!
target: Anföhrer, dat is eene Schann! Good, wenn wi nu Mörtel för machtige Schanzen un baldadige Husen produzeren könen – aver dat hülpt nich, dat uns’ Dacken nich dördrüppeln! Jung Lüü hebben dat villicht geern, wenn se im Regen slapen, ick aver nich!

source: Wonderful! Our roofs are not dripping anymore, and we have all the material we need for, well, whichever monumental building we see fit!
target: Hunnert! Uns’ Dacken drüppeln nich mehr, un nu hebben wi all Materialien, wat wi bruken, um elkeen machtig Huus to bauen, as wi wullen!

source: Our geologists found a lot more deposits of iron ore, coal and even gold. We should enhance our current mines as soon as our miners are more experienced. We should build up some more mines, a bigger food infrastructure to always supply our men with sufficient food and a further processing economy. But that’s still not everything – most of our soldiers are quite young and neither have a good weapon nor are they well trained. We should build up training sites to prepare them for their future tasks.
target: Uns’ Schattsökers hebben bannig völe Aders vun Iesenkluut, Köhl un sogaar Gold funnen. Wi sallen uns’ Bargwarken utbauen, sobold uns’ Bargwarkskeerls mehr Erfahrung hebben. Wi sallen mehr Bargwarken bauen, eene grotere Spiesen-Weertskupp, um uns’ Lüü alltied mit godem Eten to versörgen, un eene Weertskupp, um mit de Kluten to warken. Un dat is noch nich all – de mesten vun uns’ Soldaten sünd jung un hebben keene goden Wapen un keene Erfahrung. Wi mutten Övens-Boen bauen, um se up hör tokomen Upgaven vörtobereiden.

source: He told me about the blockhouse. Well, I don’t think we need more blockhouses – instead, we might concentrate on other things now.
target: He hett mi vun de Wachters-Kamerke vertellt. Nu, ick gloov nich, dat wi noch mehr Wachters-Kamerkes bruuken – wi könen uns nu um anner Dingen kümmern.

source: Lutius, this may seem very tricky, but we can do it. First of all, we need patience as well as speed and a plan to succeed in this part of the world.
target: Lutjus, dat sücht wull slimm ut, aver wi könen dat schaffen. Toeerst bruken wi Geduld un Spood, un eenen Plaan, wo wi in deesem Deel vun de Welt Glück hebben könen.

source: I think I have heard the wind carrying some weird but well known sounds from the north. If I’m not totally wrong, I have heard some Barbarian war drums. So, we should better go and have a look at what is going on up there.
target: Ick gloov, de Noordwind hett komiske aver leep bekannte Luden herdragen. Wenn ick nich ganz un gaar falsk ligg, hebb ick de Kriegstrummels vun Willen Lüü höört. Wi sallen uns beter upmaken un nakieken, wat daar boven vör sik gaht.

source: Lutius. Well done. Well done. We have discovered all possible port locations in the complete region. Now we can strengthen our economy and we will manage to sail home soon.
target: Lutjus. Hunnert. Hunnert. Wi hebben all de Rüümte för Muden funnen, de ’t hier eenerwegens gifft. Nu könen wi uns’ Weertskupp starken un bold na Huus seilen.

source: We need some cloth as well for producing armor in our armor smithy. We need it to build some of the training buildings for our soldiers. And most important and most imminent of all, we need it to send out expeditions.
target: Wi bruken ok wat Stoff, um Wapenrocken ins uns’ Panzersmee to produzeren. Wi bruken ’t för eenige vun de Övens-Boen för uns’ Soldaten. Un dat wichtigste un drockste is, wi bruken ’t, um Söken uttorüsten.

source: Unfortunately, we lost our holy shrine of Neptune in the great storm, so we can’t worship him well. I think we should search the whole region to see if we can recover all six pieces of the shrine.
target: Leider hebben wi de hilligen Neptun-Altar in de groten Störm verloren, also könen wi hüm nich good hoogachten. Ick gloov, wi sallen in de helen Kuntrei söken, um to sehn, of wi all sess Delen vun de Altar torügg kriegen könen.

source: Sire, we need to train some of our people to serve in your great army. It is important to increase the number of our soldiers as fast as we can. And we should train them well to improve their fighting abilities.
target: Mienheer, wi mutten mehr vun uns’ Lüü utbilden, in diener groten Soldateree to denen. ’t is wichtig, de Tahl vun uns’ Soldaten so fix to verhogen as wi könen. Un wi mutten se good utbilden, um hör Vermögen im Krieg to verbetern.

source: Lutius, well done so far. I just got the news that we have finished the basic buildings to obtain some construction materials.
target: Lutjus, gode Arbeid bit nu. All de Husen, wat wi för eenfache Baumaterialien bruken, sünd nu beschickt.

source: Well done, well done. Our road network looks a lot more structured than before.
target: Hunnert, hunnert. Uns’ Stratennett sücht al beter ut as ehr.

source: But according to our recent experiences, I assume that something will be wrong with our mines as well. It’s probably a good idea to send a geologist to check whether there are enough resources in the vicinity of our mines.
target: Na de lesten Erfahrungen gloov ick, dat ok de Bargwarken eerst maal nich recht warken worden. Laat uns eenen Schattsöker schicken, um natokieken, of dat um uns’ Bargwarken genoog Mineraale gifft.
