source: General, although we have started recruiting new soldiers, we still need to train them well. It is important to increase the strength of our soldiers as fast as we can.
target: Offizeer, wi kriegen nu neje Soldaten, aver wi mutten se noch utbilden. De Starkde vun uns’ Soldaten mutten wi so fix as mögelk verhogen.

source: Thank you Lutius, you have served our goddess well. You will not only be gifted with the improvements to your technology but with some of the goods you need so desperately as well. Furthermore, we will pray for you and join your party to safeguard our land from the Barbarians.
target: Wees bedankt, Lutjus, du hest uns’ Gottin good deent. Du sallst nich blot de Technik kriegen, sünnern ok een paar vun de Waren, wat jo so vun Nood bruukt. Un uplest wullen wi för jo beden un an jo Sied stahn, um uns’ Land vör de Willen Lüü to schütten.

source: If you did not prepare well enough to master this challenge in time, you can reload the scenario from the backup savegame automatically created for you shortly before you reached the enemy’s headquarters.
target: Wenn du nich good genoog vörbereidt büst, um dat bi Tied hentokriegen, kannst du de Rutfödderung vun de sekert Speel weer laden, wat automatisk för di maakt worden is, jüüst ehr du bi de feindelken Raadhuus ankomen büst.

source: We should start by taking care of our wood production. Trees don’t seem to grow well on this island; better build at least two houses for foresters and one for a woodcutter.
target: Wi sallen mit uns’ Holt-Versörgung anfangen. Bomen wassen wull nich good up de Hallig; bau bidde tominnst twee Husen för Försters un eens för eenen Boomslager.

source: You did well. Our entire building material production is working now. Let’s wait until we have gathered some more materials. We could expand our territory some more, to see what else can be found on this island.
target: Hunnert. Wi könen nu all de nödigen Baumaterialien produzeren. Laat uns wachten, bit wi eenige Materialien sammelt hebben. Wi könen nu uns’ Gewest vergrotern, um to sehn, wat ’t noch up deese Hallig gifft.

source: Build an iron mine and perhaps a gold mine. As they produce only ores, we will need a furnace to smelt them. Also build a blacksmithy to ensure we won’t run out of tools – and yes, a small armor smithy as well. It produces helmets as well as swords. I hope we won’t meet enemies here, but it’s better to be prepared.
target: Bau een Iesen-Bargwark un wenn mögelk een Gold-Bargwark. Se produzeren nix as Kluten, wi bruken also eene Smelteree, um se to smelten. Bau ok eene Smede, daarmit dat Warktüüg nich knapp word – och, un ok eene Lütte Wapensmee. Se produzeert Helms un Sweerten. Ick hoop, dat wi hier keene Feinde treffen, aver ’t is beter, sik klaartomaken.

source: Our mines are working well. We can now produce all the tools we need, and some weapons as well.
target: Uns’ Bargwarken arbeiden good. Wi könen nu all dat Warktüüg produzeren, wat wi bruken, un ok een paar Wapen.

source: Soldiers are trained in two steps in defense and health. They get fur garments studded with iron and also gold to cushion blows; and helmets forged from iron, and gold as well, to lengthen their life in battle.
target: Soldaten lehren Verteidigung un Gesundheid in twee Stappen. Se kriegen Fellkluften mit Iesen un ok Gold as Polsters för Slagen; un Helms, de ut Iesen un ok Gold smeedt worden, um hör Leven in de Slacht langer to maken.

source: Despair not, I did espy some hope! The easternmost tip of the island, as well as the space where the fiends’ headquarters stood, seems well suited to build a port on. If we manage to construct a ship, and fill it with all we need to build a new settlement, we may be able to escape.
target: Vertwiefel nich, ick hebb wat Hoop! De Oostspitz vun de Hallig on ok de Stee, waar dat Raadhuus vun de Feinden stunn, düchten mi gadelk, eene Muu to bauen. Wenn wi ’t schaffen, een Schipp to bauen, un ’t mit all de Waren füllen, de wi bruken, um een nejes Dörp to gründen, könen wi villicht utrieten.

source: All wares and workers that are loaded onto the expedition as well as some of the soldiers in the port will be carried over to the next scenario.
target: All Waren un Arbeiders, wat up de Söök mitnohmen worden, un ok een paar vun de Soldaten in de Muu, worden to de anner Rutfödderung mitnohmen.

source: The few tools we managed to salvage from Langeness did not cope well. The miners’ picks proved especially vulnerable, and we had to throw them in the ocean when it became evident that they had been corroded by the sea salt so much that we could never again mine anything with them.
target: Dat minn Warktüüg, wat wi vun Langeneß retten kunnen, hett dat nich good överstunnen. Vör allem de Pickhacken vun de Bargwarkskeerls weren slimm dran, un wi mutten se in de See smieten, as wi sehn kunnen, dat se vun de Seesolt so kaputtfreten worden sünd, dat wi daarmit nienich nix mehr ofboen könen.

source: You are right – we should build more berry farms, fruit collector’s houses and taverns as well as a drinking hall, and advanced bakeries and breweries.
target: Du hest recht – wi sallen mehr Buskenplantereen, Früchtenpottjereen un Kneipen bauen, un daarto eene Weertshuus un betere Backereen un Broereen.

source: You have done well, strangers! As I did tell you earlier, you will be rewarded with the friendship of the Empire!
target: Ji hebbt dat good daan, Frömde! As ick ji vörhen seggt hebb, sallt ji mit de Fründskupp vum Riek belohnt worden!

source: It’s a figure of speech that is considered polite among our people, that’s all. Very well, I’ll ask properly: Do you know where we can find my friend Reebaud?
target: Dat is eene Seggwies, wat bi uns’ Lüü as höflich ansehn word, mehr nich. Also good, ick fraag nu recht: Weetst du, waar wi mien Fründ Reebaud finnen könen?

source: You have gotten past my best guards and burnt down my palace, which I believed to be impossible. You must be very powerful, and favoured by the gods. You have most certainly deserved your victory. I congratulate you and wish you well for your voyage. May Satul keep you safe!
target: Du hest miene besten Wachen manntjet un mienen Palast verneelt, un ick hebb gloovt, dat dat nich passeren kann. Du muttst unbannig machtig sien, un de Segen vun de Gotten hebben. Du hest deesen Sieg würrelk verdeent. Ick beglückwünsk jo un wünsk jo all Segen för jo Fahrt. Satuul sall jo schütten!

source: Peace, Sir Iniucundus! I am Claus Lembeck, and this is my son Henneke. We are just passing through as well. You are a legate, you say? You must be getting around a lot. Have you heard news of my old friend Reebaud? I only know that he is living in the North, can you tell us where to find him?
target: Free, Heer Iniucundus! Ick bün Claus Lembeck, un dat is mien Söhn Henneke. Wi sünd ok blot bi’m Dörreisen. Du büst een Legaat, seggst du? Du muttst völe Lannen kennen. Hest du Narichten vun mien ollen Fründ Reebaud höört? Ick weet blot, dat he im Noorden leevt, weetst du, waar wi hüm finnen könen?

source: He seems happy enough to offer us a passage, but the price is exorbitant. We may as well destroy his port and build one of our own. I wonder what would be better…
target: He freit sik man, uns eene Fahrt antobeden, aber de Pries is leep baldadig. Wi könen ok siene Muu ofbrannen un sülst eene bauen. Ick fraag mi, wat wull beter is …

source: Our soldiers have recovered, and you have spent the time well by increasing the strength of your army. Now I will come South with you together with all my soldiers except for a small garrison to safeguard my lands, and we will reconquer your island!
target: Uns’ Soldaten hebben sik verpuust, un du hest de Tied klook daarmit verbrocht, de Fors vun diener Soldateree to verhogen. Nu word ick mit jo na Süden komen un all mien Soldaten brengen bit up eene lütte Mannskupp, um miene Lannen to bewaken, un wi worden diene Insel torüggwinnen!

source: I wanted to teach you how to build new flags, but it seems you have already found out on your own. Well done!
target: Ick wull di lehren, wo dat Upstellen vun nejen Fahnen gaht, aver du hest dat openbaar sülvst utfunnen. Hunnert!

source: The needed wares are also delivered there. For successful training, you need pitta bread and strong beer, as well as either fish or meat.
target: De nödigen Waren worden daar ok al hen transporteert. Daarmit dat Öven klappt, bruukst du Pitta-Brood un Deftigs Beer, un of Fiss of Fleesk.

source: Here in the northern part, you only have a goldmine and a warehouse. While the miners are supplied well with food, there is no way to transport the gold ore to our smelting works in the southern part.
target: Hier im Noorden hest du nix as een Gold-Bargwark un een Kraamhuus. De Bargwarkskeerls kriggen Spiesen satt, aver wi könen de Goldkluten nich to de Smeltwarken im Süden transporteren.

source: Look at this valley here in the far south. We have found a mountain with gold down here and would like to mine ores from it as well. But the streams separating it from our main colony are too wide to build bridges and too narrow for ships to pass them. Our roads would have to take long curves, which slows down ware transport a lot.
target: Kiek deeses Daal hier wied im Süden an. Wi hebben hier unnern eenen Barg mit Gold funnen un wullen ok hier Kluten ofboen. Aver de Beken, wat ’t vun uns’ Höövdstee trennen, sünd to wied för Brücken un to eng för Schippen. Uns’ Straten mutten lange Kurven nehmen, wat de Waren-Transpoort vööl langsamer macht.

source: Waterways can be built on the open sea as well as close to the shore where the water is too shallow for big ships. The only rule is that the two triangles directly adjacent to each segment of the waterway have to be water, and the entire path needs to be within your territory.
target: Prielen könen up de open See un ok dicht an de Küst baut worden, waar dat Water för grote Schippen to seicht ist. De eenzige Regel is, dat de twee Dreiecken tegen elkeen Deel vun de Priel Water wesen mutten, un de ganze Padd mutt in dienem Gewest liggen.

source: Welcome back. In this tutorial, I’ll tell you what you can do to check how well your economy works.
target: Wilkomen torügg. In deese Inföhren vertell ick di, wat du doon kannst, um natokieken, wo good diene Weertskupp löppt.

source: Building your economy up and making it work well and grow is the main part of Widelands. But you can’t control the workers directly – they will follow the general conditions you set.
target: Diene Weertskupp uptobaun un daarför to sörgen, dat se good arbeidt un wasst, is dat Wichtigste, wat ’t in Widelands gifft. Aver du kannst de Arbeiders nich stuuv instrueren – se hören up de Grundsatzen för de Weertskupp, de du fastleggst.

source: You can find the full text of the license there as well as further information about its philosophy and the legal implications.
target: Daar finnst du de kumpleten Text vun de Lizenz un anner Informatioonen över hör Philosophie un rechtliches Utwirken.

source: Connected to a computer player (the face in the picture as well as the mouse hover texts indicate the strength of the currently selected computer player).
target: Mit eenem künstelken Speler verbunnen (dat Gesicht in de Bill un de Text, de kummt, wenn du mit de Muus daarup wiest, geven de Starkde vun de utköört künstelken Speler an).

source: You can find general help for the editor as well as a short tutorial on our wiki at %s.
target: Du finnst allgemeene Hülp för de Bewarker un een körte Inföhren in uns’ Wiki unner %s.

source: The Amazons use granite for making tools and weapons as well. It is produced by the stonecutters and in stone mines.
target: De Amazonen bruken Flint ok, um Warktüüg un Wapens to maken. ’t word vun de Flinthauersken un in Steen-Bargwarken produzeert.

source: ‘From the height of our tower we could see far into enemy territory. The enemy was well prepared, but we also noticed some weak points in their defense.’
target: »Vun de Höchten vun uns’ Toorn kunn wi wied in dat feindelke Gewest kieken. De Feind waar good vörbereidt, aver wi kunnen de Swackden in siener Verteidigung sehn.«

source: Reed is grown in a reed farm. Nothing is better suited to make roofs waterproof. It is also used to make baskets and fishing nets as well as cloth.
target: Reit word in eener Reitbuurderee anbaut. Nix is beter, um Dacken waterdicht to maken. ’t word ok bruukt, um Körven un Fiskernetten un Stoff to maken.

source: They are used by berry and reed farmers as well as foresters. Clay diggers also need them to dig mud out of hard soil.
target: Se worden vun Buskenplanters, Reitburen un Försters bruukt. Lehmgravers bruken se ok, um Klei ut harder Eer to graven.

source: Trains soldiers in Attack up to level 3 as well as in Defense and Health to level 1. Equips the soldiers with all necessary weapons and armor parts.
target: Lehrt Soldaten Angriff tum Stand 3 un in Verteidigung un Gesundheid tum Stand 1. Rüst de Soldaten mit all nödigen Wapen un Wapenrocken ut.

source: Sets ‘Zoom Map’ and ‘Scroll Map’ to the recommended settings for a touchpad or other pointing device that can scroll horizontally as well as vertically.
target: Sett »Kaart vergrotern« un »Kaart verschuven« up de Weerten, wat för een Tastfeld un anner Musen mit eenem vertikaal un ok eenem horizontaal Rad anraden worden.

source: The random map generator is still in beta stage. The maps it generates are usually – but not always – well playable. Seafaring and artifacts are not supported. Add-ons of the World, Tribes, and Script categories are disabled in random matches.
target: De Tofallskaarten-Maker is noch nich perfekt. Up de Kaarten, wat he maakt, kann man meestens – man nich alltieden – good spölen. Seefahrt un künstelk Schatten worden nich unnerstütt. Verwiederns in de Delen Welt, Völkers un Schrieven sünd in tofällig Spelen utknipst.

source: Please also include which operating system you are running Widelands on as some bugs can be platform specific.
target: Bidde segg ok, welkes Bedriev-Systeem du bruukst. Eenige Fehler passeren nämlich blot up bestimmte Systemen.

source: The path to the active UI theme, relative to the Widelands home directory.
target: De Padd to de anknipst Bruker-Schnittstee-Thema vun de Heem-Verteeknis ut.

source: By the Gods! One of our scouts has discovered a mighty castle at the center of the old plateau. The castle must be quite old and seems to have been built in a foreign style. It’s quite obvious that this is not barbarian craft.
target: Bi de Gotten! Eener vun uns’ Bespejers hett een machtigs Slött in de Midde vun de Ollen Flackland funnen. Dat Slött mutt steenold wesen un is in butenlandsker Aard baut. Dat is wisse keene Wille Künst.

source: Six months ago, Lutius – a young general of the Empire – was sent with 150 soldiers to the frontier beyond the northern forests where Barbarian tribes were crossing onto land held by the Empire. His task was to defend the Empire’s land. At first, everything was calm. He even talked to a few Barbarian children and thought about a peaceful life – side by side with this archaic folk. He began to feel safer and his army began to drop their attention off the potential enemy. That was their undoing. One night in March his unprepared army was attacked by 100 Barbarian footmen and was completely scattered. Only with his bare life he and a handful of his soldiers survived.
target: Vör sess Maanten wurr Lutjus – een junger Offizeer vum Latiensken Riek – mit 150 Soldaten an de Grenz achtern de noordelken Walden schickt, waar de Willen Lüü ins Land vum Riek indrungen. Siene Upgaav weer, dat Land vum Riek to verdedigen. Eerst weer all friedelk. He snackde mit Willen Kinners un wullt in Freden leven – Sied an Sied mit de steenolle Volk. He meende, seker to wesen, un siene Soldaten achtden nich mehr up de mögelk Feinden. Dat weer een Fehler. In eener Määrtnacht wurren siene unrüsten Soldaten vun 100 Willen Stahfasten angrepen un heel un dall verjaggt. He un een paar vun sienen Soldaten överleevden mit nix as de blote Leven.

source: Another Barbarian – edited by king_of_nowhere
target: Another Barbarian – vun king_of_nowhere bewarkt

source: Now it’s time to finish off this annoying Barbarian. He has molested us far too long now.
target: Nu is ’t an de Tied, deesen verdretelken Willen wegtomaken. He hett uns nu vööl to lang argert.

source: May Satul warm us all. Our princess has been confused in her imprisonment by this Barbarian. But I will never worship any Barbarian god. I can’t imagine how we could change her mind though.
target: Satuul sall uns all warmen. Uns’ Königstochter is in de Gefangenskupp bi deesem Willen tüdelig worden. Aver ick word nienich keenen Willen Gott anbeden. Man ick weet nich, wo wi se umsnacken könen.

source: May Satul warm you, Loftomor. This is a very good idea indeed. So I task you to build a temple worth worshipping our god. Until we are ready to beg for Satul’s power we should keep an eye on our princess and this Barbarian. As we should stop our trader’s deliveries to not waste any wares to this Barbarian any more, I want you to ensure we have a scout out there to gather information.
target: Satuul sall Jo warmen, Loftomoor. Dar is een unbannig goder Infall. Ick geev Jo also de Upgaav, eenem Tempel to bauen, wat uns’ Gott gefällig is. Bit wi paraat sünd, um Satuul um siene Macht to bidden, sallen wi een Oog up uns’ Königstochter un deesen Willen hebben. Wi sallen uns’ Hannelsmann anwiesen, keene Waren mehr to de Willen to levern, un ick will, dat wi weer eenen Bespejer daar buten hebben, um mehr uttofinnen.

source: Sidolus, they did not let me go. I met our scout and he managed to sneak me out, as I realized they still kept me hostage after I expressed some concerns about our previous agreement. So we need to settle the barbarian issue now and forever on this island. There is no other way to live here in peace than to defeat them.
target: Sidoolus, se hebben mi nich weggahn laten. Ick hebb uns’ Bespejer troffen un he hett mi wegsmuggelt, denn ick hebb markt, dat se mi noch as Geisel hollen, nadeem ick Bedenkens över uns’ leste Kuntrakt ütert hebb. Wi mutten also dat Probleem mit de Willen Lüü up deeser Insel nu un för all Tieden ofhelpen. Wi könen hier nich in Free leven, wenn wi se nich manntjen.

source: You have completed the last mission of the Barbarian tutorial campaign. You may continue playing if you wish, otherwise move on to the next campaign.
target: Du hest de leste Rutfödderung in deeser Riege ofsloten. Wenn du willst, kannst du wiederspölen, anners de token Rutfödderungs-Riege anfangen.

source: What has become of our Empire? I really ask this question – why did my king forbid me from fighting against that monstrous Barbarian tribe, who first acted as a peaceful friend and then attacked my army in the darkest night?
target: Wat is blot ut uns’ Latiensken Riek worden? Dat fraag ick würrelk – waarum hett min König mi unnerseggt, mit deesem verfuterten Willen Volk to fechten, dat sik eerst as Fründ upspöölt hett, um miene Soldaten dann um Middernacht antogriepen?

source: With an army of 150 men, I was assigned to patrol on our northern frontier, which lies near the Galdin Mountains in a great, beautiful and ancient forest. Soon, we met a Barbarian tribe, which at first was friendly. A few of my men even traded with them and their children came to us, to admire our clean and tidy uniforms and weapons.
target: Mit 150 Soldaten bün ick schickt worden, de Grenz im Noorden, wat in de Naberskupp vun de Galdin-Bargen in eenem groten, mojen, steenollen Wald liggt, unner Ogen to hollen. Wi hebben bold een Willes Volk truffen, wat toeerst liesaam was. Een paar vun mienen Lüü hebben mit för sogaar hannelt; hör Kinners sünd to uns komen un hebben uns püken, akkeraten Kluften un Wapens to bewunnern.

source: Destroy the Barbarian tribe
target: Verneel dat Wille Volk

source: Destroy the Barbarian Tribe
target: Verneel dat Wille Volk

source: Attack and completely destroy the Barbarian buildings as soon as you have enough soldiers.
target: Griep de Willen Husen an un verneel se kumpleet, sobold du genoog Soldaten hest.

source: Build a fortress on the peninsula (near where the Barbarian headquarters stood before). Finally, this will avoid new settlements of other tribes in that region.
target: Bau eene Schanz up de Uthamm (waar vördeem dat Wille Raadhuus stunn). Dann laten sik keene annern Völker in deese Gegend daal.

source: Today, as I walked down to the eastern shore, I got a shock. I caught sight of one of those hated, evil, Barbarian tribes with whom we have had so many problems before.
target: As ick vörhen to de oostelken Küst gahn bün, hebb ick mi verschrickt. Ick hebb eenes vun deesen furchtbaren, öveln, Willen Völkern sehn, waar wi al so mennig Problemen mit harren.

source: There are still a few Barbarians hiding on our island, but I am sure that we will find them soon. Every Barbarian who doesn’t attack us will be put in a boat with the other peaceful ones, and sent back to their country.
target: ’t gifft noch een paar Wille Lüü, de sik up uns’ Insel versteken, aver wiss finnen wi se bold. All Willen, de uns nich angriepen, setten wi in een Schipp mit de annern freedsamen un schicken se in hör Land torügg.

source: I think I have heard the wind carrying some weird but well known sounds from the north. If I’m not totally wrong, I have heard some Barbarian war drums. So, we should better go and have a look at what is going on up there.
target: Ick gloov, de Noordwind hett komiske aver leep bekannte Luden herdragen. Wenn ick nich ganz un gaar falsk ligg, hebb ick de Kriegstrummels vun Willen Lüü höört. Wi sallen uns beter upmaken un nakieken, wat daar boven vör sik gaht.

source: Sire, we found the ruins of a former Barbarian fortress and village. I’m somewhat worried that we will have to fight against them before we are ready to do so.
target: Mienheer, wi hebben de Ruinen vun eener ollen Willen Schanz un Dörp funnen. Ick bün wat bang, dat wi tegen se fechten mutten ehr wi daarto paraat sünd.

source: Yes my fellow soldiers, we have done it! We have met all the challenges that were put in front of us. But my heart is still with our home. We shall set sail as soon as possible to help defend the Empire from the Barbarian tribe.
target: Jau, miene Soldaten-Fründe, wi hebben ’t klaar brocht! Wi hebben all de Rutföderungen överwunnen, de vör uns laggen. Aver mien Hart is noch to Huus. Wi sallen tur See fahren, sobold wi nu könen, um dat Riek tegen dat Wille Volk mit to verteidigen.

source: End the Barbarian intrusion into your very own part of the world.
target: De Willen Lüü sall ’t in deesen Deel vun de Welt, wat di un nüms anners höört, nich mehr geven. Kümmer di drum.

source: The barbarian tribe he mentioned is also a threat. I don’t want to share this land with anyone, as sharing only leads to conflicts and battles, as we saw in our old home. We must defeat the barbarians as well.
target: Dat Wille Volk, waar he vun sproken hett, is ok eene Gefahr. Ick will deeses Land mit nüms delen, wiel Delen blot to Stried un Kriegen föhrt, as wie in uns’ oller Heimaad sehn hebben. Wi mutten ok de Willen Lüü manntjen.

source: New soldiers are created differently from normal workers: recruits will walk from a warehouse (or your headquarters) to the barracks where they will receive some basic training and become soldiers. Basic Barbarian soldiers do not use armor, they only need an ax.
target: Neje Soldaten worden nich as anner Arbeiders anhüürt: Lehrwichter gahn vun eenem Kraamhuus (of dienem Raadhuus) to eener Kasern, waar se de Grundlagen büffeln un Soldaten worden. Neje Soldaten vun de Willen Lüü bruuken keenen Wapenrock, blot eene Ext.

source: If a Barbarian soldier is fully trained, he has level %1% health, level %2% attack, level %3% defense and level %4% evade. This is one fearsome warrior then! The individual abilities have the following meaning:
target: Een allerbest utbildt Willer Soldat hett Gesundheid-Stand %1%, Angriff-Stand %2%, Verteidigung-Stand %3% un Utwieken-Stand %4%. Wat för een grieselker Soldat! De Egenskuppen bedüden:

source: The total life of a soldier. A Barbarian soldier starts with %1% health, and he will gain %2% health with each health level.
target: Dat Leven vun eenem Soldat. Een Willer Soldat hett anfangs %1% Gesundheid-Punkten un kriggt mit elkeen Gesundheid-Stand %2% Punkten bito.

source: The amount of damage a soldier will inflict on the enemy when an attack is successful. A Barbarian soldier with attack level 0 inflicts ~%1% points of health damage when he succeeds in hitting an enemy. For each attack level, he gains %2% damage points.
target: De Schaad, wat een Soldat de Feind dood, wenn een Angriff klappt. Een Willer Soldat mit Angriff-Stand 0 besehrt de Feind um ~%1% Gesundheid-Punkten, wenn he de Feind trefft. Mit elkeen Angriff-Stand kriggt he %2% Schaad-Punkten bito.

source: The defense is the percentage that is subtracted from the attack value. The Barbarians cannot train in this skill and therefore have always defense level 0, which means that the damage is always reduced by %1%%%. If an attacker with an attack value of 3500 points hits a Barbarian soldier, the Barbarian will lose 3500·%2%%% = %3% health.
target: De Verteidigung is een Prozent-Tahl, wat vun eenem Angriff oftreckt word. Wille Lüü könen deese Egenskupp nich verbetern un hebben also immer Verteidigung-Stand 0, de Schaad word also immer um %1%%% minnert. Wenn een Angrieper mit eenem Angriff-Weert vun 3500 eenen Willen Soldat trefft, verlüst de Wille 3500·%2%%% = %3% Gesundheid-Punkten.

source: Evade is the chance that the soldier is able to dodge an attack. A level 0 Barbarian has a %1%%% chance to evade an attack, and this increases in steps of %2%%% for each level.
target: Utwieken is de Kans, dat een Soldat eenem Angriff ut de Mööt gaht. Een Willer Soldat mit Stand 0 hett eene Kans vun %1%%%, eenem Angriff uttowieken, un deese Kans wörd mit elkeen Utwieken-Stand um %2%%% beter.

source: There is a second training site: the training camp. It is a big building too, and to complement the battle arena, it trains attack and health (remember, the Barbarian soldiers cannot be trained in defense).
target: ’t gifft noch eenen annern Övens-Boo: dat Övens-Lager. Ok dat is een grotes Huus, un ’t deit tum Slachtenring bi, indeem ’t Angriff un Gesundheid lehrt (vergeet nich, de Willen Soldaten könen keene Verteidigung lehren).

source: This equipment is produced in smithies out of coal, iron, and sometimes gold. You will learn more about this in the second scenario of the Barbarian campaign.
target: Deese Dingen worden in Smeden ut Köhle, Iesen un bi eenigen ok Gold smeedt. De tweede Wille-Lüü-Rutfödderung lehrt di mehr daaröver.

source: You should also keep in mind that each of the tribes in Widelands has its own way of training, so the buildings and wares are different. Also, the ability levels cannot be compared: an Imperial soldier has a base attack of %1% at level 0, while a Barbarian soldier at the same level only has a base attack of %2%.
target: Vergeet nich, dat alle Völker in Widelands anners öven un anner Boen un Waren hebben. De Egenskuppen-Standen könen nich vergleken worden: Een Rieks-Soldat hett een Angriff vun %1% bei Stand 0, een Willer Soldat mit de sülvigen Stand blot %2%.

source: Cloth is needed for Barbarian ships. It is produced out of reed.
target: Wille Schippen bruken Stoff. ’t word ut Reit produzeert.

source: The Barbarian bakers are best in making this flat and tasty pitta bread. It is made out of wheat and water following a secret recipe. Pitta bread is used in the taverns, inns and big inns to prepare rations, snacks and meals. It is also consumed at training sites (training camp and battle arena).
target: Nüms kann deeses platte, leckere Pitta-Brood beter maken as de Willen Backers. ’t word na eenem gehemen Rezept ut Weit un Water maakt. Pitta-Brood word in Kneipen, Kröög un Weertshusen bruukt, um Happen, Spiesen un Mahltieden torecttomaken. ’t word ok vun Övens-Boen (Övens-Lager un Slachtenring) verbruukt.

source: The warrior’s ax is the most dangerous of all Barbarian weapons. Only a few soldiers ever were able to handle this huge and powerful ax. It is produced in a war mill and used – together with food – in a training camp to train soldiers from attack level 4 to level 5.
target: De Ridderext is de machtigste Wapen vun allen, de de Willen Lüü hebben. Bedröövt minn Soldaten könen deese grote, baldadige Ext bruken. ’t word in de Oorlogs-Smee produzeert un – tosamen mit Spiese – im Övens-Lager bruukt, um Soldaten vun Angriff-Stand 4 up Stand 5 to verbetern.

source: A mask is an enhanced armor for Barbarian soldiers. It is produced in the helm smithy and used in the training camp – together with food – to train soldiers from health level 1 to level 2.
target: Eene Mask is een goder Schuur för Wille Soldaten. Se word in de Helmsmee produzeert un im Övens-Lager – tosamen mit Spiesen – bruukt, um Soldaten vun Gesundheid-Stand 1 up Stand 2 uttobilden.

source: This is the most enhanced Barbarian armor. It is produced in a helm smithy and used in a training camp – together with food – to train soldiers from health level 2 to level 3.
target: Dat is de beste Wille Helm. ’t word in de Helmsmee produzeert un im Övens-Lager – tosamen mit Spiesen – bruukt, um Soldaten vun Gesundheid-Stand 2 up Stand 3 uttobilden.

source:
Frequent response of a barbarian fisherman,
often followed by an enjoyable brawl
target:
Wat Wille Fiskers faaktieden seggen;
daarna gifft dat faak eene dülle Haueree

source: Cultivates reed that serves two different purposes for the Barbarian tribe.
target: Kultiveert Reit, wat de Willen Lüü för twee Dingen bruken.

source:
Khantarakh, ‘The Modern Barbarian Economy’,
3ʳᵈ cowhide ‘Craftsmanship and Trade’
target:
Khantarakh, »De modeerne Wille Weertskupp«,
3. Kohhuud »Künstbau un Hannel«

source:
‘When the Barbarian was created,
this was the first thing that he stated:
“You want me fighting without fear?
Then you should create some beer!”’
target:
»As de Wille maakt is worden,
Dat weren siene eersten Woorden:
›Sall ick strieden as een Deer?
Dann giff mi fix een Glaske Beer!‹«

source: The Barbarian metal workshop is the basic production site in a series of three buildings and creates all the tools that Barbarians need. The others are for weapons.
target: De Wille Metalldreihbank is dat eerste Huus vun eener Riege vun dree Husen un produzeert all dat Warktüüg, dat de Willen Lüü bruken. De annern sünd för Wapens.

source:
An old Barbarian proverb
meaning that you need to take some risks sometimes.
target:
Eene olle Wille Seggwies,
wat bedüddt, dat du mennigmaal een Raakwark doon muttst.

source: The Barbarian war mill is their most advanced production site for weapons. As such you will need to enhance an ax workshop in order to get one.
target: De Wille Oorlogs-Smee is dat grootste Huus för Wapen. Du mutt eene Extensmede utbauen, um se to kriegen.

source: The Barbarian ax workshop is the intermediate production site in a series of three buildings. It is enhanced from the metal workshop but doesn’t require additional qualification for the worker.
target: De Wille Extensmede is dat middelste Huus vun eener Riege vun dree Husen. Eene Metalldreihbank word daarto utbaut, aver de Arbeider bruukt daar keene Erfahrung för.

source: Famous barbarian recruitment poster
target: Bekenntes Willes Anhüür-Plakaat

source:
Khantarakh, ‘The Modern Barbarian Economy’,
5ᵗʰ cowhide ‘Traffic and Logistics’
target:
Khantarakh, »De modeerne Wille Weertskupp«,
5. Kohhuud »Verkehr un Planen«

source:
Excerpt from ‘Our Treasures Underground’,
a traditional Barbarian song.
target:
Deel ut »Uns’ Schatten unner de Eer«,
eenem ollen Willen Sang.

source: ‘The Citadel of Adlen surely is the finest masterpiece of Barbarian craftsmanship. Nothing as strong and big and beautiful has ever been built in such a short time.’
target: »Dat Kasteel vun Adlen is dat beste Deel vun Willer Baukünst. Nix wat so fast uns groot un mooi is, is jemaals in so körter Tied baut worden.«

source:
‘Fine cloth and jewelry mean nothing to a true Barbarian.
But a noble sail in the wind will please his eyes.’
target:
»Goder Stoff un Smuck sünd för eenen echten Willen nix weert.
Aver een godes Fock im Wind verbliedt siene Oogen.«

source:
Khantarakh, ‘The Modern Barbarian Economy’,
9ᵗʰ cowhide ‘Seafaring and Conquest’
target:
Khantarakh, »De modeerne Wille Weertskupp«,
9. Kohhuud »Seefahrt un Innehmen«

source: After losing an important battle against the barbarians which lead to the loss of a big part of the Empire’s territory, Lutius leaves Fremil to start a new life. But his destiny takes his ship into a heavy storm, which nearly destroys it. Only with a lot of luck he manages to beach his damaged ship on an unknown desert strand and save his people. For now.
target: Nadeem he eene wichtige Slacht tegen de Willen Lüü un eenen groten Part vun de Land vun de Latiensken Riek verloren hett, verlett Lutjus Freemilt un begünnt een nejes Leven. Aver sien Schipp word vun de Slag in eenen Kohstörm föhrt un haast verneelt. Nix as Glück vergünnt hüm, mit de ramponeerten Schipp up eenen frömden Strand uptolopen un siene Lüü to redden. Vöreerst.

source: We need to build a temple for Satul and we need to worship him well. By this he might show these Barbarians his might and our princess might come back to her senses.
target: Wi mutten eenen Tempel för Satuul bauen un hüm akkeraat anbeden. Dann wiest he villicht deesen Willen Lüü siene Macht un uns’ Königstochter kummt hopentlik weer to Sinnen.

source: Sidolus, during my stay with the Barbarians I learned a lot about their hospitality and bravery. They really impressed me and their warriors and gods seemed to be very strong in the battle against the Empire. Especially their leader Kalitath made a very good host and I started to think about uniting our tribes to make for a peaceful future on this island. So I want you to prepare our people for a marriage and peaceful coexistence with the Barbarians. This includes learning about their gods and preparing to worship them.
target: Sidoolus, as ick mit de Willen Lüü leevt hebb, hebb ick vööl över hör Gastlikheid un Mood lehrt. Se hebben mi unbannig imponeert, un hör Kriegers un Gotten weren im Stried tegen dat Riek baldadig machtig. Vör allem hör Anföhrer Kalitat weer een bannig goder Weert, un ick hebb anfangen, daaröver natodenken, uns’ Völkers för eene freedsame Tokunft up deeser Insel to vereenen. Also sallst Jo nu uns’ Lüü up eene Hochtied vörbereiden un up freedsamen Tosamenleven mit de Willen Lüü. Dat heet ok, dat se över hör Gotten lehren mutten un wo man se anbeedt.

source: Sidolus, I agree we should not bow in front of any other god than Satul. But we might need the god’s help in this case. So I suggest to build a temple and worship Satul with exquisite sacrifices. By this we could inaugurate some priestesses, who might beg Satul to show his powers to the Barbarians and our princess.
target: Sidoolus, ick stimm to, dat wi uns vör keen anner Gott as Satuul daalbugen sallen. Aver hier bruken wi nu de Hülp vun de Gott. Ick slaag also vör, dat wi eene Tempel bauen un Satuul mit unbannig düren Gaven anbeden. Dann könen wi een paar Preestersken inwejen, well Satuul bidden sallen, siene Macht to de Willen Lüü un uns’ Königstochter to wiesen.

source: May Satul warm you, Jundlina. I am glad you are here again. I hope we may trust you, as much as you will trust and be faithful to Satul. How come the Barbarians let you go?
target: Satuul sall Jo warmen, Jundlina. Ick bün blied, dat Jo weer hier büst. Ick hoop, dat wi Jo trauen könen, so as Jo Satuul trauen un troo blieven sallst. Wo kummt dat, dat de Willen Lüü Jo weggahn laten?

source: Three weeks later, I returned to Fremil to speak with our king. He was furious at the Barbarians, yet forbade any attack on these tribes. He believed that our army was too weak to survive in a war against the Barbarians.
target: Dree Weken naher was ick torügg in Freemilt, um mit de König to spreken. He was güünsk över de Willen Lüü, versee mir aver, deese Völker antogriepen. He meende, uns’ Soldateree is to swack, deese Willen Lüü im Krieg to manntjen.

source: Still, I saw no way that I could erase my shame without fighting against these Barbarians. So, I left Fremil by boat to find a new world and a new life for myself, somewhere in the south. Now I am sailing on the Gulf of Perl with my family, some of my friends and a few of my best warriors.
target: Ick wuss nich, wo ick mien Schann ohne eene Slacht tegen de Willen Lüü liekmaken kann. Also hebb ick Freemilt up eenem Schipp verlaten, um eene neje Heimaad un een nejes Leven to finnen, enerwaar im Süden. Upstünds seil ick in de Parrelsbucht mit mien Familie, eenigen Frünnen un een paar vun mienen besten Soldaten.

source: We have established a working economy, trained new soldiers and driven the Barbarians from the island. Now we can think about our next steps.
target: Wi hebben eene gode Weertskupp baut, neje Soldaten utstaffeert un de Willen Lüü vun de Insel verdreven. Nu könen wi över uns’ anner Stappen nadenken.

source: The message was addressed to me, begging me to come back to Fremil. It says that the Empire is at war with the Barbarians. They were attacked from the north by the tribe that I was forbidden to attack. It is clear to me what I must do…
target: ’t was eene Naricht för mi, de mi daarum anging, dat ick na Freemilt torügg koom. Dat Latienske Riek is im Krieg mit de Willen Lüü. Se sünd vun Noorden angrepen worden, vun de Volk, wat ick nich angriepen dürde. Ick weet, wat ick doon mutt …

source: Send a ship northwards to gather some intelligence about the Barbarians. Try to build a port on the island and found an outpost.
target: Stüür een Schipp na Noorden, um wat över de Willen Lüü ruttofinnen. Versöök, eene Muu up de Insel to bauen un eene Butenstee uptosetten.

source: Let’s finish the Barbarians off and provide a nice colony to the caesar of our empire.
target: Laat uns de Willen Lüü schieren un wi könen de Kaiser vun uns’ Riek eene moje Provinz geven.

source: Sire, finally we have defeated the Barbarians in this region. And furthermore, we have built a nice colony for our empire.
target: Mienheer, wi hebben uplest de Willen Lüü in deeser Gegend manntjet. Un daarto hebben wi een mojes Dörp för uns’ Riek baut.

source: Praise the gods, we have succeeded. We managed all the challenges that were imposed on us. We even expelled the Barbarians out of our country. However, our victory is only temporary, as this is still just the beginning of the war. Let’s see what the future still holds for us.
target: De Gotten wees Pries, wi hebben wunnen. Wi hebben all de Rutföderungen överwunnen, de vör uns laggen. Wi hebben sogaar de Willen Lüü ur uns’ Land dreven. Aver uns’ Sieg is blot för körte Tied, denn dat is eerst de Anfang vum Krieg. Laat uns wachten, wat de Tokunft för uns noch paraat hollt.

source: I am really afraid, because we are completely unprepared should the Barbarians decide to attack us.
target: Ick bün würrelk bange, wiel wi överhoopt nich vörbereidt sünd, wenn de Willen Lüü uns angriepen wullen.

source: Sire, let me start from the beginning. The king left Fremil a long time ago to fight the Barbarians. As this duty was demanding his full commitment, he delegated the authority of running the city to his former secretary and instated him as his surrogate around here.
target: Mienheer, ick will am Anfang begünnen. De König hett Freemilt vör langer Tied verlaten, um tegen de Willen Lüü to kämpen. Daar bruukde he siene hele Acht för, also hett he sienen ollen Macker mit sienen Upgaven as Börgmester betraut.

source: Oh no Lutius, I don’t know how this could have happened, but the Barbarians have sacked our headquarters. So, we have lost this battle and our empire!
target: Och nee, Lutjus, wo kunn dat blot passeren? De Willen Lüü hebben uns’ Raadhuus verneelt. So hebben wi de Slacht verlesen un uns’ Riek!

source: Oh no Lutius, I don’t know how this could have happened, but the Barbarians have destroyed our headquarters. So, we can’t deliver the wares to Julia anymore.
target: Och nee, Lutjus, wo kunn dat blot passeren? De Willen Lüü hebben uns’ Raadhuus verneelt. So könen wi Julia de Waren nich liefern.

source: Oh no Lutius, I don’t know how this could have happened, but the Barbarians have destroyed our last warehouse. So, we have lost this battle and our empire!
target: Och nee, Lutjus, wo kunn dat blot passeren? De Willen Lüü hebben uns’ lestes Kraamhuus verneelt. So hebben wi de Slacht verlesen un uns’ Riek!

source: Sire, I admit this has been proven to be a very good deal, although we could have had the plans much earlier. Anyhow, we will not be able to make any deals with the Barbarians, so, we better keep our soldiers in a good mood and train them adequately.
target: Mienheer, dat weer würrelk een bannig goder Hannel, ofschoon wi de Planen ok vööl froher nehmen kunnen. Aver mit de Willen Lüü könen wi nich hanneln, also mutten wi uns’ Soldaten bi Luun hollen un good utbilden.

source: Sire, I admit that we most probably courted the gods’ resentment, but in wartime, the end will sometimes justify the means. And we won’t be able to make any deals with the Barbarians either, so, we better keep our soldiers in good mood and train them adequately.
target: Mienheer, wi hebben nu wull de Spiet vun de Gotten verdeent, aver im Krieg tellt dat Enn un nich de Weg. Un mit de Willen Lüü könen wi nich hanneln, also mutten wi uns’ Soldaten bi Luun hollen un good utbilden.

source: Now that we have some fully trained soldiers, it is time to expel the Barbarians from our homeland.
target: Nu dat wi een paar kumpleet utbildt Soldaten hebben, is ’t an de Tied, de Willen Lüü ut uns’ Heimaad to wegtojagen.

source: Sire, finally we have defeated the Barbarians. We have expelled even the last of them. May they never come back!
target: Mienheer, uplest hebben wi de Willen Lüü manntjet. Wi hebben elkeen vun se wegdreven. Sallen se nie mehr weerkomen!

source: Decide whether you want to work with Murilius against the Barbarians. If so, fill his warehouse with these wares:
target: Entschee di, of du mit Murilius tegen de Willen Lüü tosamen arbeiden willst. Wenn ja, doo deese Waren in sien Kraamhuus:

source: Defeat the Barbarians and the Empire Colony
target: Manntje de Willen Lüü un dat Rieks-Dörp

source: The Barbarians and the Empire are too dangerous to allow them to live near us. We must defeat them both.
target: De Willen Lüü un dat Riek sünd to gefahrelk, as dat wi se in uns’ Naberskupp leven laten könen. Wi mutten se beide manntjen.

source: In this case, Reebaude, I must inform you of the presence of an inhospitable, hostile tribe of barbarians in the vicinity of this very outpost of the Empire.
target: In deesem Gefall, Reebaude, mutt ick di up de Biwesenheid vun eenem unwirtelken, tegenstriedigen Volk vun Willen henwiesen, de in de Naberskupp vun jüüst deeser Butenstee vum Latiensken Riek leven.

source: The barbarian tribe he mentioned is also a threat. I don’t want to share this land with anyone, as sharing only leads to conflicts and battles, as we saw in our old home. We must defeat the barbarians as well.
target: Dat Wille Volk, waar he vun sproken hett, is ok eene Gefahr. Ick will deeses Land mit nüms delen, wiel Delen blot to Stried un Kriegen föhrt, as wie in uns’ oller Heimaad sehn hebben. Wi mutten ok de Willen Lüü manntjen.

source: Now I permit you to assist us in conquering the barbarians, who live in a sheltered valley northwest to us. I charge you, expand along the northern end of the mountains enclosing this outpost; you will find the barbarians there – attack them! We will fend off attacks launched by the enemy.
target: Nu verlööv ick ji, uns to helpen, de Willen Lüü to manntjen, wat in eenem schuligen Daal noordwestelk vun uns leven. Ick kumdeer ji, vergrotert jo Gewest langs de noordelken Enn vun de Kedd vun Bargen, wat deese Butenstee insluten; daar finnt ji de Willen Lüü – griept se an! Wi verteidigen tegen all Angriffen, wat de Feind begünnt.

source: Had you arrived a week earlier, I would have agreed to your request instantly. Now, however, a spot of bother has appeared on the horizon. I mean this quite literally; foreigners have come from far away and seek to drive us out and take over our lands as we ourselves did, driven by need, seize them from the hostile people who lived here. Warlike Barbarians, and an imperial scallywag named Murilius who made the most outrageous demands. We defeated them all, and believed to have found peace at last. And for four long years, life was peaceful indeed.
target: Wenn du vör eener Week komen wärst, würr ick diener Beed stracks tostimmen. Nu aver hett is een Fleck vun Verdreet över de Kimm komen. Dat meen ick jüüst so; Frömde sünd vun wied weg ankomen un wullen uns ut deesen Lannen verdrieven un se för sik sülven nehmen, jüüst as wi se ut maller Nood vun de feindelk Lüü nohmen hebben, wat hier leevt hebben. Striedske Wille, un een Rieks-Prüllker wat Murilius heet un de allerunverschaamtsten Förderungen daan hett. Wi hebben se all manntjet un gloovt, uplest Free funnen to hebben. Un veer lang Jahr  lang weer dat Leven würrelk freedsaam.

source: Expanding is as simple as building a military building at the edge of your territory. The Barbarians have a selection of four different military buildings: sentries, barriers, towers and fortresses. The bigger the building, the more expensive it is to build, but the more land it will conquer around itself and the more soldiers can be stationed there. The buildings also vary in their vision range: buildings with a tower see farther than others.
target: Vergrotern is ganz licht: Du baust een Soldateree-Boo dicht bi de Grenz vun dien Gewest. De Willen Lüü hebben veer verschedene Soldateree-Boen: Wachters-Kamers, Uppassen, Toorns un Schanzen. So groter de Boo is, so dürer is ’t, aver ’t nimmt mehr Land in un kann mehr Soldaten upnehmen. De Boen hebben unglieke Utsichtswiedten: Boen mit Toorns sehn wieder as anners.

source: The initial setting depends on the type of the building. For the Barbarians, the sentry is the only building that prefers rookies by default. You should change this setting to fit your current needs.
target: De normaale Instellen hangt vun de Huus-Aard of. De Willen Lüü hebben blot een Boo, de Wachters-Kamer, wat normaal Snöttbaarten vörtreckt. Du sallst deese Instellen ännern, as ’t upstünds good is.

source: The citadel can house 12 soldiers, and it is the biggest military building the Barbarians can build. It also costs a lot of resources and takes a long time to build. It is most suited to guard strategically important points like constricted points or mountains.
target: Dat Kasteel hett Steden för 12 Soldaten un is de grootste Soldateree-Boo, wat de Willen Lüü bauen könen. ’t köst mennig Materialien un dat Bauen düürt lang. ’t is good gadelk, um taktisk dürable Steden as enge Passen of Bargen to schütten.

source: The Barbarians produce granite blocks in quarries and granite mines.
target: De Willen Lüü produzeren Blocken vun Flint in Flintslagerhusen un Flint-Bargwarken.

source: Besides pitta bread and meat, fish is also a foodstuff for the Barbarians. It is used in the taverns, inns and big inns and at the training sites (training camp and battle arena).
target: Tegen Pitta-Brood un Fleesk is ok Fiss eene Spies för de Willen Lüü. ’t word in Kneipen, Kröög, Weertshusen un Övens-Boen (Övens-Lager un Slachtenring) bruukt.

source: Only this beer is acceptable for the soldiers in a battle arena. Some say that the whole power of the Barbarians lies in this ale. It helps to train the soldiers’ evade level from 0 to 1 to 2. Strong beer is also used in big inns to prepare meals.
target: Nix as deeses Beer is good genoog för Soldaten im Slachtenring. ’t heet, all de Kracht vun de Willen Lüü kummt vun deesem Drank. ’t helpt, de Utwieken-Stand vun Soldaten vun 0 över 1 na 2 to verbetern. Deftigs Beer word ok in Weertshusen bruukt, um Mahltieden torechttomaken.

source: The fires of the Barbarians are usually fed with coal. Consumers are several buildings: lime kiln, smelting works, ax workshop, war mill, and helm smithy.
target: Dat Füür in Willen Husen brannt meest mit Köhl. To ’n Bispööl in de Kalkbranneree, Smeltwark, Extensmede, Oorlogs-Smee un Helmsmee.

source: The ax is the basic weapon of the Barbarians. All young soldiers are equipped with it.
target: De Ext is de eenfachste Wapen för de Willen Lüü. Alle nejen Soldaten kriegen eene.

source: This is a dangerous weapon the Barbarians are able to produce. It is produced in the war mill. Only trained soldiers are able to wield such a weapon. It is used – together with food – in the training camp to train soldiers from attack level 3 to 4.
target: Dat is eene priekelne Wapen, wat de Willen Lüü produzeren könen! ’t word in de Oorlogs-Smee produzeert. Blot bannig gode Soldaten könen sülk eene Wapen bruken. ’t word – tosamen mit Spiesen – im Övens-Lager bruukt, um Soldaten vun Angriff-Stand 3 up 4 to verbetern.

source: The Barbarian metal workshop is the basic production site in a series of three buildings and creates all the tools that Barbarians need. The others are for weapons.
target: De Wille Metalldreihbank is dat eerste Huus vun eener Riege vun dree Husen un produzeert all dat Warktüüg, dat de Willen Lüü bruken. De annern sünd för Wapens.

source: Produces all the axes that the Barbarians use for warfare.
target: Produzeert all Exten, de de Willen Lüü för Slachten bruken.

source: Ages ago, the Barbarians learned to delve into mountainsides for that black material that feeds their furnaces.
target: In ollen Tieden hebben de Willen Lüü lehrt, in Bargen na deem swarten Mineraal to söken, wat hör Füürsteden unnerhollt.

source: General Claudius Cæcus Cessus reporting a quick victory over the Barbarians thanks to the superior vision of a tower
target: Generaal Claudius Cæcus Cessus bericht över eenen fixen Sieg över de Willen Lüü, wat dör de unbannig gode Utsicht vun eenem Toorn mögelk worden weer

source: May Satul warm you too, Colionder. Yes, I wondered if there is a way that we could centralize our food production. We lose a lot of productivity because our people are accustomed to making their own food. I feel if we could split responsibilities, it would be better for us all. I want your thoughts on this.
target: Satuul sall Jo ok warmen, Kojonder. Jau, ick överlegg, of wi uns’ Spiesen-Weertskupp beter tosamenführen könen. Wi sünd bannig langsaam mit de Produzeren vun all Dingen, wiel uns’ Lüü dat wohnt sünd, hör eegen Eten to maken. Wenn wi de Toständigheiten updelen könen, is dat better för uns all, gloov ick. Ick will weten, wat Jo daarvun hollst.

source: Other ways to produce food – different kinds of food – are fishers and farms. The wheat of the farms has to be processed with water in a bakery before it becomes edible. You can obtain water by building a well. For the best productivity, build it on a spot where your geologists have found a water source.
target: Anner Wege, Spiesen – anner Aarden vun Spiesen – to produzeren, sünd Fiskers un Buurdereen. De Weit vun Buurdereen mutt mit Water in eener Backeree verarbeidt worden, ehr man ’t eten kann. Am meesten Water kriggst du, indeem du eene Well an sülk eener Stee baust, waar een Schattsöker Water funnen hett.

source: An example: the default value for scythes is 1. If you build a farm, a carrier will take a scythe and become a farmer. Then there will be no scythes left, but the target quantity is 1, therefore your toolsmith will start producing another one.
target: To ’n Bispööl is de End-Tahl för Sichten 1. Wenn du eene Buurderee baust, nimmt een Lastendrager eene Sichte un word een Buur. Dann sünd keene Sichten över, aver de End-Tahl is 1, also maakt diene Warktüügsmee eene neje.

source: This tree is only planted by the amazon tribe but can be harvested for logs.
target: Deeser Boom word blot vun de Amazonen-Volk plant, kann aver för Boomstammen umkappt worden.

source: I noticed that the construction of the sawmill is complete, so we can begin to refine the logs that the lumberjacks are harvesting into planks.
target: De Saagmöhlen is beschickt, wi könen nu Planken ut de de Boomstammen vun de Boomhauers maken.

source: Atlantean harvesting song
target: Atlantisk Arntlied

source: Line from the harvesting song ‘The Wealth of the Fields’
target: Rieg ut de Arntlied »De Riekdoom vun de Ackers«

source: From the north we are endangered by a belligerent tribe, led by warlord Törver, that is rapidly building up its armies. They may soon have become too strong to be defeated.
target: Im Noorden droht uns een striedlevend Volk, wat Generaal Törver anföhrt, un wat siene Soldateree fix utbaut. Se worden bold to machtig worden, um se noch manntjen to könen.

source: Let’s hope that Lanissa – the warlord holding sway over that castle – has not discovered our movements yet. Perhaps we have a chance of conquering that mighty building without a bigger fight! However, it is essential that we capture it. It will be the key to our reign over this island!
target: Hopentlik hett uns Laniss’ – de Kummandantin, de dat Slött kuntrolleert – noch nich funnen. Villicht könen wi deesen gewaltigen Boo sünner grote Slachten innehmen! Wi mutten ’t driest innehmen. ’t is de Slötel tum Seggen över deese Insel!

source: Ensure the supply of building wares
target: De Versörgung mit Baumaterialien sekern

source: Supply Building Wares
target: Baumaterialien-Versörgung

source: Food is very important for mines and military training areas. Establish a well working food environment by building at least one farm, one blackroot farm and a mill. The two kinds of flour together with water from a well will be baked into bread in a bakery, so build a bakery and a well, too.
target: Spiesen sünd leep wichtig för Bargwarken un Övens-Boen för Soldaten. Bau eene gode Versörgung mit Spiesen up, indeem du tominnst eene Buurderee, eene Swartwuddel-Buurderee un eene Möhlen baust. De twee Aarden vun Mehl worden mit Water ut eener Well in eener Backeree to Brood backen, bau also ok eene Backeree un eene Well.

source: We spent the last week building two watchtowers on the mountains close to our landing area; and, of course, a hall for us all. We have very talented constructors in our group – still, the buildings do not match the art we had on Atlantis. I hope they will withstand the next rain. At least, the towers will warn us if a ship from Atlantis follows us and if the island is inhabited, we will see attackers a long time before they arrive.
target: Wi hebben in de leste Week twee Wachttoorns up de Bargen dicht bi de Kuntrei, waar wi lannt sünd, baut; un unatürelk eene Halle för uns all. Wi hebben bannig gode Baukeerls bi uns – aver de Husen sünd doch nich so düll as wat wi up Atlantis harren. Ick hoop, dat se de anner Regen överleven. Tominnst warnen uns de Toorns, wenn uns een Schipp vun Atlantis folgt, un wenn Lüü up de Insel leven, sehn wi Angriepers, lang ehr se daar sünd.

source: Our building infrastructure is finished and I spent some days making sure that everybody is working well together. Now, there are other pressing matters. I called Colionder, my personal cook, before me to get his help with sorting some things out.
target: Uns’ Bau-Weertskupp is kumpleet un ick hebb een paar Dagen daarmit verbrocht, uptopassen, dat all Lüü good tosamen warken. Nu gifft dat anner wichtige Dingen. Ick hebb Kojonder, mienen persönelken Kock, to mi ropen laten, um mit siener Hülp een paar Dinge klaar to maken.

source: Oooh and even more important: the smoking of fish and meat to cleanse them and improve their taste is terrible. My house is full of smoke and stinks for weeks afterwards. Don’t you think that this could be done in a special building where the side effects do not matter? I think those two things would be accepted by the people and would reduce the cooking time without taking away the ritual.
target: Och, un noch vööl wichtiger: Dat Rökeln vun Fiss un Fleesk, um se schier un good to maken, is schreckelk. Mien Huus is dann alltied vull vun Qualm un stinkt för Weken. Finnst Jo nich ok, dat wi dat in eenem eegen Huus daarför maken könen, waar dat nich slimm is? Ick gloov, deese twee Dingen worden de Lüü annehmen un de Kocktied minnern, sünner dat dat Eten to un-fierlik word.

source: The implications frighten me. Are there others on this island? Where are they then? They work with fire, are they praying to Satul too? Are they friends or foe? And why is the building burned down? Has this island seen war? Is a war being waged on it right now?
target: Wat dat bedüüdt, maakt mi bang. Gift dat mehr Lüü up de Insel? Waar sünd se dann? Se warken mit Füür, bden se ok to Satuul? Sünd se Freunde of Feinde? Un waarum is dat Huus ofbrannt? Hett dat up deese Insel Krieg geven? Gifft dat hier jüüst nu Krieg?

source: We found one more building of this strange making. We have yet to see any of its builders. But obviously there has been a community on this island before and obviously it was militarized. I have to check on our military status with my generals. I will not allow that a potential enemy will find us unprepared.
target: Wi hebben noch een Huus funnen, wat up deese komiske Aard baut is. Wi hebben de Baukeerls immer noch nich to sehn kregen. Aver dat hett openbaar maal eene Klottje up deeser Insel geven, wat openbaar ok Soldateree harr. Ick mutt mit mienen Offizeren över de Tostand vun uns’ Soldateree reden. Een mögelker Feind düür uns nich unklaar finnen.

source: We lost a building to the ocean!
target: Wi hebben een Huus an de See verloren!

source: We are fairly sure that we are not alone on the island. We do not know if the others on this island are friends or foes, so we need to tread carefully. Explore the island by building at least one house for a scout.
target: Wi sünd uns temelk seker, dat wi nich alleen up de Insel sünd. Wi weten nich, of de anners hier Frünnen of Feinden sünd, also mutten wi uppassen. Försk de Insel ut, indeem du tominnst een Huus för eenen Bespejer baust.

source: As our settlement is growing, we will need more space for all buildings. Expand our territory by building military buildings. Build some guardhouses and at least one tower for its larger view range.
target: As uns’ Dörp wasst bruken wi mehr Rüümte för all de Husen. Verwieder uns’ Gewest, indeem du Soldateree-Boen baust. Bau een paar Wahrders-Stuven un tominnst eenen Toorn um siene groter Sicht.

source: But we need to be cautious using the stones and other precious material. When we no longer need a building, we will dismantle it instead of burning it down.
target: Aver wi mutten vörsichtig wesen, wo wi de Stenen un anner düres Material bruken. Wenn wi een Huus nich mehr bruken, worden wi ’t plattrieten un nich ofbrannen.

source: May Satul warm you, Loftomor. Thank you for building such a great temple. Now we need to bring food and our most precious wares to the temple to make for satisfying sacrifices. And don’t forget that the initiates who will serve Satul to become his priestesses need golden tabards and diamonds.
target: Satuul sall Jo warmen, Loftomoor. Wees bedankt, dat Jo sülk eenen unbannig mojen Tempel baut hest. Nu mutten wi Spiesen un uns’ allerdüürsten Waren to de Tempel brengen, um se de Gott to sien Tofredenheid to opfern. Verget nich, dat de Anwahrders, well Satuul as Preestersken denen sallen, Goldene Kluften un Edelstenen bruken.

source: Start building mines on the mountain
target: Bau Bargwarken up de Barg

source: This is only the first example of a ware which has to be refined before being used in a secondary building – others will follow.
target: Dat is blot een Bispööl för eene Waar, de eerst verarbeidt worden mutt, ehr se in eenem tweeden Huus bruukt worden kann – ’t gifft mennig anner Bispölen.

source: Other ways to produce food – different kinds of food – are fishers and farms. The wheat of the farms has to be processed with water in a bakery before it becomes edible. You can obtain water by building a well. For the best productivity, build it on a spot where your geologists have found a water source.
target: Anner Wege, Spiesen – anner Aarden vun Spiesen – to produzeren, sünd Fiskers un Buurdereen. De Weit vun Buurdereen mutt mit Water in eener Backeree verarbeidt worden, ehr man ’t eten kann. Am meesten Water kriggst du, indeem du eene Well an sülk eener Stee baust, waar een Schattsöker Water funnen hett.

source: Workers gain experience by successful work. With enough experience, they become more advanced workers, who are necessary to operate the enhanced buildings. Do not enhance a building before you have enough advanced workers to operate the advanced building!
target: Arbeiders sammeln Erfahrung, wenn se good arbeiden. Wenn se genoog Erfahrung hebben, worden se betere Arbeiders, de för utbaute Husen nödig sünd. Bau een Huus nich ut, wenn du noch nich genoog künnige Arbeiders hest, um daar to arbeiden!

source: Bigger and better buildings – including all military ones – require better building materials. They cannot be built out of simple logs – the logs have to be refined to blackwood by a wood hardener first. Always remember to build a wood hardener before you run out of blackwood, as without it you cannot expand.
target: Grote un betere Husen – un alle Soldateree-Boen – bruuken betere Baumaterialien. Se könen nich blot mit Boomstammen baut worden – de Boomstammen mutten eerst vun eener Holtharderee to Haartholt verbetert worden. Bau immer tiedig eene Holtharderee, denn wenn du keen Haartholt mehr hest, kannst du dien Gewest nich mehr vergrotern.

source: You can obtain water by building a well upon a water source, which your geologists can discover when you send them to any flag that is not on a mountain.
target: Du kannst Water vun eener Well kriegen, de up eener Quell baut word; Schattsökers finnen Quellen, wenn du se to elkeen Fahn schickst, de nich up eenem Barg staht.

source: The third material necessary for improved buildings is reed, used to cover roofs. Reed fields are planted by a gardener around his building, the reed yard.
target: Dat darde Baumaterial för gode Husen is Reit, wat man för Reitdacken bruukt. Reit word vun eenem Gaardner in de Naberskupp vun sienem Huus, de Reitplanteree, anplant.

source: To attack an enemy, you must click on the door of an adversary’s military building. A menu will pop up allowing you to select the number of soldiers that should attack. When you are ready with setting the number, click on the cross (‘Start Attack’).
target: Um eenen Feind antogriepen, klick de Döör vun eenem Soldateree-Boo vun dienem Feind an. Een Fenster kummt lett sik sehn, waar du utkören sallst, wo völe Soldaten angriepen sallen. Wenn du de Tahl sett hest, klick dat Krüüz (»Angriepen«) an.

source: Good news! Today our wood economy was completed. Now we can be sure that we will have enough wood for our future building projects.
target: Hunnert! Uns’ Holt-Weertskupp is nu kumpleet. Nu weten wi, dat wi för neje Bauvörhebbens genoog Holt hebben.

source: However: for all these bigger buildings, we need better and more elegant building materials. So you have to build a house for the stonemason, who will cut columns from marble.
target: Aver för all de groten Husen bruuken wi betere Baumaterialien. Baut also eerst maal een Huus för eenen Flintslager, de Pielers ut Marmel sniddjet.

source: That’s good. The first big military building is complete and the mining infrastructure is getting better and better. Now we should think about preparing ourselves for battle.
target: Hunnert. De eerste grote Soldateree-Boo is beschickt, un de Bargwarks-Weertskupp word immer beter. Nu könen wi uns för de Slacht torechtmaken.

source: Build a quarry close to the abundant rocks to free some building plots and get some valuable resources.
target: Bau een Flintslagerhuus dicht bi de völen Stenen, um Rüümte för Husen freei to maken un wichtige Mineraale to kriegen.

source: Produce cloth for building our first ship
target: Produzeer Stoff för uns’ eerstes Schipp

source: Well done so far. We have produced enough wheat. Now dismantle the farm and build the next building in the production chain.
target: Hunnert bit hier. Wi hebben genoog Weit. Nu riet de Buurderee platt in bau dat anner Huus in de Produzeren-Kedde.

source: For example, it might be a good idea to produce a reasonable amount of a ware and afterwards dismantle the building to gain space for another building.
target: To ’n Bispööl is ’t villicht eene gode Idee, eenen lepen Bült vun eener Waar to produzeren un dann dat Huus platt to rieten, um Rüümte för een anners Huus to kriegen.

source: But be careful not to waste any bigger building spots.
target: Aver pass up, dat du de groten Rüümte nich verklüngelst.

source: Remember to check the messages and the building status labels for unproductive buildings.
target: Vergeet nich, in de Narichten un Husen-Tostand-Texten natokieken, um unnütze Husen to finnen.

source: Open the Building Window of a Farm
target: Maak dat Huus-Fenster vun eener Buurderee open

source: Click on a farm building to open its building window. This will let you analyze the building.
target: Kilck up eene Buurderee, um hör Huus-Fenster opentomaken. Dann kannst du wichtige Dingen över dat Huus ankieken.

source: Except, maybe we should restrict the input of all buildings which consume any of our building materials to zero. Or maybe we could even pause the production in all bigger buildings and get the workers some rest until we have produced some of their input wares.
target: Blot, för de Husen, wat Baumaterialien bruken, sallen wi dat Lager daarför beter up null setten. Of dat Produzeren in all grotern Husen anhollen un de Arbeiders ruhen laten, bit wi de Waren, wat se bruken, produzeert hebben.

source: The lumberjack working at this lumberjack’s house can’t find any trees in his work area. You should consider dismantling or destroying the building or building a forester’s house.
target: De Boomhauer dat warkt bi deese Boomhaueree hett keene Bomen tum Ofslaan. Överlegg di, of du dat Huus plattrieten of ofbrannen willst, of bau een Försterhuus.

source: This is as good a place as any to start building our new home. First of all, we must ensure a stable supply of basic building materials.
target: Deese Stee is so good as elkeen anner, um uns neje Heimaad to gründen. Toeerst mutten wi uns um eene gode Versörgung mit allen Baumaterialien kümmern.

source: I advise to build all those buildings within a short distance of each other, and to construct two warehouses nearby: One should be set to store only weapons, armor, ores, metal and coal; the other to store building materials.
target: Ick raad an, dat all deese Husen dicht binanner baut worden, un twee Kraamhusen in de Naberskupp: För eens sall fastleggt worden, dat ’t nix as Wapen, Panzers, Kluten, Metallen un Köhle verwahrt; de anner sall Baumaterialien upbewahren.

source: Barbarians! You have refused my offer of friendship most ungraciously by destroying the beautiful building we presented you with!
target: Wille! Ji hebbt mien Angebood vun Fründskupp leep undankbaar torüggwesen, indeem ji dat wunnermoje Huus, wat wi ji geven hebben, verneelt hebbt!

source: The lumberjack’s hut is a small building, so I will then go on to select the small buildings tab. Then I’ll choose the lumberjack’s hut.
target: Dat Boomhauer-Huus is een lüttes Huus, also köör ick de Listenwessler för de lütten Husen ut. Dann köör ick dat Boomhauer-Huus ut.

source: That won’t do yet. I still need to connect the lumberjack’s hut to the rest of my road network. After ordering the construction site, I was automatically put into road building mode, so all I have to do is click on the blue flag in front of my headquarters.
target: Dat langt noch nich. Ick mutt dat Boomhauer-Huus eerst mit de Stratennett verbinnen. Nadeem ick de Baustee anörnt hebb, bün ick automatisk klaar tum Stratenbau. Ick mutt also blot de blaue Fahn vör mienem Raadhuus anklicken.

source: This button toggles showing the building’s work area. When the lumberjack leaves the building to look for trees to fell, he will only look for them within this area. Let me show you how perfect this spot is.
target: Deeser Knoop knipst an of ut, of dat Arbeidsgewest vun de Huus wiest worden sall. Wenn de Boomhauer sien Huus verlett, um na Bomen tum Oflsaan to söken, söcht he blot in deesem Gewest. Laat mi di wiesen, wo good deese Stee is.

source: Red building symbols can only hold small buildings and flags.
target: Up eenem roden Huus-Teken könen blot lütte Husen un Fahnen baut worden.

source: In order to show or hide the building census labels, you can select the ‘Show Census’ / ‘Hide Census’ entry from the ‘Show / Hide’ menu on the bottom, or press the ‘%s’ key on the keyboard.
target: Um de Namen vun Husen to wiesen of verbargen, kannst du de Indrag »Namen vun Husen wiesen« / »Namen vun Husen verbargen« im »Wiesen / Verbargen«-Menü am unnern Rand utkören, of de Handigtast »%s« up de Knöppboord bruken.

source: Show the building status
target: Wies de Husen-Tostand

source: In order to show or hide the building status labels, you can select the ‘Show Status’ entry from the ‘Show / Hide’ menu on the bottom, or press the ‘%s’ key on the keyboard.
target: Um de Tahlen över Husen to wiesen of verbargen, kannst du de Indrag »Husen-Tostand wiesen« / »Husen-Tostand verbargen« im »Wiesen / Verbargen«-Menü am unnern Rand utkören, of de Handigtast »%s« up de Knöppboord bruken.

source: Burning down the quarry: This is the fastest way of clearing the space. While the worker abandons the building, the wares are lost.
target: Du kannst dat Flintslagerhuus ofbrannen: Dat is de gauest Aard, de Rüümte freeitomaken. De Arbeider verlett dat Huus, aver de Waren gahn fleiten.

source: Build a military building on your border. Choose the one you like most.
target: Bau een Soldateree-Boo dicht bi de Grenz. Köör ut, welkes du am leevsten willst.

source: Remember that big buildings (green icon) cannot be built on small (red) or medium (yellow) building plots, but buildings can be built on a building plot that provides more space than they need. You should always keep that in mind when you search for a suitable place.
target: Vergeet nich, dat grote Husen (grönes Teken) nich up lütten (rood) of middelmatigen (geel) Steden baut worden könen, aver Husen könen up Steden baut worden, de mehr Rüümte as nödig hebben. Daar sallst du immer an denken, wenn du eene gode Stee utsöchst.

source: Expanding is as simple as building a military building at the edge of your territory. The Barbarians have a selection of four different military buildings: sentries, barriers, towers and fortresses. The bigger the building, the more expensive it is to build, but the more land it will conquer around itself and the more soldiers can be stationed there. The buildings also vary in their vision range: buildings with a tower see farther than others.
target: Vergrotern is ganz licht: Du baust een Soldateree-Boo dicht bi de Grenz vun dien Gewest. De Willen Lüü hebben veer verschedene Soldateree-Boen: Wachters-Kamers, Uppassen, Toorns un Schanzen. So groter de Boo is, so dürer is ’t, aver ’t nimmt mehr Land in un kann mehr Soldaten upnehmen. De Boen hebben unglieke Utsichtswiedten: Boen mit Toorns sehn wieder as anners.

source: As soon as a military building is manned, it will extend your land. I will tell you more about military buildings in another tutorial.
target: Sobold een Soldateree-Boo besett is, vergrotert ’t dien Gewest. In eener annern Inföhren vertell ick di mehr över Soldateree-Boen.

source: One of these training sites is the battle arena. It is a big and expensive building, and it trains soldiers in evade. Since soldiers get very hungry during their workout, this building needs a lot of food and strong beer. In a real game, you should have a good infrastructure before you build it.
target: Eens vun deeses Övens-Boen is de Slachtenring. ’t is een grotes und düres Huus, wat Soldaten dat Utwieken lehrt. Soldaten worden daar düchtig smachtig bi, daarum bruukt deeses Huus mennig Spiesen un Deftigs Beer. In eenem echten Speel bruukst du eene gode Weertskupp, bevör du Övens-Boen baust.

source: There is a second training site: the training camp. It is a big building too, and to complement the battle arena, it trains attack and health (remember, the Barbarian soldiers cannot be trained in defense).
target: ’t gifft noch eenen annern Övens-Boo: dat Övens-Lager. Ok dat is een grotes Huus, un ’t deit tum Slachtenring bi, indeem ’t Angriff un Gesundheid lehrt (vergeet nich, de Willen Soldaten könen keene Verteidigung lehren).

source: In every military building, you can set the preference for heroes (trained soldiers) or rookies. From time to time, a soldier will walk out of the building and be replaced by a stronger/weaker one automatically – this is what you saw earlier.
target: För elkeen Soldateree-Boo kannst du fastleggen, of Helden (utbildt Suldaten) of Snöttbaarten vörtrucken worden. Of un an verlaat een Soldat dat Huus un word automatisk mit eenem starkeren/swackeren utwesselt – dat hest du vörhen sehn.

source: The initial setting depends on the type of the building. For the Barbarians, the sentry is the only building that prefers rookies by default. You should change this setting to fit your current needs.
target: De normaale Instellen hangt vun de Huus-Aard of. De Willen Lüü hebben blot een Boo, de Wachters-Kamer, wat normaal Snöttbaarten vörtreckt. Du sallst deese Instellen ännern, as ’t upstünds good is.

source: There is another way how you can control the strength of a military building: by the number of soldiers stationed there. Just click on the arrow buttons to decrease or increase the desired number of soldiers. Every building has a maximum capacity. In case of the barrier, it is five, for example.
target: Du kannst de Foss vun eenem Soldateree-Boo ok anners fastsetten: indeem du de Tahl vun Soldaten, de hier wohnen, ännerst. Klick de Piel-Knopen an, um de wünsket Tahl to verhogen of minnern. Elkeen Boo hett eene hoogste Tahl vun Steden. To ’n Bispööl hett een Uppass fiev.

source: The first number describes how many soldiers are currently in this building. In this example, only one soldier is left inside (each military building is always guarded by at least one soldier).
target: De eerste Tahl is de Tahl vun Soldaten, de jüüst in de Huus sünd. In deesem Bispööl is blot een Soldat tohuus (elkeen Soldateree-Boo word alltieden vun tominnst eenem Soldat bewaakt).

source: The second number tells you how many additional soldiers reside in this building, but are currently outside. The five soldiers may be attacking an enemy. They will return when they have been successful.
target: De tweede Tahl is de Tahl vun Soldaten, de in deesem Huus wohnen, aver unnerwegens sünd. De fiev Soldaten griepen villicht eenen Feind an. Se komen torügg, wenn se fardig sünd.

source: You can only reduce the number of soldiers to one. The last soldier of a building will never come out (unless this building is attacked). If you want to have your soldier elsewhere, you will have to dismantle or burn down the building.
target: Du kannst de Tahl vun Soldaten nich up null minnern. De leste Soldat in eenem Huus gaht nich rut (buten wenn dat Huus angrepen word). Wenn du hüm annerswaar hebben willst, mutt du dat Huus plattrieten of ofbrannen.

source: However, destroying a military building is always linked with a risk: the land is still yours, but it is no longer protected. Any enemy that builds his own military sites can take over that land without a fight, causing your buildings to burst into flames. Furthermore, some parts of the land can now be hidden under the fog of war. You should therefore only dismantle military buildings deep inside your territory where you are safe from enemies.
target: Een Soldateree-Boo oftobrannen is immer riskant: Dat Land höört di noch, is aver nich mehr schütt. Een Feind, de sülvst een Soldateree-Boo baut, kann dat Land sünner Stried innehmen. Diene Husen brannen dann of. Butendeem sünd villicht Parten vun dienem Land dann unner de Kriegsnevel verstoken. Du sallst Soldateree-Boen daarher blot dann plattrieten, wenn se deep in dien Gewest sünd, waar keene Feinde henkomen.

source: To attack a building, click on its doors, choose the number of soldiers that you wish to send and click on the ‘Attack’ button.
target: Um een Huus antogriepen, klick siene Döör an, köör de Tahl vun Soldaten, wat de schicken willst, ut, un klick dann de »Angriepen«-Knoop an.

source: Ports are built like normal buildings, but are only available on blue port spaces. Just click on a field with the icon and the building menu automatically offers you to build a port.
target: Muden baust du as anner Husen, aver se sünd blot up de blauen Rüümten för Muden paraat. Klick een Feld mit de Teken an un dat Bau-Menü büddt di eene Muu an.

source: The shipyard is a medium building. Although it can be built everywhere on the map, the shipwright only works when he is close to the water and there are no trees or roads at the shoreline.
target: De Warft is een middelmatigs Huus. Se kann up de ganze Kaart baut worden, aver de Schippebauer warkt blot dann, wenn Water in de Naberskupp is un de Küst nich vun Bomen of Straten verdeckt word.

source: This is the icon for stopping production. You will find it in the building window.
target: Dat is dat Teken, waarmit du de Warft anhollen kannst. Du finnst ’t im Huus-Fenster.

source: Now it’s your turn: Build a gold mine on the mountain in the south and connect it to the main land by building waterways over the streams.
target: Nu büst du dran: Bau een Gold-Bargwark up de Barg im Süden un verbinn ’t mit de Höövdland, indeem du Prielen över de Beken baust.

source: Build a gold mine on the mountain in the south, and connect it to the mainland by building waterways over the streams.
target: Bau een Gold-Bargwark up de Barg im Süden un verbinn ’t mit de Höövdland, indeem du Prielen över de Beken baust.

source: Open the building statistics window for an overview over the buildings you have.
target: Maak dat Fenster för Tahlen över Husen op, um fix to sehn, wat för Husen du hest.

source: Below every building, there are two lines. The first one shows the number of buildings you own and how many are under construction. The second line shows the average productivity if it is a production site or training site, or the stationed and desired soldiers in military buildings.
target: Unner elkeen Huus sünd twee Riegen. De eerste wiest de Tahl vun Husen, wat du hest un wat baut word. De twede wiest de Wöörde vun all deese Husen dör de Bank, wenn ’t een normaales Huus of een Övens-Boo is, of de Tahl vun Soldaten, de daar sünd un de sien sallen, wenn ’t een Soldateree-Boo is.

source: This is the building statistics window. It shows you all buildings you can own, sorted by their size.
target: Dat us dat Fenster för Tahlen över Husen. ’t wiest du all de Husen, de du hest, na Grött sorteert.

source: ‘2/4’ below your sentry: For military buildings, the stationed soldiers are shown instead of a productivity. You want to have four soldiers in your sentries, but only two soldiers are stationed in this kind of building. This leaves two vacant positions – we really need more soldiers.
target: »2/4« unner diener Wachters-Kamer: För Soldateree-Boen wiest dat Fenster de Tahl vun Soldaten un nich de Wöörde. Du willst veer Soldaten in dienen Wachters-Kamerken hebben, hest aver blot twee Soldaten in deesen Husen. ’t gifft also twee lege Steden – wi bruken absolut mehr Soldaten.
