source: This rock mine’s main vein is exhausted. Expect strongly diminished returns on investment. This mine can’t be enhanced any further, so you should consider dismantling or destroying it.
target: De Ader vun deese Stenen-Bargwark is leeg. De Mine produzeert vun nu an vööl dürer as normaal. De Bargwark kann nich utbaut werden, also överlegg di, of du de Mine ofbrannen of plattrieten willst.

source: The stone mine can produce one slab of granite in %s on average if the supply with rations is steady and the mine is not worn out.
target: De Steen-Bargwark produzeert dör de Bank all %s een Deel Flint, wenn de Versörgung good un dat Bargwark nich leeg is.

source: Precious stones are used in the construction of big buildings. They can be dug up by a crystal mine. You will also get granite from the mine.
target: Dürabele Stenen worden tum Bauen vun groten Husen bruukt. Se könen vun eenem Edelflint-Bargwark oboot worden. Du kriggst ok Flint ut de Bargwark.

source: If the food supply is steady, this mine can produce granite in %s on average.
target: Wenn de Spiesen to rechter Tied ankomen, produzeert deeses Bargwark dör de Bank all %s Flint.

source: If the food supply is steady, this mine can produce coal in 32.5 seconds on average.
target: Wenn de Spiesen to rechter Tied ankomen, produzeert deeses Bargwark dör de Bank all 32,5 Sekünnen Köhle.

source: If the food supply is steady, this mine can produce coal in 19.5 seconds on average.
target: Wenn de Spiesen to rechter Tied ankomen, produzeert deeses Bargwark dör de Bank all 19,5 Sekünnen Köhle.

source: If the food supply is steady, this mine can produce coal in 14.4 seconds on average.
target: Wenn de Spiesen to rechter Tied ankomen, produzeert deeses Bargwark dör de Bank all 14,4 Sekünnen Köhle.

source: If the food supply is steady, this mine can produce iron ore in %s on average.
target: Wenn de Spiesen to rechter Tied ankomen, produzeert deeses Bargwark dör de Bank all %s Iesenkluut.

source: If the food supply is steady, this mine can produce iron ore in 39.5 seconds on average.
target: Wenn de Spiesen to rechter Tied ankomen, produzeert deeses Bargwark dör de Bank all 39,5 Sekünnen Iesenkluut.

source: If the food supply is steady, this mine can produce iron ore in 17.6 seconds on average.
target: Wenn de Spiesen to rechter Tied ankomen, produzeert deeses Bargwark dör de Bank all 17,6 Sekünnen Iesenkluut.

source: If the food supply is steady, this mine can produce gold ore in %s on average.
target: Wenn de Spiesen to rechter Tied ankomen, produzeert deeses Bargwark dör de Bank all %s Goldkluut.

source: If the food supply is steady, this mine can produce gold ore in 19.5 seconds on average.
target: Wenn de Spiesen to rechter Tied ankomen, produzeert deeses Bargwark dör de Bank all 19,5 Sekünnen Goldkluut.

source: If the food supply is steady, this mine can produce gold ore in 18.5 seconds on average.
target: Wenn de Spiesen to rechter Tied ankomen, produzeert deeses Bargwark dör de Bank all 18,5 Sekünnen Goldkluut.

source: Marble is a basic building material and can be dug up by a marble mine. You will also get granite from the mine.
target: Marmel is een wichtiges Baumaterial un kann vun Marmel-Bargwarken ofboot worden. Du kriggst ok Flint ut de Bargwark.

source: This mine will exploit %1%%% of its resources. From there on out, it will only have a %2%%% chance of finding any more of them.
target: Deeses Bargwark haalt blot %1%%% vun de Mineraal ut de Grund. Vun dann an hett ’t blot eene Kans vun %2%%%, noch wat to finnen.

source: This mine will exploit all of its resources down to the deepest level. But even after having done so, it will still have a %1%%% chance of finding some more of them.
target: Deeses Bargwark haalt dat Mineraal kumpleet ut de Grund. Wenn ’t leeg is, kann ’t immer noch mit eener Kans vun %1%%% wat finnen.

source: Attack and completely destroy the Barbarian buildings as soon as you have enough soldiers.
target: Griep de Willen Husen an un verneel se kumpleet, sobold du genoog Soldaten hest.

source: The only solution is to build two new forester’s houses near our lumberjacks. Be sure to first build a new forester’s house and then eventually destroy the old one or at least expel the forester to change houses.
target: De eenzigste Lösen is, twee neje Förster-Husen dicht bi de Boomhauers to bauen. Bau eerst een nejes Förster-Huus un dann brann dat olle of, of stüür tominnst de Förster weg, daarmit he in de nejen Husen gaht.

source: The problem is however that the gods won’t be amused if we destroy one of their temples. And you never know what this could lead to.
target: Dat Probleem daarmit is natürelk, dat de Gotten dat nich witzig finnen, wenn man hör Tempels verneelt. Man weet nie, wat dann passeren kann.

source: Gather Wares as a Gift or Destroy the Empire’s Warehouse
target: Sammel Waren as Gaven of verneel dat Rieks-Kraamhuus

source: The only way to put an end to the Empire’s desire to steal our liberty is to destroy this outpost once and for all. Conquer its entire land.
target: De eenzige Aard, wo wi dat Riek hinnern könen, uns’ Freeiheid to stehlen, is, deese Butenstee een för all Maal to verneelen. Nehm sien kumpleetes Gewest in.

source: Chieftain Reebaud – the demands of this arrogant Empire Proconsul are just outrageous. He treats us like we are his servants. And we certainly cannot afford to spare that many wares to aid him. I propose that we destroy that ugly warehouse and let him fight his own battles.
target: Mienheer Reebaud – wat deeser heerske Rieks-Prokonsul dwingt, is tum rasend worden. He behannelt uns as siene Slaven. Un wi könen heel nich so völe Waren verkroppen, um hüm to helpen. Ick slaa vör, deeses malle Kraamhuus oftobrannen un hüm siene egenen Slachten fechten to laten.

source: Pay the Empire or Destroy Their Port
target: Betahl dat Riek of verneel hör Muu

source: Alternatively, you can destroy his port to build one of your own in it’s place.
target: Of du kannst siene Muu verneelen un daar sülvst eene bauen.

source: As it so happens, my soldiers are bored with never having anything to do. Let us perform a contest of arms, shall we? You may send your soldiers to try and destroy my palace. I am certain that you will not stand a chance, and therefore I promise I will pray to the gods to bless your journey if you do succeed.
target: Aver dat is nu so, dat miene Soldaten sik langwielen, wiel se hier nienich wat do doon kregen. Laat uns doch eenen Wettstried vun Wapen maken! Du kannst diene Soldaten schicken, dat se versöken, mienen Palast oftobrannen. Ick bün wiss, dat du keene Kans hest, un daarum geev ick di mien Woord, dat ick de Gotten beden sall, diene Fahrt to segen, wenn du dat doch daan kriggst.

source: Since our quarries are useless now, you can destroy them and reuse the space later on.
target: Uns’ Flintslagerhusen sünd nu unnütz, du kannst se ofrieten un de Rüümte naher weer bruuken.

source: Attack and conquer all military buildings of the enemy and destroy their headquarters.
target: Griep all Soldateree-Boen vum Feind an, nehm se in un brann sien Raadhuus of.

source: No frost, no heat; no rain, no drought; no rats, no locusts; naught can destroy my harvest.
target: Keen Fröst, keene Hitt; keen Regen, keene Dröögd; keene Rötten, keene Heemkes; nix kann miene Arnt vernelen.

source: The tribe or team that can find and destroy all other headquarters wins the game! Does not work with starting conditions without headquarters.
target: De Volk of Klottje dat finnt un verneelt all anner Raadhusen winnt dat Speel! Dat gaht nich mit Anfangs-Kondiesjes sünner Raadhuus.

source: Well done so far. We have produced enough wheat. Now dismantle the farm and build the next building in the production chain.
target: Hunnert bit hier. Wi hebben genoog Weit. Nu riet de Buurderee platt in bau dat anner Huus in de Produzeren-Kedde.

source: For example, it might be a good idea to produce a reasonable amount of a ware and afterwards dismantle the building to gain space for another building.
target: To ’n Bispööl is ’t villicht eene gode Idee, eenen lepen Bült vun eener Waar to produzeren un dann dat Huus platt to rieten, um Rüümte för een anners Huus to kriegen.

source: A building is being dismantled at this dismantle site, returning some of the resources that were used during this building’s construction to your tribe’s stores.
target: Hier word een Huus plattreten, um eenige Waren torüggtokriegen, de tum Bauen verwendt wurren.

source: Iron ore, gold ore and coal are mined in the respective mines. The crystal mine will dig for quartz and diamonds – all of them are precious materials and very rarely found. It will produce a lot of granite while searching for them.
target: Iesenkluut, Goldkluut un Köhle worden in de daarna benöögten Bargwarken ofboot. Dat Edelflint-Bargwark söcht na Blinkerflint un Edelstenen – dat sünd dürable Baumaterialien, de leep selten funnen worden. ’t produzeert een Bült Flint, as ’t daarna söcht.

source: Find and catch some fish. Afterwards, produce rations for your miners.
target: Finn un fang Fisse. Produzeer dann Happen för de Bargwarkskeerls.

source: Grinds wheat to produce flour.
target: Mahlt Weit to Mehl.

source: To be prepared for additional fortifications, you should produce 20 marble columns.
target: Rüst di vör neje Befestigungen, indeem du 20 Marmelpieler produzeerst.

source: Your stonemason will not produce marble columns when they are not needed. You have to increase the target quantity.
target: Dien Flintslager produzeert keene Marmelpielers, wenn se nich bruukt worden. Du muttst de End-Tahl verhogen.

source: Smelted in a furnace, it turns into gold which is used as a precious building material and to produce armor.
target: ’t word in Smeltereen smelt. Dann word daarut Gold, wat een düres Baumaterial is un för Wapenrockens bruukt word.

source: Kitchen tools are needed for preparing rations, baking cassava bread and brewing chocolate. Be sure to have a stone carver to produce this basic tool.
target: Besteck is nödig, um Happen torechttomaken, Maniok-Brood to backen un Schokolaa to broen. ’t word vun de Flintbeitelske produzeert.

source: Burns logs to produce charcoal.
target: Brannt Holtköhl ut Boomstammen.

source: The furnace can produce one gold ingot in %s on average if the supply is steady.
target: De Smelteree produzeert dör de Bank all %s een Deel Gold, wenn de Versörgung good is.

source: The food preserver can produce one ration in %s on average if the supply is steady.
target: De Spiesenköök produzeert dör de Bank all %s eenen Happ, wenn de Versörgung good is.

source: The stone mine can produce one slab of granite in %s on average if the supply with rations is steady and the mine is not worn out.
target: De Steen-Bargwark produzeert dör de Bank all %s een Deel Flint, wenn de Versörgung good un dat Bargwark nich leeg is.

source: Smelted in a smelting works, it turns into gold which is used as a precious building material and to produce weapons and armor.
target: ’t word in Smeltwarken smelt. Dann word daarut Gold, wat een düres Baumaterial is un för Wapens un Wapenrocken bruukt word.

source: Saws logs to produce planks.
target: Saagt Planken ut Boomstammen.

source: Saws logs to produce planks.
target: Saagt Planken ut Boomstammen.

source: Smelted in a smelting works, it turns into gold which is used as a precious building material and to produce weapons and armor.
target: ’t word in Smeltwarken smelt. Dann word daarut Gold, wat een düres Baumaterial is un för Wapens un Wapenrocken bruukt word.

source: Kitchen tools are needed for preparing rations, snacks and meals. Be sure to have a metal workshop to produce this basic tool (but it ceases to be produced by the building if it is enhanced to an ax workshop and war mill).
target: Besteck is nödig, um Happen, Spiesen un Mahltieden torechttomaken. ’t word in de Metalldreihbank produzeert (aver nich mehr, wenn dat Huus to eener Extensmede of Oorlogs-Smee utbaut word).

source: A reed yard can produce a sheaf of reed in about %s on average.
target: De Reitplanteree bruukt dör de Bank %s um een Bunsel Reit to saien un to arnten.

source: If all needed wares are delivered in time, this building can produce grout in about %s on average.
target: Wenn alle nödigen Waren to rechter Tied ankomen, produzeert deeses Huus dör de Bank all %s Mörtel.

source: If all needed wares are delivered in time, this building can produce a pitta bread in %s on average.
target: Wenn alle nödigen Waren to rechter Tied ankomen, produzeert deeses Huus dör de Bank all %s een Pitta-Brood.

source: If all needed wares are delivered in time, this building can produce beer in about %s on average.
target: Wenn alle nödigen Waren to rechter Tied ankomen, produzeert deeses Huus dör de Bank all %s Beer.

source: If all needed wares are delivered in time, this building can produce each tool in about %s on average.
target: Wenn alle nödigen Waren to rechter Tied ankomen, produzeert deeses Huus dör de Bank all %s elkeen Warktüüg.

source: If all needed wares are delivered in time, this building can produce each type of ax in about %s on average.
target: Wenn alle nödigen Waren to rechter Tied ankomen, produzeert deeses Huus dör de Bank all %s elkeen Ext.

source: If all needed wares are delivered in time, this building can produce an ox in %s on average.
target: Wenn alle nödigen Waren to rechter Tied ankomen, produzeert deeses Huus dör de Bank all %s eenen Oss.

source: If the food supply is steady, this mine can produce granite in %s on average.
target: Wenn de Spiesen to rechter Tied ankomen, produzeert deeses Bargwark dör de Bank all %s Flint.

source: If the food supply is steady, this mine can produce coal in 32.5 seconds on average.
target: Wenn de Spiesen to rechter Tied ankomen, produzeert deeses Bargwark dör de Bank all 32,5 Sekünnen Köhle.

source: If the food supply is steady, this mine can produce coal in 19.5 seconds on average.
target: Wenn de Spiesen to rechter Tied ankomen, produzeert deeses Bargwark dör de Bank all 19,5 Sekünnen Köhle.

source: If the food supply is steady, this mine can produce coal in 14.4 seconds on average.
target: Wenn de Spiesen to rechter Tied ankomen, produzeert deeses Bargwark dör de Bank all 14,4 Sekünnen Köhle.

source: If the food supply is steady, this mine can produce iron ore in %s on average.
target: Wenn de Spiesen to rechter Tied ankomen, produzeert deeses Bargwark dör de Bank all %s Iesenkluut.

source: If the food supply is steady, this mine can produce iron ore in 39.5 seconds on average.
target: Wenn de Spiesen to rechter Tied ankomen, produzeert deeses Bargwark dör de Bank all 39,5 Sekünnen Iesenkluut.

source: If the food supply is steady, this mine can produce iron ore in 17.6 seconds on average.
target: Wenn de Spiesen to rechter Tied ankomen, produzeert deeses Bargwark dör de Bank all 17,6 Sekünnen Iesenkluut.

source: If the food supply is steady, this mine can produce gold ore in %s on average.
target: Wenn de Spiesen to rechter Tied ankomen, produzeert deeses Bargwark dör de Bank all %s Goldkluut.

source: If the food supply is steady, this mine can produce gold ore in 19.5 seconds on average.
target: Wenn de Spiesen to rechter Tied ankomen, produzeert deeses Bargwark dör de Bank all 19,5 Sekünnen Goldkluut.

source: If the food supply is steady, this mine can produce gold ore in 18.5 seconds on average.
target: Wenn de Spiesen to rechter Tied ankomen, produzeert deeses Bargwark dör de Bank all 18,5 Sekünnen Goldkluut.

source: Flour is produced by the mill out of wheat and is needed in the bakery to produce the tasty Empire bread.
target: Mehl word in Möhlen ut Weit maakt un word in Backereen bruukt, um dat gode Rieks-Brood to backen.

source: Smelted in a smelting works, it turns into gold which is used as a precious building material and to produce weapons and armor.
target: ’t word in Smeltwarken smelt. Dann word daarut Gold, wat een düres Baumaterial is un för Wapens un Wapenrocken bruukt word.

source: Grinds wheat to produce flour.
target: Mahlt Weit to Mehl.

source: Grinds wheat to produce flour.
target: Mahlt Weit to Mehl.

source: Smelted in a furnace, it turns into gold which is used as a precious building material and to produce weapons and armor.
target: ’t word in Smeltereen smelt. Dann word daarut Gold, wat een düres Baumaterial is un för Wapens un Wapenrocken bruukt word.

source: Burns logs and clay to produce coal.
target: Brannt Holtköhle ut Boomstammen un Lehm.

source: Reed is the traditional material for roofing. It is also needed to produce baskets and fishing nets, and it is woven – together with reindeer fur – into the cloth used for ships’ sails.
target: All Dacken worden mit Reit beschickt. Man bruukt ’t ok, um Körven un Fiskernetten to maken, un daar weevt man – tosamen mit Sneeihirsken-Fell – de Stoff mit, de man för de Seils vun Schippen bruukt.

source: The bakery needs %s on average to produce one loaf of bread.
target: De Backeree bruukt dör de Bank %s um een Brood to backen.

source: The tavern can produce one ration in %s on average if the supply is steady; otherwise, it will take 50%% longer.
target: De Kneipe produzeert dör de Bank all %s een Happ wenn de Versörgung good is; anners bruukt se 50%% langer.

source: If the food supply is steady, the rock mine can produce two blocks of granite in %s on average.
target: Wenn de Spiesen to rechter Tied ankomen, produzeert deeses Bargwark dör de Bank all %s twee Blocken Flint.

source: If the food supply is steady, the deep rock mine can produce three blocks of granite in %s on average.
target: Wenn de Spiesen to rechter Tied ankomen, produzeert deeses Bargwark dör de Bank all %s dree Blocken Flint.

source: If the food supply is steady, the coal mine can produce two pieces of coal in %s on average.
target: Wenn de Spiesen to rechter Tied ankomen, produzeert deeses Bargwark dör de Bank all %s twee Köhlen.

source: If the food supply is steady, the deep coal mine can produce four pieces of coal in %s on average.
target: Wenn de Spiesen to rechter Tied ankomen, produzeert deeses Bargwark dör de Bank all %s veer Köhlen.

source: If the food supply is steady, the iron mine can produce one piece of iron ore in %s on average.
target: Wenn de Spiesen to rechter Tied ankomen, produzeert dat Iesen-Bargwark dör de Bank all %s Iesenkluut.

source: If the food supply is steady, the deep iron mine can produce two pieces of iron ore in %s on average.
target: Wenn de Spiesen to rechter Tied ankomen, produzeert dat Deepe Iesen-Bargwark dör de Bank all %s twee Delen Iesenkluut.

source: If the food supply is steady, the gold mine can produce one piece of gold ore in %s on average.
target: Wenn de Spiesen to rechter Tied ankomen, produzeert deeses Bargwark dör de Bank all %s Goldkluut.

source: If the food supply is steady, the deep gold mine can produce two pieces of gold ore in %s on average.
target: Wenn de Spiesen to rechter Tied ankomen, produzeert deeses Bargwark dör de Bank all %s twee Goldkluten.

source: After losing an important battle against the barbarians which lead to the loss of a big part of the Empire’s territory, Lutius leaves Fremil to start a new life. But his destiny takes his ship into a heavy storm, which nearly destroys it. Only with a lot of luck he manages to beach his damaged ship on an unknown desert strand and save his people. For now.
target: Nadeem he eene wichtige Slacht tegen de Willen Lüü un eenen groten Part vun de Land vun de Latiensken Riek verloren hett, verlett Lutjus Freemilt un begünnt een nejes Leven. Aver sien Schipp word vun de Slag in eenen Kohstörm föhrt un haast verneelt. Nix as Glück vergünnt hüm, mit de ramponeerten Schipp up eenen frömden Strand uptolopen un siene Lüü to redden. Vöreerst.

source: May Satul save us! Lutas is still trying to get to us. A scout informed me that the ocean is rising quickly. We have to reach higher ground and evacuate everybody and as much wares as we can from the headquarters up the mountains. How can we escape?
target: Satuul sall uns retten! Luutas versöcht immer noch, uns to halen. Een Bespejer hett mi seggt, dat de See fix uplöppt. Wi mutten in de Bargen gahn un all Lüü, un ok so völe Waren ut de Raadhuus as mögelk, mitnöhmen. Aver wo könen wi dann flüchten?

source: Lower the demand for marble columns in the economy settings to four. This will help to save some marble for buildings.
target: Minner de Nafraag för Marmelpielers in de Weertskupp-Instellens to veer. Dann blievt uns mehr Marmel för Husen över.

source: Oh great Neptune, safeguard our journey! Oh great Neptune, let the winds be friendly to our course! Oh great Neptune, save us from the creatures of the sea! Oh great Neptune, …
target: Och groter Neptun, behüüd uns up uns’ Fahrt! Och groter Neptun, laat uns de Winden gnädig sien! Och groter Neptun, behüüd uns vör de Beesten vun de See! Och groter Neptun, …

source: Of course I also prefer to keep our soldiers alive, but we can’t save every life. Soldiers die in battle, that’s just the way things are. You may decide how long to wait until attacking, but don’t take too long, or the enemies will exploit our weakness.
target: Ick mag uns’ Soldaten ok lever levend, aver wi könen se nich all behöden. Soldaten starven im Krieg, dat is man so. Du magst entscheden, wo lang wi wachten, bit wi angriepen, aver wacht nich to lange, anners nützen de Feinde uns’ Swackheid ut.

source: By changing the target quantity, you can therefore decide which wares/tools your resources (in this case: iron) should be turned into or whether you would like to save your iron and wait until you know what you will need it for.
target: Indeem du de Enn-Tahl ännerst kannst du fastleggen, to wat för Waren of Warktüüg diene Mineraale (im Bispööl Iesen) verarbeidt worden sallen of of du se lever behollst, bit du weetst, för wat du se bruukst.

source: If you have a save game or replay demonstrating the issue (for instance crashes where it can be hard to tell exactly what is triggering it), please include that too. For more information, see the section on Replays below.
target: Wenn du een sekert Speel of Upteken hest, wat dat Probleem verklaart (to ’n Bispööl Störten, waar man nich sücht, wat de Oorsaak is), kliev dat bidde ok an. Mehr Informationen finnst du unnern in de Deel över Uptekens.

source: A player disconnected from the game. An automatic save game has been created. Do you want to continue playing?
target: Een Speler is nich mehr mit de Speel verbunnen. Dat Speel is automatisk sekert worden. Willst du widerspölen?

source: And we don’t have any iron left. We must find a way to get some metal for forging new picks. Unfortunately, I have no idea how to do this.
target: Un wi hebben keen Iesen över. Wi mutten eets wat Iesen kriegen, um neje Pickhacken to maken. Aver ick hebb leidergotts keene Idee, wo wi dat doon könen.

source: The other two important food wares are smoked fish and smoked meat. Raw meat is delivered from a hunter. A fisher gets the fish out of the sea while a fish breeder makes sure that a school of fish does not go extinct by breeding more. Make sure that there are always fish left, otherwise the fish breeder won’t be able to breed new ones. The smoking happens in a smokery, you will need at least two of those.
target: De annern twee wichtigen Spiesen sünd Rökelfiss un Rökelfleesk. Een Jäger levert rauhes Fleesk. Een Fisker hollt Fisse ut de See un een Fisstüchter kümmert sik daarum, dat de Fisse nich all fiskt worden, indeem he welke tücht. Pass up, dat immer een paar Fisse övrig sünd, anners kann de Fisstüchter keene mehr tüchten. Fiss un Fleesk worden in eener Rökelkamer rökelt, bau daar tominnst twee vun.

source: As our realm is getting bigger and bigger, the traffic on the roads is overwhelming. Our poor carriers are no longer able to transport the goods as fast as we need them to. I suggest we give them some support by breeding oxen.
target: As uns’ Riek groter un groter word, word de Verkehr up de Straten vööl to vööl. Uns’ arme Lastendragers könen de Waren nich mehr so fix transporteren, as wi dat bruken. Ick raad an, se to unnerstütten, indeem wi Ossen tüchten.

source: We need to build a temple for Satul and we need to worship him well. By this he might show these Barbarians his might and our princess might come back to her senses.
target: Wi mutten eenen Tempel för Satuul bauen un hüm akkeraat anbeden. Dann wiest he villicht deesen Willen Lüü siene Macht un uns’ Königstochter kummt hopentlik weer to Sinnen.

source: The BASTARD! Only one man of our frontier patrol came back alive. He carried a message from Kalitath, telling us that he will punish every move of our troops with their own blood! We cannot accept this behavior. From now on, there is war between Kalitath and us!
target: Deeser DÖNNER! Blot eener vun de Lüü, wat to Kalitat schickt wurr, is levig weerkomen. He hett de Naricht brocht, dat elkeen Treck vun uns’ Soldatere mit hör eegen Blood betahlt word! Dat könen wi hüm nich dörgahn laten. Vun nu an gifft dat Krieg tüsken Kalitat un uns!

source: Nothing is left of that beauty I remember, only ruins remain of the old capital. I am sorrowful but also relieved. I never hoped to see Al’thunran’s old beauty again – it was only a few months ago that I wondered whether I would ever be able to set my feet there again. Now the old town is back in my hands, and I will not hesitate to rebuild it with all the strength my people have. I can’t wait to see it again in its old beauty.
target: Nix is mehr över vun de Pracht, wat daar maal weer; vun de ollen Höövdstadt sünd nix as Ruinen över. Dat is trürig, aver verlichtert mi ok. Ick hebb nie hoopt, de olle Pracht vun Alltunraan weer to sehn – noch vör een paar Maanten hebb ick mi fraggt, of ick daar wull jemaals weer löpen düür. Nu is de olle Stadt weer in mienen Hannen, un ick will se natürelk mit all de Kraft vun mienen Lüü weer upbauen. Un bannig bold word se weer in hör ollen Pracht erstrahlen.

source: First, we need to find some more resources to back up our growing economy. I have spotted an island with some mountains in the south. Perhaps we can find some valuable resources like iron there.
target: Toeerst mutten wi mehr Mineraale finnen, um uns’ Weertskupp to versörgen, as se wasst. Ick hebb im Süden eene Insel mit een paar Bargen to sehn kregen. Villicht könen wi daar dürabele Mineraale as Iesen finnen.

source: Alright Lutius, another problem solved. Still more to come. As we are able to produce food now, we should start mining some coal and iron ore immediately. After all, we need more tools to get our economy back up and build more and different production sites.
target: Lutjus, noch een Probleem ofholpen, aver ’t gifft mehr. Wi könen nu Spiesen produzeren, also sallen wi stracks begünnen, Köhl un Iesenkluut oftiboen. Wi bruken man Warktüüg, daarmit uns’ Weertskupp weer mehr un verschedene Warkhusen versörgen kann.

source: I would say that three fully trained heroes should be sufficient to begin with. But don’t forget to send them to the front line, because they are not that useful back home.
target: Ick gloov, dree kumpleet utbildt Helden sünd eerst maal genoog. Vergeet nich, se tur Grenz to schicken, man hier im Binnenland sünd se leep unnütz.

source: Well done. Now you know how to draw back your soldiers from the places where you don’t need them. It is time to tell you how to reinforce your front line.
target: Hunnert. Nu weetst du, wo dat gaht, diene Soldaten vun Steden wegtokriegen, waar du se nich bruukst. Nu lehr ick di, wo dat gaht, diene Swette starker to maken.

source: When you have seen enough, switch back to the third tab (‘Wares in warehouses’).
target: Wenn du genoog sehn hest, köör de darden Listenwessler (»Waren in Kraamhusen«) weer ut.

source: I walk all day just back and forth. I need? I need … I need a horse!
target: Ick löpp de heel Dag hen un weer. Ick bruuk? Ick bruuk … ick bruuk een Peer!

source:
‘Way down here in this deep mine
where the sun it dare not shine,
I sweat and toil till day is done,
but I’ll be back with morning come.’
target:
»In deesem Bargwark bannig deep,
waar ’t is düüster bannig leep,
sweet un wark ick mit Beswaar
un mörgen bün ick ok weer daar.«

source: The stonemason pauses %s before going back to work again.
target: De Flintslager wacht %s ehr he weer arbeidt.

source: Use the encyclopedia to find out how to create new soldiers.
target: Slaa na, wo du neje Soldaten kriggst.

source: The encyclopedia has five tabs:
target: De Hülp im Speel hett fiev Listenwesslers:

source: Enhance the coal mine or the iron mine to a deep mine, and enhance the tavern to an inn.
target: Bau dat Köhle-Bargwark of dat Iesen-Bargwark to eenem Deepen Bargwark ut un bau de Kneipe to eenem Kroog ut.

source: Workers gain experience by successful work. With enough experience, they become more advanced workers, who are necessary to operate the enhanced buildings. Do not enhance a building before you have enough advanced workers to operate the advanced building!
target: Arbeiders sammeln Erfahrung, wenn se good arbeiden. Wenn se genoog Erfahrung hebben, worden se betere Arbeiders, de för utbaute Husen nödig sünd. Bau een Huus nich ut, wenn du noch nich genoog künnige Arbeiders hest, um daar to arbeiden!

source: Build a training camp and enhance the arena
target: Bau een Övens-Lager un bau de Ring ut.

source: Build a training camp and enhance your arena to a colosseum.
target: Bau een Övens-Lager un bau dienen Ring to eenem Groten Ring ut.

source: Well, Lutius, we have just solved another weird behavior in our economy. Now our lumberjacks should be supplied with enough trees to enhance our economy.
target: Na, Lutjus, wi hebben jüüst noch een komiskes Verhollen in uns’ Weertskupp ofholpen. Nu kriegen uns’ Boomhauers genoog Bomen, um in uns’ Weertskupp to helpen.

source: Most enhanced buildings need experienced workers. Do not enhance a building unless you have the necessary workers available.
target: De meesten utbauten Husen bruken Arbeiders mit Erfahrung. Bau de Husen eerst dann ut, wenn du de nödigen Arbeiders hest.

source: We can then also use their access to the lake in order to explore more land.
target: Wi könen dann ok hör Togang tum Meer bruken, um noch mehr nejes Land uttoförsken.

source: In the vicinity of three major volcanoes, six lovely islands are inviting settlers to start a new life. Deserts and a quickly growing forest wait to be discovered. But only by becoming a naval power will your tribe be able to explore enough resources to compete with its opponents.
target: Dicht bi dree groten Füürbargen laden sess feine Insels Lüde in, een nejes Leven to begünnen. Sandlannen un een Wald, wat fell wasst, wachten, dat man se finnt. Aver blot as Seefahrt-Meister kann dien Volk genoog Mineraale kriegen, um mit sienen Feinden klaartoworden.

source: The island is huge and as long as we are not sure that we are alone here, we cannot relax. Explore and conquer it, this is the only way to protect us from threats on the island and from Atlantis.
target: De Insel is baldadig un solang wi nich weten, dat wi hier alleen sünd, düren wi nich entspannen. Försk se ut un nehm se in, blot so könen wi uns vör Gefahren up de Insel un vun Atlantis schütten.

source: To set foot on this island, we must first find a building space where a port can be built. Explore the nearby coast line to find such a building plot.
target: Um de Insel to betreden, mutten wi toeerst Rüümte tum Bauen för eene Muu finnen. Försk de Küstenlienje dicht bi ut, um sülke Rüümte to finnen.

source: As we are able to make tools again, our supply of mining resources needs to be replenished soon. Explore the mountains and build at least one mine of each type to mine coal, iron and gold.
target: As wi weer Warktüüg maken könen mutten wi bold uns’ Versörgung mit Mineraalen vernejen. Försk de Bargen ut un bau tominnst een Bargwark vun elkeen Aard, um Köhl, Iesen un Gold oftoboen.

source: We are fairly sure that we are not alone on the island. We do not know if the others on this island are friends or foes, so we need to tread carefully. Explore the island by building at least one house for a scout.
target: Wi sünd uns temelk seker, dat wi nich alleen up de Insel sünd. Wi weten nich, of de anners hier Frünnen of Feinden sünd, also mutten wi uppassen. Försk de Insel ut, indeem du tominnst een Huus för eenen Bespejer baust.

source: Now it is time to celebrate but I expect we can’t relax long. We need to build up our society and our capability to explore the seas again.
target: Nu is ’t Tied tum fieren, aver ick gloov nich, dat wi lang Rüst hollen könen. Wi mutten uns’ Gesellskupp upbauen un uns’ Vermögen, de See weer uttoförsken.

source: In order to call a geologist to search for water, click on a flag in the area that you want him to search and then on the button labeled ‘Send geologist to explore site’.
target: Daarmit een Schattsöker Water söcht, klick eene Fahn an, de in de Kuntrei staht, waar he söken sall, un klick dann de Knoop »Een Schattsöker sall deese Stee unnersöken« an.

source: Build more military buildings to explore the area around the headquarters and to ensure the safety of your people.
target: Bau mehr Soldateree-Boen, um de Kuntrei um dien Raadhuus uttoförsken un för de Sekerheid vun jo Lüü to sörgen.

source: Sire, we do not know anything about the island. And I believe we are not safe either. It would probably be reasonable to build a tower to explore the island and add some military strength.
target: Mienheer, wi weten absolut nix över deese Insel. Un ick gloov, wi sünd hier ok nich seker. ’t is wull beter, eenen Toorn to bauen, um de Insel uttoförsken un wat Soldateree-Fors to hebben.

source: Fortunately, I spotted a mountain which looks very promising and seems to have some mining resources. Perhaps we should send some geologists to explore the hidden resources.
target: Tum Glück hebb ick eenen Barg to sehn kregen, wat so utsücht, as of ’t daar Mineraale to ofboen gifft. Villicht sallen wi een paar Schattsökers schicken, um de verburgen Mineraale uttoförsken.

source: Expand Your Territory to Explore the South
target: Vergroter dien Gewest, um de Süden uttoförsken

source: You can try your luck and expand randomly, but this is risky. A safer way is to use a scout to explore unseen parts of the map. What if he finds mountains overflowing with gold?
target: Du kannst natürelk versöken, tofällig rumtostromern, aver dat is gefahrelk. ’t is sekerer, eenen Bespejer to bruken, um nich sehn Delen vun de Kaart uttoförsken. Wat, wenn he eenen Barg vuller Gold finnt?

source: It’s good to know your surroundings. A scout will explore unseen parts of the map for you.
target: ’t is good to weten, wat in diener Umgeven is. Een Bespejer försket unbekannte Delen vun de Kaart för di ut.

source: Wait for the scout to explore unseen areas.
target: Wach, bit de Bespejer unbekannte Gewesten utförsket.

source: In this game, you start out on a small piece of land with just a few resources. Using these, you’ll create an empire with many thousands of inhabitants. On your way towards this goal, you will have to establish an economic infrastructure, explore the land around you and face rivaling tribes.
target: In deesem Speel fangst du mit eenem lütten Deel Land an, waar du leep minn Materialien un Mineraale hest. Daarmit baust du een Riek mit dusenden Inwohners up. Up dienem Weg daarhen baust du eene starke Weertskupp up, förskst dat Land um di rum ut un kämpst tegen tegenstriedige Völker.

source:
‘Behind the next hill there might be wealth and happiness but also hostility and doom.
He who will not explore it commits the crime of stupidity.’
target:
»Achter de anner Höcht könen Riekdoom un Freide liggen, aver ok Feinde un Verdarv.
Well dat nich nakiekt, begaht de Undaad: Dummheid.«

source: Send geologist to explore site
target: Een Schattsöker sall deese Stee unnersöken

source: Send scout to explore surroundings
target: Bespejer stüren, um dat Gewest uttoförsken

source: Dear brother, I have bad news to report. One of our buildings has just been destroyed by an uncontrolled kitchen fire. I fear this might be a sign of the goddess Vesta still being in a bad mood.
target: Lever Broor, ick hebb slimme Narichten. Eens vun uns’ Husen is jüüst vun siener Füürstee ofbrannt worden. Dat is wull een Teken, dat de Gottin Vesta böös up uns is.

source: When a building is destroyed, its workers will start looking for a nearby flag from which they can move by road to a connected warehouse. If there are no such flags in the vicinity, they will keep wandering around and eventually die.
target: Wenn een Huus ofrieten word, söken de Arbeiders na eener Fahn, vun waar se över Straten to een Kraamhuus komen könen. Wenn keene sülke Fahn in de Naberskupp is, wannern se sünner Stüür rum bit se starven.

source: On MacOS, you can find the file called COPYING in the archive you downloaded from the website.
target: Up MacOS finnst du de Datei mit de Naam »COPYING« in de Paket, dat du vun de Internett-Sied runnerladen hest.

source: Manage your messages more efficiently: press ‘%1%’ to access the messages window, then use ‘%2%’ for Go To, and the ‘%3%’ key to archive messages.
target: Kümmer di fixer um diene Narichten: Drück »%1%«, um dat Narichten-Fenster opentokregen, bruuk dann »%2%«, um daarhen to gahn, un de »%3%«-Tast, um de Naricht wegtodoon.

source: Click to restore, Shift + Click to delete, and Ctrl + Click to pin an item.
target: Klick an tum Torügghalen, Umschalt + Klick tum Lösken, Strg + Klick tum Faststeken.

source: The interactive add-ons packager allows you to create, edit, and delete add-ons. You can bundle maps designed with the Widelands Map Editor as an add-on using the graphical interface and share them with other players, without having to write a single line of code.
target: De interaktiv Verwiederns-Packer verlöövt di, Verwiederns to maken, to bewarken un wegtodoon. Du kannst Kaarten, wat du mit de Widelands Kaart-Bewarker maakt hest, mit de graphisk Schnittstee as een Verwiedern packen un se mit anner Spelers delen, sünner eene enkelt Rieg Quelltexten schrieven to mutten.

source: We should build a port in Törver’s former land to be ready to send an expedition as soon as we found out how to build ships.
target: Laat uns eene Muu in de Land bauen, wat to Törver höört hett, daarmit wi eene Söök utstafferen könen, sobold wi utfunnen hebben, wo man Schippen baut.

source: In this tutorial, you will learn how to navigate in Widelands and how to build buildings and roads.
target: In deese Inföhren lehrst du, wo dat Torechtfinnen in Widelands gaht un wo man Husen un Straten baut.

source: In this tutorial, you will be taught the secrets of warfare: how to create soldiers, how to train them and how to lead them in battle. Scouting will be also covered.
target: In deese Inföhren lehrst du alls över Slachten: Wo dat Anhüren un Utbilden vun Soldaten gaht un wo man se in de Krieg föhrt. Ok dat Bespejen word verklaart.

source: In this tutorial, you will get to know seafaring, which is how to handle ships and ports, and how to use ferries and waterways.
target: In deeser Inföhren lehrst du, wo du Schippen, Muden, Fähren un Prielen bruukst.

source: This situation was caused by the sad fact that our people lost the instructions on how to construct and operate farms. Therefore they have zero productivity and the constructors don’t know how to dismantle them either.
target: De Grund daarför is, dat uns Lüü de Instruktjes verlesen hebben, wo man Buurdereen baut un bedeent. Daarum is hör Wöörde bi null un de Baukeerls weten nich, wo se se plattrieten sallen.

source: Praise the gods, Lutius! We have found the plans on how to build and operate farms.
target: De Gotten wees Pries, Lutjus! Wi hebben de Planen funnen, wo man Buurdereen baut un bedeent.

source: And you wouldn’t believe it, but nobody knows how to improve the technology or how to build more efficient buildings. I only heard some rumors about a monastery in the north where the priestesses are supposed to possess some knowledge about improved technologies.
target: Un wat wull, nüms weet, wo man se utbaut of betere Husen baut. Ick hebb blot Gerüchten över een Klooster im Noorden höört, waar de Preesterinnen na ’t Seggen wat över betere Techniken weten.

source: Unfortunately, we only have an arena and a very old and small training camp with very little storage capacity. And none of our builders knows how to improve this. Alas! But we need to use what we have to get prepared for battle.
target: Leider hebben wi blot eenen Ring un een bannig olles, lüttes Övens-Lager mit heel minn Rüümte för Waren. Un keener vun uns’ Baukeerls weet, wo man dat beter maakt. Ach! Wi mutten nehmen, wat wi kriegen könen, um uns för de Slacht to rüsten.

source: And we don’t have any iron left. We must find a way to get some metal for forging new picks. Unfortunately, I have no idea how to do this.
target: Un wi hebben keen Iesen över. Wi mutten eets wat Iesen kriegen, um neje Pickhacken to maken. Aver ick hebb leidergotts keene Idee, wo wi dat doon könen.

source: Objectives and how to handle them
target: Upgaven un wo man se bruukt

source: I wanted to teach you how to build new flags, but it seems you have already found out on your own. Well done!
target: Ick wull di lehren, wo dat Upstellen vun nejen Fahnen gaht, aver du hest dat openbaar sülvst utfunnen. Hunnert!

source: You have two messages at the moment. This one, which you are currently reading, and the one that informed you that a new headquarters was added to your economy. Let’s learn how to archive messages:
target: Du hest even twee Narichten. Deese hier, wat du upstünds leest, un eene, wat di över een nejes Raadhuus in diener Weertskupp informeert. Laat mi di lehren, wo dat Wegdoon vun Narichten gaht.

source: However, since you now know how to control Widelands, you can also start a game (or continue this one) and discover more by yourself.
target: Wiel du nu weetst, wo dat Stüren vun Widelands gaht, kannst du ok een echtes Speel starten (of deeses hier wiederspölen) un sülvst mehr utfinnen.

source: So far you have learned everything about seafaring: how to build ports and ships and how to send out an expedition. Remember that expeditions are sometimes the fastest way to reach essential resources – and sometimes the only one.
target: Nu hest du all över Seefahrt lehrt: Wo du Muden un Schippen baust un Söken utschickst. Vergeet nich, dat Söken oft de gaueste Weg sünd, um wichtige Mineraale to kriegen – un mennigmaal de eenzige.

source: Allow me to show you how to build a waterway…
target: Laat mi di wiesen, wo du eenen Priel baust …

source: Use the encyclopedia to find out how to create new soldiers.
target: Slaa na, wo du neje Soldaten kriggst.

source: Follow the arrows to learn how to play.
target: Folg de Pielen, um to lehren, wo man spöölt.

source: ‘My mother taught me to ply the ropes from Liana, how to choose the strongest cuttings and parts of the harvest, how to trim away flaws. I bless her wisdom in every length I use.’
target: »Miene Moder hett mi bibrocht, de Tauen ut Boomreep to folden, wo man de stevigsten Längden un Delen vun de Arnt utköört, wo man Fehlers wegnaiht. Hör Klookheid pries ick in elkeen Längde, wat ick bruuk.«

source: You have thirty seconds to learn the basics of swordfighting and how to stay alive in battle. A third of that time has gone by for the introduction alone! You’d better pay close attention to me in order to make the most of it. Now here is your new short sword, forged just for you by our best blacksmiths. Time’s up everyone, now go occupy your sentinels!
target: Ji hebbt dartig Sekünnen, um de Grundlagen vum Sweertkamp to lehren un wo ji in Slachten am Leven blievt. Een Dardel vun deeser Tied is blot för de Inföhren vergahn! Passt beter good up, wat ick segg, daarmit ji so vööl as mögelk lehrt. Hier is nu jo nejes Lüttes Sweert, jüüst för ji vun uns’ besten Smidden smeedt. De Tied is nu um, ji all; gaht nu jo Wachters-Postjen besetten!

source: Just be quiet, listen carefully, and do try not to stab yourself until I’ve explained to you how to hold a broadsword.
target: Wees eenfach still, höör good to, un versöök bidde, di nich doodtostecken ehr ick di verklaart hebb, wo du een Bredes Sweert hollen sallst.

source: For more information regarding how to develop and package your own add-ons, please visit %s.
target: För mehr Informationen, wo du diene eegenen Verwiederns entwickelst un packst, besöök bidde %s.

source: Teach me how to play
target: Lehr mi wo man spöölt

source: The wiki also includes a short tutorial on how to build a map.
target: De Wiki hett eene lütte Inföhren, wo dat Kaarten-Maken gaht.

source: Now that weapons are being forged, new soldiers can be recruited. For this, we need to deliver light tridents and tabards to the barracks. Recruits will arrive from the warehouse and receive one of each and some basic training to become a soldier.
target: Nu dat wi Wapen smeden könen, könen wi neje Soldaten anhüren. Daarto mutten wi Lütte Dreespitzen un Kluften to de Kasern levern. Lehrwichter komen vun eenem Kraamhuus un kriegen eens vun elkeen daarvun un eene Inföhren tum Fechten, un so worden se Soldaten.

source: Today I saw the first recruits gathering in front of the new barracks. If everything goes well, they should receive their training soon.
target: Ick hebb vandag de eersten Lehrwichter sehn, as se vör de neje Kasern stunnen. Se worden wull bold to Soldaten utbildt.

source: Build a barracks to start training soldiers.
target: Bau eene Kasern, um Soldaten uttorüsten.

source: Sire, we have all buildings available for training our soldiers, but we should increase our efforts to train them to the highest level and to train more of them.
target: Mienheer, wie hebben all Husen paraat, de wi bruken, um uns’ Soldaten uttobilden, aver wi mutten uns’ Anstrengens verhogen, um mehr vun hör un uttobilden un up de hoogsten Stand.

source: Increase your military strength by training your soldiers
target: Verhoog diene Soldateree-Fors, indeem du diene Soldaten utbildst

source: No soldier found for this training level!
target: Keen Soldat för deese Lehre is funden worden!

source: Chieftain Reebaud, I have more bad news. There are almost no fish in the waters nearby. While we can prepare rations using only fruit or bread, soldier training requires lots of smoked meat or fish. The scraps of meat a reindeer farm drops out as a by-product when making fur aren’t enough.
target: Mienheer Reebaud, ick hebb noch mehr slimme Narichten. ’t gifft haast keene Fisse im Water. Wi könen Happen blot mit Früchten un Brood maken, aver um Soldaten uttobilden, bruken wi bannig  vööl Rökelfleesk un Rökelfiss. Dat bietje Fleesk, wat eene Sneeihirsktüchteree daarto produzeert, wenn se Fell maakt, is nich genoog.

source: I’d like to say we should attack him right now, but I fear we aren’t strong enough yet to hold our own against him in battle. We should hurry our soldier training while pretending to be gathering his so-called gift. That would buy us some time.
target: Am Leevsten will ick seggen, dat wi hüm gliek stracks angriepen, aver ick bün bange, dat wi noch nich stark genoog sünd, um hüm in eener Slacht to begegen. Wi sallen uns’ Soldaten fixer utbilden as wi so doon, as of wi siene sobenöömte Gaav sammeln. Dat gifft uns wat Tied.

source: I am almost disappointed that your reputation does not exceed the facts, for as you where describing the invaders I was looking forward to fighting them alongside you. I am sorry for your losses, and especially that I will never meet the renowned Hauke, whose name will live on in fame. While your soldiers are recuperating, I will take charge of arranging training sessions for our own soldiers, so that they may learn from yours and become as strong as possible before we return to our homeland.
target: Ick bün haast bedröövt, dat dien Roop nich groter is as verdeent, denn as du över de Indringers snackt hest, hebb ick mi daarup freiht, mit jo tegen se to kämpen. Um dien Verlüüs is mi naar, un vör allem bün ick drurig, dat ick nienich de bekennten Hauke treffen sall, hüm sien Naam in Ehr wiederleven word. As diene Soldaten sik verhalen word ick mi um dat Utbilden vun uns’s eegenen Soldaten kümmern, dat se vun dienen lehren könen un so machtig as dat gaht worden, ehr wi weer na Huus fahren.

source: In this scenario, I’m going to tell you about soldiers, their training and their profession: warfare. Although Widelands is about building up, not burning down, there is an enemy you sometimes have to defeat. Yet warfare is mainly focused on economics, not on military strategies, and its mechanics deserve explanation.
target: In deese Inföhren verklaar ick di Soldaten, hör Utbildung un hör Beruf: Krieg. In Widelands gaht ’t um Upbauen, nich Ofbrannen, aver of un an mutt du eenen Feind manntjen. Bi’m Krieg gaht ’t in ’t Geheel um de Weertskupp, nich taktiske Dingen, aver Slachten mutten doch verklaart worden.

source: New soldiers are created differently from normal workers: recruits will walk from a warehouse (or your headquarters) to the barracks where they will receive some basic training and become soldiers. Basic Barbarian soldiers do not use armor, they only need an ax.
target: Neje Soldaten worden nich as anner Arbeiders anhüürt: Lehrwichter gahn vun eenem Kraamhuus (of dienem Raadhuus) to eener Kasern, waar se de Grundlagen büffeln un Soldaten worden. Neje Soldaten vun de Willen Lüü bruuken keenen Wapenrock, blot eene Ext.

source: No soldier found for this training level!
target: Keene Soldatske för deese Lehre is funden worden!

source: No soldier found for this training level!
target: Keen Soldat för deese Lehre is funden worden!

source: No soldier found for this training level!
target: Keen Soldat för deese Lehre is funden worden!

source: No soldier found for this training level!
target: Keen Soldat för deese Lehre is funden worden!

source: No soldier found for this training level!
target: Keen Soldat för deese Lehre is funden worden!

source: Chocolate is essential for training amazon soldiers.
target: Schokolaa word bruukt, um amazoons Soldatsken uttobilden.

source: A trainer training a soldier
target: Een Mester lehrt eenen Soldaten

source: No soldier found for this training level!
target: Keen Soldat för deese Lehre is funden worden!

source: Build training sites for soldiers
target: Bau Övens-Boen för Soldaten

source: Barracks train basic soldiers while training sites like a training camp or a battle arena are used for training soldiers in their different attributes. These attributes are important in fights and the better a soldier is, the higher is the chance to win a fight.
target: Kasernen billen neje Soldaten ut; Övens-Boen as dat Övens-Lager un de Slachtenring verbetern Soldaten in hör Vermögens. Deese Vermögens sünd wichtig in Slachten: de beter een Soldat is, so beter is ok siene Kans, eene Slacht to winnen.

source: Our geologists found a lot more deposits of iron ore, coal and even gold. We should enhance our current mines as soon as our miners are more experienced. We should build up some more mines, a bigger food infrastructure to always supply our men with sufficient food and a further processing economy. But that’s still not everything – most of our soldiers are quite young and neither have a good weapon nor are they well trained. We should build up training sites to prepare them for their future tasks.
target: Uns’ Schattsökers hebben bannig völe Aders vun Iesenkluut, Köhl un sogaar Gold funnen. Wi sallen uns’ Bargwarken utbauen, sobold uns’ Bargwarkskeerls mehr Erfahrung hebben. Wi sallen mehr Bargwarken bauen, eene grotere Spiesen-Weertskupp, um uns’ Lüü alltied mit godem Eten to versörgen, un eene Weertskupp, um mit de Kluten to warken. Un dat is noch nich all – de mesten vun uns’ Soldaten sünd jung un hebben keene goden Wapen un keene Erfahrung. Wi mutten Övens-Boen bauen, um se up hör tokomen Upgaven vörtobereiden.

source: One of these training sites is the battle arena. It is a big and expensive building, and it trains soldiers in evade. Since soldiers get very hungry during their workout, this building needs a lot of food and strong beer. In a real game, you should have a good infrastructure before you build it.
target: Eens vun deeses Övens-Boen is de Slachtenring. ’t is een grotes und düres Huus, wat Soldaten dat Utwieken lehrt. Soldaten worden daar düchtig smachtig bi, daarum bruukt deeses Huus mennig Spiesen un Deftigs Beer. In eenem echten Speel bruukst du eene gode Weertskupp, bevör du Övens-Boen baust.

source: Fish is one of the two major food resources of the Amazons. It is used by the food preserver to prepare rations for the workers digging for gold dust and granite. It is also consumed at the training sites (training glade and warriors’ gathering) and for recruiting new soldiers.
target: Fiss is eene vun de twee wichtigsten Aarden vun Spiesen för de Amazonen. De Spiesenköök maakt daarut Happen för de Arbeiderskes, wat na Goldstoff un Flint graven. ’t word ok vun de Övens-Boen (Övenshain un Soldatsken-Versammeln) bruukt un um neje Soldatsken antohüren.

source: Meat is used by the food preserver to prepare rations for the workers digging for gold dust and granite. It is also consumed at the training sites (training glade and warriors’ gathering) and for recruiting new soldiers.
target: Fleesk is eene vun de twee wichtigsten Aarden vun Spiesen för de Amazonen. De Spiesenköök maakt daarut Happen för de Arbeiderskes, wat na Goldstoff un Flint graven. ’t word ok vun de Övens-Boen (Övenshain un Soldatsken-Versammeln) bruukt un um neje Soldatsken antohüren.

source: Fish is one of the biggest food resources of the Atlanteans. It has to be smoked in a smokery before being delivered to mines, training sites and scouts.
target: Fiss is eene vun de wichtigsten Spiesen för de Atlantinger. ’t mutt in eener Rökelkamer rökelt worden, ehr ’t vun Bargwarken, Övens-Boen un Bespejers bruukt worden kann.

source: Meat has to be smoked in a smokery before being delivered to mines and training sites (dungeon and labyrinth).
target: Fleesk mutt in eener Rökelkamer rökelt worden, ehr ’t good genoog för de Bargwarken un Övens-Boen (Gefahrelke Gangen un Dwaalwegen) is.

source: Smoked meat is made out of meat in a smokery. It is delivered to the mines and training sites (labyrinth and dungeon) where the miners and soldiers prepare a nutritious lunch for themselves.
target: Rökelfleesk word in eener Rökelkamer ut Fleesk maakt. ’t word to de Bargwarken un Övens-Boen (Dwaalwegen un Gefahrelke Gangen) brocht, waar de Bargwarkskeerls un Soldaten ’t eten.

source: This tasty bread is made in bakeries out of cornmeal, blackroot flour and water. It is appreciated as basic food by miners, scouts and soldiers in training sites (labyrinth and dungeon).
target: Deeses leckere Brood word in Backereen ut Maismehl, Swartwuddel-Mehl un Water maakt. ’t is eene gode Spies för Bargwarkskeerls, Bespejers un Soldaten in Övens-Boen (Dwaalwegen un Gefahrelke Gangen).

source: Besides pitta bread and meat, fish is also a foodstuff for the Barbarians. It is used in the taverns, inns and big inns and at the training sites (training camp and battle arena).
target: Tegen Pitta-Brood un Fleesk is ok Fiss eene Spies för de Willen Lüü. ’t word in Kneipen, Kröög, Weertshusen un Övens-Boen (Övens-Lager un Slachtenring) bruukt.

source: Meat is used in the taverns, inns and big inns to prepare rations, snacks and meals for the miners. It is also consumed at the training sites (training camp and battle arena).
target: Fleesk word in Kneipen, Kröög un Weertshusen bruukt, um Happen, Spiesen un Mahltieden för de Bargwarkskeerls torechttomaken. ’t word ok vun Övens-Boen (Övens-Lager un Slachtenring) bruukt.

source: The Barbarian bakers are best in making this flat and tasty pitta bread. It is made out of wheat and water following a secret recipe. Pitta bread is used in the taverns, inns and big inns to prepare rations, snacks and meals. It is also consumed at training sites (training camp and battle arena).
target: Nüms kann deeses platte, leckere Pitta-Brood beter maken as de Willen Backers. ’t word na eenem gehemen Rezept ut Weit un Water maakt. Pitta-Brood word in Kneipen, Kröög un Weertshusen bruukt, um Happen, Spiesen un Mahltieden torecttomaken. ’t word ok vun Övens-Boen (Övens-Lager un Slachtenring) verbruukt.

source: Besides bread and meat, fish is also a foodstuff for the Empire. Fish are used in taverns, inns and training sites (arena, colosseum, training camp).
target: Tegen Brood un Fleesk is ok Fiss eene Spies för dat Latienske Riek. Fisse worden in Kneipen, Weertshusen un Övens-Boen (Ring, Groter Ring, Övens-Lager) bruukt.

source: Meat can also be obtained as pork from piggeries. It is used in the inns and taverns to prepare lunch for the miners and is consumed at the training sites (arena, colosseum, training camp).
target: Fleesk kann ok vun Swienen in Swientjentüchtereen maakt worden. ’t word in Kneipen un Weertshusen bruukt, um Spiesen för de Bargwarkskeerls torecttomaken. Ok Övens-Boen (Ring, Groter Ring, Övens-Lager) bruken Fleesk.

source: The bakers of the Empire make really tasty bread out of flour and water. It is used in taverns and inns to prepare rations and meals. Bread is also consumed at the training sites (arena, colosseum, training camp).
target: De Rieks-Backers maken bannig leckeres Brood ut Mehl un Water. ’t word in Kneipen un Weertshusen bruukt, um Happen un Mahltieden torechttomaken. Brood word ok vun Övens-Boen (Ring, Groter Ring, Övens-Lager) verbruukt.

source: Recycles old armor and weapon parts that have been discarded by training sites into fur, iron and gold.
target: Verweert olle Wapen un Wapenrocken, de vun Övens-Boen wegsmeten worden sünd, um Fell, Iesen un Gold torüggtokriegen.
